Speaker: none
English: language_id
Revered.
Exalted.
Wise.
This is what we owls aspire to be.
Translated: 是我们猫头鹰追崇的品德。

English: Over the centuries, <30>we have<nl>worked hard to build up the<nl>respect that people have for us.
Translated: 为了赢得人们的尊重，几个世纪以<nl>来，<30>我们一直都在努力工作。

English: And as times get harder, you too,<30><nl>as my student, <30>shall carry the weight<nl>of owlhood upon your shoulders.
Translated: 总有一天，<30>作为我学生的你<30>也会肩<nl>负起猫头鹰的责任。

English: I can see that you are<nl>already a fine young owl,<30> <b>Otus<b>.
Translated: 我知道你是一只年轻又有干劲的猫<nl>头鹰，<30><b>欧图斯<b>。

English: In time, I will mold you<nl>into the spitting image of myself!
Translated: 假以时日，我会让你变得和我一样<nl>优秀！

English: No need to look so nervous!
This is a great moment for you!
Translated: 今天对你来说是个很重要的日子！

English: Despite being born as a mute,<20><nl>under my tutelage you will become<nl>one of the pillars of our community!
Translated: 虽然你天生无法说话，<20>但只要<nl>有我的指导，你也能成为我们<nl>社会的栋梁！

English: Well, I see there's plenty<nl>we will have to work on.
Translated: 好了，我知道你还有许多缺点<nl>需要改正。

English: Do not worry, <30>I will straighten you out!
Translated: 不过别担心，<30>我会帮你纠正它<nl>们的！

English: I'll be honest with you, Otus.
You haven't been doing<nl>too well in your studies at all.
Translated: 在前面的学习中，你的表现没<nl>有我预期的好。

English: So I've been thinking that perhaps<30><nl>your talents simply lie elsewhere.
Translated: 所以我在想，也许<30>你在其它方<nl>面能发挥你的才能。

English: So today we'll be doing some flying.
Translated: 那今天我们就来试试飞行吧。

English: I bet you've been looking<nl>forward to this for a while!
Translated: 我猜你已经盼着这个课程好一<nl>阵子了！

English: Good!<20> Then listen closely.
All you need to do is to<nl><b>jump<b> off the ground.
Translated: 你要做的就是从地面上<b>跳<b>起来。

English: Then, when you're in mid-air,<nl>spread your wings and flap them.
Translated: 然后在半空中伸展并挥动你<nl>的双翼。

English: The owl cloak I gave you<nl>should take care of the rest.
Translated: 之后的事就交给我送你的那<nl>件猫头鹰披风。

English: Go, Otus!<20> Show me what you can do!
Translated: 上吧，欧图斯！<20>让我看看你的本事！

English: Why so nervous, Otus?
Translated: 为什么这么紧张，欧图斯？

English: Of course, you have every reason to be!
Translated: 也是啊，你会紧张的理由太充分了！

English: You want to know truth?
You mute!
Wouldn't be able to tell anyone anyway!
The truth about you?
Are you sure you want to hear it?
Otus! Don't stray!
I need a word with you, Otus.<nl>Land here beside me.
Translated: 我有话要交代你，欧图斯。<nl>在我旁边着陆。

English: NOW!
Alright, you're flying!<nl><30>Now, try and move around a bit!
Translated: 不错，你已经飞起来了！<30>现在，<nl>试着在空中移动！

English: See that platform up there?
Translated: 看到上边那个平台了吗？

English: Fly up there and land on that island,<nl><30>then I'll teach you the real tricks.
Translated: 先降落到那岛上，<30>之后我再教<nl>你真正的技巧。

English: Hmmm, well, Otus... <30><nl>That was some terrible flying.
Translated: 嗯……，好吧，欧图斯……<nl><30>你飞得很糟糕。

English: I have to say, I'm <40>really disappointed.<nl><30>Most students pick this up instantly.
Translated: 我必须要说，我真的<40>很失望。<nl><30>大部分学生都能很快地掌握飞行技巧。

English: Tomorrow we'll go back to normal studies.
Translated: 明天我们还是恢复普通的教学吧。

English: It pains me to see such inept flying.
Translated: 看到这样糟糕的飞行让我很痛心。

English: Quickly, Otus, they are short on water in Vellie!
Translated: 快点，欧图斯，维里村正需要水！

English: People need our help!
The drought isn't as patient<nl>with your sluggishness as I am!
Translated: 这场旱灾可不会像我一样耐心地<nl>等待你的迟钝。

English: Why have you left the<nl>water jug on the ground?!
Translated: 你怎么把水壶忘在地上了？！

English: Pick it up immediately!<nl>Hurry up!
Hang on...
You've been sloshing the jug around!
Translated: 你这水壶拿得摇摇晃晃的！

English: Let me check if there's any water left.
Translated: 让我检查下里面还有没有水。

English: Put the jug down here.
Hey! <30>Stop fooling around!
Put the jug down over here!
Place the jug here, next to me!
Are you blind?! <30>Put it down there!
Translated: 你瞎了吗？！<30>为何要放在那边！

English: NO!
I told you to put it down,<nl>not to smash it!
Translated: 我是让你放下来，不是砸下来！

English: How are we supposed to bring<nl>water to the villagers now?!
Translated: 现在我们怎么把水送到村民手上？！

English: I will not forget this!
Translated: 我不会忘记这次失态的！

English: And I will make sure that<nl>the others are aware of what<nl>your incompetence has cost us!
Translated: 我一定会让其他人知道是因为<nl>你的无能才给村子带来那么多<nl>损失！

English: Do you understand?!
I cannot describe how<nl>disappointed I am in you, Otus.
Translated: 我都不知道应该怎么表达对你<nl>的失望之情，欧图斯。

English: Leave me. <30>I will bring water to Vellie myself.
Translated: 滚吧。<30>我会亲自把水送到维里村的。

English: Otus, you have failed me again<30> and again<30> and again.
Translated: 欧图斯，你一次<30>、一次<30>、又一次地辜负我。

English: Today there are no lessons.
All you need to do today<30><nl>is to talk to the other villagers.
Translated: 今天你要做的就是<30>和其他村民<nl>聊聊天。

English: Simple enough, right?<nl><30>Even for you.
Translated: 够简单吧？<30>即便是对你而言。

English: Have them tell you what they<nl>think of you<30> and your i<2>n<2>e<2>p<2>t<2>i<2>t<2>u<2>d<2>e<10>.
Translated: 让村民说说他们是怎么看你的，<nl><30>以及你有<2>多<2>无<2>能<10>。

English: Don't come back until you<nl>know what you need to know.
Translated: 在你搞清楚村民对你的看法前<nl>不要回来了。

English: <b>[1]Otus!<b>
[1]OTUS!!!
Finally awake,<nl>are you?
We are going to be late!
Good thing I came here to wake you,<nl>or you would have slept for another hour!
Translated: 幸好我到这来叫醒你，不然你<nl>得再睡上一个小时！

English: Get out of bed immediately<nl>and meet me outside.
Translated: 快点起床，我在外边等你。

English: Welcome, Master Otus.
...I wanted to speak with you and Geddy.
I think it is time to<20> discuss a few things.
Translated: 我想是时候该<20>讨论一些事了。

English: ...And<30> I also thought you might<nl>both need someone to talk to.
Translated: ……而且<30>我想你们俩个可能需<nl>要可以倾诉的人。

English: Ah, Master Otus,<30> Master Geddy.
Translated: 啊，欧图斯少爷，<30>格迪少爷。

English: Forgive me for hiding in your home, Otus.
Translated: 原谅我躲在你的房子里，欧图斯。

English: It would do no good if the locals saw<nl>you fraternizing with a former pirate.
Translated: 要是让村民看到你和原海盗有<nl>来往就不好办了。

English: Especially after <30>what has happened.
Translated: 尤其是<30>那件事发生了以后。

English: ...Advent is destroyed,<30> and <30>there<nl>was nothing we could do to stop it.
Translated: ……爱文德城已经毁了，<60>我们<nl>无法阻止灾难的发生。

English: Molstrom, <30>and the pirates, <30><nl>why would they do such a thing?
Translated: 摩斯特罗，<30>和那些海盗，<30>他们<nl>为什么要这样做？

English: Alphonse?.. <30>Is there<nl>something you're not telling us?
Translated: 阿尔冯斯？……<nl><30>你有什么事情瞒着我们吗？

English: ALPHONSE!?
If you know something, <30>ANYTHING,<nl><30>that can aid us against Molstrom..!
Translated: 如果你知道什么，<30>任何<30>能够帮<nl>助我们对抗摩斯特罗的情报……！

English: ...It might help us prevent<nl>yet another attack on <b>Vellie<b>!
Translated: ……也许能帮助我们阻止针对<nl><b>维里村<b>发起的另一次袭击！

English: You are most certainly right, Master Geddy.
Molstrom<15>.<15>.<15>. <60>The pirates<15>.<15>.<15>. <60>And myself.
We were all <15>c<3>r<3>e<3>a<3>t<3>e<3>d <45>by the <b>Owls<b>.
WHAT!?
Your mentor is right, Otus.
Translated: 你的老师是对的，欧图斯。

English: Molstrom is gathering ancient <b>owl relics<b>.
Translated: 摩斯特罗正在收集古老的<b>猫头鹰圣物<b>。

English: And when he gets them all,<nl>he will be unstoppable.
Translated: 等他集齐了所有圣物，就没有<nl>人能阻止得了他了。

English: I will tell you what I know...
Translated: 我会告诉你我所知道的一切……

English: Wait, so... <30>You're saying the pirates<nl>destroyed Advent just to get the relic?
Translated: 等等，所以……<30>你是说，那些<nl>海盗摧毁爱文德城仅仅是为了<nl>得到圣物？

English: Yes, Master Geddy. <30><nl>And now, <30>only <b>one remains<b>.
Translated: 是的，格迪少爷。<nl><30>现在，<30>只剩<b>一件圣物还没被拿到<b>。

English: If he gets the <15>third and <15>final Relic, <nl><30>I'm afraid Molstrom will be unstoppable.
Translated: 如果摩斯特罗拿到了<15>第三件<15>，<nl>也就是最后一件圣物，<30>恐怕谁<nl>都阻止不了他。

English: Is there nothing we can do?
Translated: 我们没办法阻止这件事吗？

English: There is, but...
...I admit I am hesitant.
My suggestion to try to stop the pirates<nl>in Advent put your lives in danger.
Translated: 我在爱文德城提出的阻止海盗<nl>的建议让你们陷入了危机。

English: Perhaps <30>it would be best if we didn't<nl>try to meddle with the pirates anymore.
Translated: 也许<30>我们不再插手海盗的事才<nl>是最好的选择。

English: The pirates are threatening Vellie!<nl><30>We have to try and stop them!
Translated: 海盗们正对维里村虎视眈眈！<nl><30>我们必须阻止他们！

English: What happened in Advent wasn't your fault!
Translated: 在爱文德城发生的事不是你的错！

English: I screwed up most of all! <60>My sole<nl>duty was to protect us from pirates!
Translated: 是我把一切都搞砸了！<60>我唯一<nl>的职责就是保护大家免受海盗<nl>的威胁！

English: If we don't fight back against the pirates,<nl><60>I can't ever make things right!
Translated: 如果我们不去抵抗海盗，<60>那我<nl>所犯的错误就永远无法弥补了！

English: The pirates' next destination<nl>will be a ruin<20> called the <b>Floating Continent<b>.
Translated: 海盗接下来的目标是一处遗迹，<nl><20>那里被称为<b>漂浮大陆<b>。

English: In an ancient owl structure there, the owls<nl>hid the last relic that Molstrom needs.
Translated: 在那里有一座古老的猫头鹰建<nl>筑，猫头鹰把摩斯特罗需要的<nl>最后一件圣物藏在了那里。

English: We must leave Vellie, and fly high up into <b>Strato<b>.
Translated: 我们得先离开维里村，然后飞<nl>入高空的<b>平流区<b>。

English: That is where we will find the Floating Continent.
Translated: 在那里我们就能找到漂浮大陆。

English: Then we should go to <b>Strato<b> now!
Translated: 那么我们现在就出发去<b>平流区<b>吧！

English: It's the only way we can save Vellie.
Translated: 只有这样我们才能拯救维里村。

English: I shall be in hiding here<nl>until you get out of the village.
Translated: 在你们离开村子前我就躲在这里。

English: Alright, Otus, you ready?
Translated: 好的，欧图斯，你收拾好了吗？

English: Let's go!
Otus?
Otus! <30>You're awake!
I'm sorry, Otus...
I should never have left you guys alone.
Translated: 我不该把你们单独留下的。

English: As soon as I got back to Vellie,<nl>I knew I'd made a mistake.
Translated: 我一回到维里村，就意识到自<nl>己犯了个大错。

English: That Twig guy, he was just<nl>being used by the pirates.
Translated: 那个叫特维格的家伙，也只是<nl>被海盗们利用而已。

English: I knew that,<30> but...
I think I wanted someone<nl>to blame<20> after Advent.
Translated: 在爱文德事件发生以后，我下<nl>意识地想要<20>指责某人来发泄。

English: I made my way up to the pirates<nl>and went looking for you straight away.
Translated: 我潜入海盗船后便开始寻找你<nl>的踪影。

English: Stole a pirate chopper and everything.
Translated: 还偷了海盗砍刀和其它东西。

English: I'm glad I made it in time.
Molstrom seemed furious...
Translated: 摩斯特罗看起来很生气……

English: But enough about this.
Twig! <30>Alphonse!<30> Otus is awake!
Translated: 特维格！<30>阿尔冯斯！<30>欧图斯醒了！

English: Get in here!
Welcome back, Otus!
You've been asleep for so long now!
I want to talk about what to do next, guys.
Translated: 我想商量下接下来要怎么办，<nl>伙计们。

English: Otus, <30>Alphonse says he<nl>saw someone fly off with the Relics.
Translated: 欧图斯，<30>阿尔冯斯说他看到有<nl>人拿着圣物飞走了。

English: Indeed. <30>And that someone went flying up <b>past Mesos<b>.
Translated: 没错。<30>那个人飞越了<b>中间区<b>上空。

English: We haven't figured out who took the relics, yet, <30>but.<5>.<5>.
Translated: 我们还没查出是谁拿走了圣<nl>物，<30>但…<5>…<5>。

English: ...But whoever took them must<nl>have been behind all of this.
Translated: ……但不管是谁，那个人肯定<nl>是幕后主使。

English: The pirates were being fed<nl>information about the Relics.
Translated: 他一直透露圣物的消息给海盗。

English: Someone told them to search<nl>in Vellie,<30> and in Advent.
Translated: 告诉他们圣物藏在维里村<30>和<nl>爱文德城。

English: It would seem that whoever led<nl>them to attack these settlements...
Translated: 这么说的话，那个指使海盗<nl>进攻村落的家伙……

English: ...Have now finally gotten the Relics they wanted.
Translated: ……现在终于拿到了他想要的圣物。

English: So the pirates were just being used?
Translated: 所以那些海盗只是被利用了？

English: Serves'em right!
Indeed... But whoever did this must<nl>expect Molstrom to retaliate.
Translated: 没错……但不管是谁设下了这<nl>个圈套，肯定知道这样做会遭<nl>到摩斯特罗的报复。

English: They must be planning to use the Relics soon.
Translated: 他们肯定在计划着尽快使用这些圣物。

English: With the power of the Relics, they<nl>might escape even Molstrom's wrath.
Translated: 有了圣物的力量，就算是怒气<nl>冲冲的摩斯特罗也很难伤到他<nl>们。

English: Is there any way we can get to them before that happens?
Translated: 我们能赶在这事发生前找到他们吗？

English: I don't know...
It's impossible to fly past the Mesosphere.
Translated: 要飞越中间层几乎是不可能的。

English: We would have to find some way to travel up there.
Translated: 我们得找个法子去到那里。

English: With Advent destroyed, finding a ship won't be easy...
Translated: 爱文德城被摧毁后，要找一艘<nl>船可不容易……

English: Well, let's start looking.
Translated: 好吧，那我们从现在开始找吧。

English: There's gotta be some way!
There's one more thing, Otus.
Don't be too disappointed when we get to Vellie.
Translated: 等会到了维里村，你别太沮丧。

English: Things have<20> changed a bit.
You owls sure are hard-workin'!
Translated: 你们猫头鹰真是一群劳模！

English: Strix's students are scurrying about<nl>keeping watch, all the way from <b>Advent<b>...
Translated: 斯吉克斯的学生为了放哨的事<nl>整天奔波在通往<b>爱文德城<b>的路<nl>上……

English: ...And here you are too!
I prefer to relax in my hot spring!
Translated: 我还是更喜欢待在温泉里放松身心！

English: Heheheh!
Yer' turnin' a little red there lad!
I guess you're not as thick skinned as old Toby here.
Translated: 我想你不像老托比这样皮粗肉厚。

English: Even the <b>big-ol pirate capt'n<b><nl>would rust up in these here waters!
Translated: 即使是<b>超级海盗舰长<b>待在这水<nl>里也会生锈的！

English: Yer' not doing bad in this heat lad!
Translated: 小伙，你的耐热功力不错嘛！

English: I guess you might be as thick skinned as old Toby here.
Translated: 我想你可能像老托比一样皮粗肉厚。

English: Even the <b>big-ol pirate capt'n<b><nl>would rust up in these here waters!
Translated: 即使是<b>超级海盗舰长<b>待在这水<nl>里也会生锈的！

English: Heheheh!
With age, you'll endure plenty of hard times lad.
Translated: 随着岁月流逝，你会遇到许多<nl>困难，小伙。

English: You'll get tougher and tougher each day out there!
Translated: 但活着的每一天，都能让你变<nl>得更加坚强！

English: Not me tho'!
I've been in this spring my entire life!
Translated: 因为我的人生都是在温泉里度过的！

English: Heheheh!
What's wrong, Otus?
Did Strix's students do somethin'?
Translated: 斯吉克斯的学生做了什么吗？

English: Don't mind them, Otus!
They're just trying to get you down.
Here, just soak a bit in the hot spring.<nl>That'll make you feel better.
Translated: 过来，到温泉里泡泡。<nl>会让你感觉好点的。

English: That's the way, Otus!
The hot spring won't make yer' troubles go away, but...
Translated: 温泉不能带走你的烦恼，但……

English: ...Everything will pass.
And when we're in here, hard<nl>times don't feel quite as bad.
Translated: 当我们泡在这里的时候，再艰难<nl>的日子也感觉没那么难了。

English: Oh, Mandolyn got mugged?
No? Someone frightened her, then?
Translated: 不是？那是有人吓到她了？

English: Well, maybe you want to<nl>relax here for a while.
Translated: 好吧，也许你只是想在这放松一下。

English: I guess Asio has dragged you<nl>out of town at last, eh Otus?
Translated: 看来艾西欧终于肯让你出村了，<nl>欧图斯？

English: Ah, I remember when I was out exploring the world.
Translated: 啊，我想起我在外边探险的日子。

English: It's been so long...
Translated: 那是很久很久以前的事……

English: Don't forget that you're always welcome in Vellie.
Translated: 别忘了，维里村永远欢迎你。

English: And if you ever need a bath,<nl>feel free to use my hot spring!
Translated: 还有，如果你需要泡澡的话，<nl>随时来我的温泉吧！

English: Otus!
Glad to see you're awake!
Translated: 你能醒过来真是太好了！

English: Geddy's around here somewhere.<nl><40>Probably by the <b>graveyard<b>.
Translated: 格迪就在这附近。<nl><40>可能在<b>墓地<b>那边吧。

English: Oh!<20> I forgot!
There was a big, red, posh guy checking<nl>on you before the others came back.
Translated: 在其他人回来前，有个高大时髦<nl>的红色家伙在打听你的情况。

English: He skedaddled when I came back<nl>to check on you.
Translated: 等我回来看你的时候他就不见了。

English: Someone you know?
Come to rest up in my hot spring?
Translated: 想在我的温泉里休息一下？

English: Oh, Geddy? If he wasn't with you,<nl>he's probably headed to the <b>graveyard<b>.
Translated: 嗯，格迪？如果他没呆在你身边<nl>的话，那应该是去<b>墓地<b>那边了。

English: Found Geddy, have ya?
Good.<30> I'm sure he's hurting like the rest of us.
Translated: 很好。<30>我知道他和我们一样悲伤。

English: We need to take care of each other.
I'm glad you're looking after him.
Translated: 我很高兴有你能照顾他。

English: Want to relax a bit here?
This hot spring takes away old aches.
Translated: 温泉能带走陈年的伤痛。

English: It might help you recover.
Feeling a little down, Otus?
Try soaking in the hot spring for a while.
Can't guarantee it'll help,<nl>but it's something.
Translated: 我不保证一定有用，但总比<nl>什么都不做要好。

English: Back already, Otus?
You're out there explorin' the world, aren't you?
Translated: 你不是在探索外面的世界吗？

English: Aw, how I wish I could go with you!
Translated: 哇，我真希望能跟你一起去！

English: There's nothing like the feeling<nl>of the wind on a new horizon!
Translated: 没有什么能比新地平线上吹来<nl>的风更让人惬意的了！

English: I used to travel all the time!
Ah, I miss those days...
Still, no journey beats soaking in the hot spring!
Translated: 不过，没有哪次旅行比得上在<nl>温泉里泡着！

English: You should persuade some of the<nl>Adventians to try my hot spring.
Translated: 你应该劝说那些爱文德城的人<nl>来试试我的温泉。

English: Can't have'em missing out<nl>on the best part of Vellie!
Translated: 可不能让他们错过维里村中最<nl>棒的地方！

English: You're looking for Geddy, huh?
Sometimes we have to give people time.
Translated: 有时候我们需要给别人一些时间。

English: Everyone's discussing whether<nl>we should stay here or evacuate.
Translated: 所有人都在讨论我们的去留问题。

English: Ya know, before the pirates find us.
Translated: 你知道，这事得在海盗找到我<nl>们前定好。

English: I think I'll join them if they evacuate.
Translated: 我想如果他们撤离的话我应该<nl>会跟着走。

English: I used to travel.
Maybe I'll get to see some more great things.
Translated: 也许我还能看到更多美好的事物。

English: Leave me, Otus.
I don't want to see you here again.
Translated: 我不想再在这里见到你。

English: Despite everything, <30>you have been a remarkable student, Otus.
Translated: 不管别人怎么说，<30>你都是我优<nl>秀的学生，欧图斯。

English: Courage is a trait lost on most Owls.
Translated: 大部分猫头鹰都失去了勇气这<nl>一品质。

English: Vellie has been abandoned.
The pirates are likely to attack here next.
Translated: 海盗们接下来很可能会攻击这里。

English: I'm going to stay here in Vellie.
This is <b>our home<b>.
You're<10>.<10>.<10>. leaving again now..?
I'll wait for you here.
If there's anything I can help you with...
Then let me know.
A way to get beyond the Mesosphere..?
I'm not sure.
Maybe you can ask the Professor.
I don't like to admit it, but...
...He would probably know better than me.
Be careful out there, Otus.
Oh, hi Otus!
Keeping watch today?
I hear there's been a<nl><b>troublemaker<b> lurking about...
Translated: 我听说有个<b>捣乱鬼<b>在附近游荡……

English: I r<5>e<5>a<5>l<5>l<5>y<10> hope it's not a pirate!
Translated: 我<5>真<5>的<10>希望它不是海盗！

English: I've heard so many horror stories about pirates.
Translated: 关于海盗的恐怖故事我可听得多了。

English: There's <15>even rumours of a... <30><b>h<5>u<5>m<5>o<5>n<5>g<5>o<5>u<5>s<b> one!
Translated: 甚至还有<15>传言说有一个……<nl><30><b>非<5>常<5>巨<5>大<b>的海盗！

English: How can their ships stay afloat<nl>if there're pirates like that?
Translated: 如果真有那么大的海盗，那他<nl>们的船为什么还能漂在空中？

English: Haha, but we're safe here in Vellie!
Translated: 哈哈，不过我们在村里还是很安全的！

English: Just... try not to play around too much, right Otus?
Translated: 只要……别在巡逻时经常溜出<nl>去玩，对吧欧图斯？

English: We'll be fine as long as you stay focused!
Translated: 只要你能专心工作，村子就会很安全！

English: Is Geddy working on the cannon today?
Translated: 格迪今天也在修理大炮吗？

English: He seems so responsible after<nl>his military training in <b>Advent<b>!
Translated: 他在<b>爱文德城<b>接受过军事训练<nl>后，就变得非常有责任心了！

English: He's way more confident than he used to be.<nl><30>It's like he's a different person!
Translated: 他比原来自信多了。<30>简直像变了个人！

English: Not that it matters to me, <15>of <15>course.
Translated: 当<15>然<15>，这和我没什么关系。

English: La, la, la!
Oh, how I'd love to perform in <b>Advent<b> one day!
Translated: 哦，我很想有天能在<b>爱文德城<b><nl>进行表演！

English: I hope I can go there soon!<nl>There's so much to see in <b>Advent<b>!
Translated: 我希望我能早点去到那里！<nl><b>爱文德城<b>有太多我想看的东西了！

English: Maybe Asio will take you there too, Otus!
Translated: 可能艾西欧也会带你去，欧图斯！

English: Try to make him proud today!
Translated: 争取今天能让他开心吧！

English: Hey, Otus! <30>I was thinking of making some<nl>pie for the village later on.
Translated: 嗨，欧图斯！<30>我正考虑做一些馅饼，<nl>等下分给村里的人呢。

English: Maybe <30>Geddy would like to come t<10>o<10>o<10>?
Translated: 也许<30>格迪<10>也<10>会来拿一些尝尝？

English: I'll make plenty, just in case! Hee hee!
Translated: 我要多做点的，免得不够分！嘻嘻！

English: I should create a new song!
There's a nice breeze today.
I like my guitar.
La, la, la, la.
Dumdi, dumdi, dum.
Hi, Geddy...<40> and Otus.
Hey, Mandolyn. Seen any troublemakers around?
Translated: 嗨，曼德林。<nl>有在周围看到捣乱鬼吗？

English: No,<20> but I'm glad you're watching out for them.
Translated: 没有，<20>不过我很高兴有人在管<nl>这件事。

English: With Strix's students here,<nl>there are so many owls around!
Translated: 斯吉克斯的学生来这后，周围<nl>多了好多猫头鹰！

English: Yup, but me and Otus here's gonna take<nl>care of any trouble, not those slackers!
Translated: 没错，但我和欧图斯会处理好<nl>麻烦，那些懒鸟可做不到！

English: We're a dream team!
Translated: 我们可是理想中的队伍！

English: I'm glad you're having fun.
Translated: 我很高兴你能玩得这么开心。

English: Just watch out for ginormous pirates now, <15>you <15>hear!
Translated: 别忘了盯紧那个巨型海盗，<15>你<15>听<15>到了吗！

English: Oh, how terribly frightening!
You have to catch that trouble maker!
Translated: 你必须得抓住那个捣乱鬼！

English: Please, Otus!
Please stop that trouble maker!
So you and Geddy will be heading off to <b>Advent<b>?
Translated: 所以你和格迪要去<b>爱文德城<b>吗？

English: Are you going to be OK?
I'm sure you will be!
You're a bit clumsy,<nl>but together you can do it!
Translated: 虽然你有点笨拙，但只要和朋<nl>友齐心协力你就能成功的！

English: I guess Advent won't be safe for a while...
Translated: 我想爱文德城会有好一阵子不<nl>得安宁……

English: I'll have to put off my vacation there.
Translated: 我得推迟去那度假的计划了。

English: Oh, but what am I talking about?
The most important thing is that you two are OK.
Translated: 最重要的是你们俩能平安无事。

English: Do your best so Asio won't get all cranky again!
Translated: 全力做好，别再惹艾西欧发脾气了！

English: Shouldn't you be going, Otus?
Translated: 你不是该出发了吗，欧图斯？

English: Asio is depending on you...
So many people lost their homes...
Translated: 有太多人失去了他们的家园……

English: We have to do our best to<nl>help them settle here in Vellie...
Translated: 我们得尽我们所能帮助他们在<nl>维里村安家……

English: Oh! But you should rest until<nl>you've recovered, Otus!
Translated: 不过在你完全康复前，你应该<nl>好好休息，欧图斯！

English: You still look a little frail.
I... <30>I really hope Geddy is OK.
Translated: 我……<30>我真心希望格迪没事。

English: I've never seen him this... <30>distraught.
Translated: 我从没见过他如此……<30>心烦意乱。

English: Ever since I met him, he's always been the <b>happy guy<b>, you know?
Translated: 从我认识他以来，他一直都是<nl>个<b>开心果<b>，你知道吗？

English: The guy that makes you want to... <30>play a litte melody.
Translated: 他是那种能让你开心到想……<nl><30>唱歌的人。

English: I'm sorry Otus, I'm just a little worrier, <15>ha<15>ha.
Translated: 我很抱歉，欧图斯，我只是有<nl>些担心，<15>哈<15>哈。

English: Hi, Geddy!
Are you and Otus doing okay?
You went through a lot...
Don't worry about us, Mandolyn.
We have to help receive the refugees.
Is there anything we can do to help?
Translated: 有什么事是我们能帮上忙吗？

English: .<5>.<5>.<20>I think the two of you should take some time to recover.
Translated: …<5>…<5>…<20>你们俩应该花时间在身<nl>体恢复上面。

English: Let the rest of us take care of things for a while.
Translated: 这段时间的琐事就交给我们吧。

English: Fly around a bit and take your mind off things!
Translated: 到处飞一飞，别想那么多烦心事！

English: How does that sound?
Oh... Yeah...
You heard her, Otus! Let's explore a bit on our own!
Translated: 你就听她说的，欧图斯！<nl>我们到周围散散心吧！

English: Just relax, you two!
Translated: 你们俩只要想着休息的事就行了！

English: Leave it all to us while you recover!
Translated: 好好休养，其它的就交给我们吧！

English: Geddy!<10> Otus!<10> How are you two?
Translated: 格迪！<10> 欧图斯！<10>你们俩还好吗？

English: You've been away for a while...
Translated: 好一阵子没见到你们了……

English: Are you staying safe?
Translated: 你没做什么危险的事吧？

English: Safe? Umm...
Er... Um...
Of course!
We wouldn't get ourselves into trouble, Mandolyn.
Translated: 我们不会给自己找麻烦的，曼德林。

English: Don't worry about us. The pirates<nl>seem to have left for now.
Translated: 别担心我们。现在海盗都走了。

English: ...Mostly.
Good!
I hope you stay for a while,<10> now that you're here.
Translated: 既然来了，<10>我希望你能在这多待会。

English: Things are getting better here,<nl>now that everyone's settling in.
Translated: 情况正在好转，现在所有人都<nl>安置下来了。

English: Hmmm, I need to figure out what to cook today.
Translated: 嗯，我得想想今天要做什么菜。

English: There are lots of mouths to feed!
Hey Otus.
Um...
Geddy dropped by and picked up<nl>his things, and then he left...
Translated: 格迪过来拿走他的东西，然后<nl>就离开了……

English: Are...<20> are you two,<10> well,<10> OK?
He seemed to be really angry about something...
I'm sure whatever happened,<nl>you did the right thing.
Translated: 我相信不论发生什么，你都会<nl>坚持正确的事。

English: We all know that you always mean well, Otus.
Translated: 我们一直都知道你很善良，欧图斯。

English: Don't worry, Geddy probably<nl>just has some thinking to do.
Translated: 别担心，也许格迪只是有事要办。

English: You two are friends!
Oh, you're looking for a way into Mesos?
Translated: 哦，你们在找去中间区的路？

English: I don't know about that, but Bomboman might!
Translated: 这我不太清楚，但邦伯曼也许知道！

English: His family lives in Mesos.
Hi, little Otus!
Looking for pirates?
I think I seen some.
Saw them west, at <b>lookout point<b>.
Maybe check it out.
Also, <30>there be <b>troublemaker<b> around village.
Translated: 还有，<30>村里出了个<b>捣乱鬼<b>。

English: Is not you, <30>is it?
Somebody is stealing my bongos!
Translated: 总之有谁在偷我的邦戈鼓！

English: Don't be slacking off now!
Translated: 你千万别松懈巡逻的工作！

English: Hm, I think I need new bongos.
Translated: 嗯，我觉得我需要新的邦戈鼓。

English: Maybe I get some in <b>Advent<b>.
Translated: 也许我能在<b>爱文德城<b>找到一些。

English: Big bongos!
Maybe little Otus will go there some day!
Translated: 也许有一天，小欧图斯也会去那里！

English: Life is full of music, Otus.
All you need to do, <30>is stop and listen!
Translated: 你要做的就是<30>驻足倾听！

English: Like so!
That is my original song!
A bombo song!
Don't get distracted by my drums, Otus!
Translated: 别因为我的鼓声分心了，欧图斯！

English: You have job to do!
...Alright, I play my Bombo song again for you.
Translated: ……好吧，让我再次用鼓为你<nl>演奏一曲吧。

English: There you go. Song for you!
Translated: 演奏完毕。这是献给你的歌！

English: Now back to work!
Listen to the beat, Otus man!
Translated: 听听这节奏，欧图斯小伙！

English: Bom bom bom!
Feel the rhythm.
There you go. Song for you!
Translated: 演奏完毕。这是献给你的歌！

English: Otus look sad.
Do something wrong again?
Drum a song to make Otus feel better.
Translated: 让我用鼓演奏一曲让欧图斯开<nl>心起来。

English: There you go. Song for you!
Translated: 演奏完毕。这是献给你的歌！

English: Keep spirits up!
Hurry, little Otus!
Must chase troublemaker!
Bomboman would go, but<nl>can't fly on my own!
Translated: 邦伯曼想去追，但我不会飞！

English: Counting on you!
Mmmm...
You going to Advent now?
Translated: 你现在准备去爱文德城？

English: Bom bom bom!
Remember, Asio is harsh, but he means well.
Translated: 你要知道，虽然艾西欧很严厉，<nl>但他本意是好的。

English: You two will stop the pirates,<nl>Bomboman knows it.
Translated: 你们会成功阻止海盗的，<nl>邦伯曼相信你俩。

English: Then Vellie will be safe.
Translated: 然后维里村就会迎来和平。

English: So little Otus is going to Advent...
Translated: 那么小的欧图斯要去爱文德城……

English: I'll play song for good luck!
Translated: 听我演奏一曲好运之歌！

English: There you go!
Hm... Maybe I should make new one soon.
Translated: 嗯……也许我该创作新的歌曲。

English: Glad to see you safe, little Otus.
Translated: 真高兴你能平安无事，小欧图斯。

English: Heard you were very brave in Advent.
Translated: 听说你在爱文德城的表现得非常<nl>勇敢。

English: Don't push yourself too hard.
We must all help out now.
Must build new houses for refugees.<nl>Then keep Vellie safe.
Translated: 得为难民修建新的房子。<nl>还得保证维里村的安全。

English: If pirates come here,<nl>we must be ready.
Translated: 我们必须做好抵御海盗的准备。

English: I play song to keep spirits up!
Translated: 听我演奏一曲来振作精神吧！

English: There you go. Song for morale!
Translated: 演奏完毕！这是士气之歌！

English: Hmm... Must find new song to play.
Translated: 嗯……得找首新歌来演奏了。

English: More cheerful one!
Little Otus is doing his best to help too.
Translated: 小欧图斯也在尽全力帮忙。

English: Bomboman knows.
You didn't get those bruises from playing.
Translated: 你身上的伤可不是玩闹时弄出来的。

English: Just stay safe, you hear?
Bomboman can't protect you outside Vellie.
Translated: 出了维里村，邦伯曼就无法保护你了。

English: Let me play my song for you again.
Translated: 让我再为你演奏一曲吧。

English: Good luck, little Otus.
Geddy didn't look happy<nl>when he dropped by, Otus.
Translated: 格迪路过时看起来有些沮丧，欧图斯。

English: Hope you didn't do something bad.
Friends are important.
Don't lose them.
You going to Mesos?
That's where I grew up.
Some hidden tunnels lead up there.
Translated: 有条隐藏道路可以通往那里。

English: You should find them in<nl>the east of the Tropos layer.
Translated: 你可以在对流层的东部找到它们。

English: I play a song to guide you!
Translated: 听我演奏一曲来指引你！

English: There you go! Song for guidence.
Translated: 演奏完毕！这是指引之歌。

English: Confound it! <30>I can't make sense of it!
Translated: 好奇怪！<30>我搞不懂事情的逻辑！

English: The only thing the pirates seems to have<nl>disturbed here in Vellie <30>is this ruin.
Translated: 海盗在维里村只摧毁了这座废墟。

English: They destroyed <b>Advent<b> in minutes.
Translated: 他们只用几分钟就摧毁了<b>爱文德城<b>。

English: If only our plan had worked, <nl><30>the pirates would have been stopped.
Translated: 如果我们的计划生效，<30>那些海盗<nl>应该是被阻止了才对。

English: Geddy says the wind machinery was never even active.
Translated: 但格迪说风力机器从来没有启动过。

English: Then, <45>how come the islands are still shifting<30>.<30>.<30>?
No matter, <30>the pirate threat is far greater!
Translated: 不管了，<30>海盗的威胁比这个<nl>问题严重多了！

English: There must have been something<nl>inside this ruin that the pirates wanted.
Translated: 废墟中肯定有海盗想要的东西。

English: That stubborn old fool Asio knows<nl>something, <30>but he won't tell me.
Translated: 那个老顽固艾西欧肯定知道些<nl>什么，<30>但他不愿意告诉我。

English: Could it have been some<nl>powerful old owl artifact?
Translated: 那会不会是什么威力巨大的古<nl>老猫头鹰制品？

English: Why won't Asio just cooperate?!
Translated: 为什么艾西欧就是不愿意合作呢？！

English: The pirates didn't come here<nl>to destroy Vellie, that's for sure.
Translated: 海盗来这里的目的不是为了摧<nl>毁维里村，这点是肯定的。

English: The only thing they destroyed was this ruin.
Translated: 他们摧毁的东西只有这座废墟。

English: The owls used to make all kinds<nl>of stuff so advanced I can't comprehend it.
Translated: 猫头鹰总能制造出各种先进到<nl>我无法理解的东西。

English: Whatever was in here, it was important<nl>enough that they prioritized coming<nl>here over going to Advent...
Translated: 不管那里面有什么，都重要到<nl>让他们去爱文德城前，先过来<nl>这边……

English: Confound it! I can't make sense of it!
Translated: 好奇怪！我搞不懂事情的逻辑！

English: The only thing the pirates seems to have<nl>disturbed in Vellie is this ruin.
Translated: 海盗在维里村只摧毁了这座废墟。

English: Yet... <30>They destroyed <b>Advent<b> in minutes.
Translated: 但……<30>他们只用几分钟就摧毁了<b>爱文德城<b>。

English: Asio was saying something about<nl><b>relics<b>. He said there was one in Vellie<nl>and one in Advent.
Translated: 艾西欧说过一些关于<b>圣物<b>的事。<nl>他说有其中一件圣物藏在维里村，<nl>另一件藏在爱文德城。

English: Does that mean anything to you?
Relics..?
I don't know what he means by that.
Translated: 我不知道他所说的意思。

English: But it's as I thought!
He knows something!
If only our plan had worked, <30><nl>the pirates would have been stopped.
Translated: 如果我们的计划生效，<30>那些海盗<nl>应该是被阻止了才对。

English: You say the wind machinery was never active?
Translated: 你说风力机器从没启动过？

English: Then, <45>how come the islands are still shifting<30>.<30>.<30>.
Professor, <30>don't you think the pirate threat is more pressing?
Translated: 教授，<30>你不觉得海盗的威胁比<nl>这个问题更紧迫吗？

English: Yes, yes, <30>of course, Geddy.
Let me know if you discover anything else.
Translated: 如果你还发现其它事情，就来告诉我。

English: I'll stay here and keep researching.
Translated: 我会继续待在这里调查的。

English: Let me know if you discover anything else.
Translated: 如果你还发现其它事情，就来告诉我。

English: I'll stay here and keep researching.
Translated: 我会继续待在这里调查的。

English: Remember to say goodbye to everyone, Otus.
Translated: 记得跟大家说再见，欧图斯。

English: This will be dangerous, and...
...You probably won't be back for a while.
Translated: ……你可能会有一段时间都回不来。

English: I suppose I should bid you farewell, too.
Translated: 我想我也该跟你道个别。

English: We all know that you've been trying<nl>your best all this time, Otus.
Translated: 我们都知道你一直在付出自己<nl>最大的努力，欧图斯。

English: I hope this time it goes well for you.
Translated: 希望这次你能顺顺利利。

English: With how things are looking, we might<nl>not have all that much time left.
Translated: 就目前形势看来，我们可能没<nl>有多少时间了。

English: ...Good luck, Otus.
Don't go until you're ready.
Get out of our way, Otus!
Can't you see we're doing<nl>important business here!?
Translated: 你没看到我们在做很重要的工<nl>作吗！？

English: Gah, Otus, you're cramping my style!
Translated: 哼，欧图斯，你让我感到很不<nl>自在！

English: Get, go on, get outta here!
Get out of our way, Otus!
Can't you see we're doing<nl>important business here!?
Translated: 你没看到我们在做很重要的工<nl>作吗！？

English: Gah, Otus, you're cramping my style!
Translated: 哼，欧图斯，你让我感到很不<nl>自在！！

English: Get, go on, get outta here!
Hey man! Keeping watch today?
Translated: 嗨，伙计！今天是你负责巡逻吗？

English: Maybe you want to do something later?
Translated: 你等会想不想做点什么？

English: <b>Otus and Geddy, <30>the unstoppable team<b>!
Maybe we should take that<nl>trip to <b>Advent<b> today!
Translated: 也许今天我们该出发去<b>爱文德城<b>！

English: Lemme know when you're done for the day!
Translated: 等你忙完了就过来叫我！

English: I'll be here fixing this cannon.<nl>Gotta be prepared for anything, right?
Translated: 我会待在这里修理大炮。<nl>要做好万无一失的准备，对吧？

English: Oh, <30>by the way!
There seems to be a <30><b>troublemaker<b> <30>around Vellie.
Translated: 在<30>维里村周围似乎出现了<30><b>捣乱鬼<b>。

English: Well, if you see that rascal,<nl>come get me, <30>alright?
Translated: 记得，要是你看到了那个无赖，<nl>就来告诉我，<30>好吗？

English: Otus and Geddy, <30><b>keepers of peace<b>!
Translated: 欧图斯和格迪，<30><b>和平的卫队<b>！

English: I think I like the ring of that better!
Translated: 我觉得这个口号更适合我们！

English: OK, <30>s<5>o<5>o<5>n<5> done here Otus!
Translated: 好了，这里<30>马<5>上<5>就弄好了，欧图斯！

English: I can't wait to go to <b>Advent<b>!<nl>I should totally shop for a new blaster pistol!
Translated: 我等不及要去<b>爱文德城<b>了！<nl>我要整天都泡在买新爆弹枪的事上！

English: I'll let you know once I'm done here, OK?
Translated: 等我做完工作就过去找你，好吗？

English: Haha, <30>you're persistent, aren't you?
Translated: 哈哈，<30>你可真够黏人的，不是吗？

English: Alright, alright! <30>Just do your rounds and then we'll go!
Translated: 好啦，好啦！<30>你快点把巡逻的<nl>工作做完，之后我们就出发！

English: If we're quick, maybe we could catch<nl>the theatre while we're in <b>Advent<b>!
Translated: 如果我们快点做完的话，也许<nl>还能赶上<b>爱文德城<b>的戏剧演出呢！

English: Any second now!
Just a little bit more.
I like my hammer.
I like fixing stuff.
Otus, come back later! Asio might get mad!
Translated: 欧图斯，你等会再过来！<nl>不然艾西欧会生气的！

English: Worky, worky!
La, la, la, la.
Shoo Otus, I gotta concentrate!
Translated: 嘘，欧图斯，我需要集中精神！

English: Soon done here!
Leaving town, eh?
Try not to cause any trouble.
You've caused enough of that<nl>here, wouldn't you agree?
Translated: 你在村里闯的就够多了，你说对吧？

English: Heheh!
That's right!
What's up, Solus?
Going to patrol for pirates today?
Translated: 你今天不是去巡视海盗了吗？

English: Or are you going to run away if you see anything?
Translated: 难道是发现事情不对就逃掉了？

English: Hahaha!
Hahaha!
Umph!
Look at this guy,<30> he can't<nl>even stay on his feet!
Translated: 瞧这家伙，<30>他连站都站不稳！

English: YOU BRATS AGAIN!?
Are you OK, man?
T-Thank you.
You're one of Strix's students?<nl><30>I haven't met you before.
Translated: 你是斯吉克斯的学生吗？<nl><30>我之前从没见过你。

English: A-Ah. Yes.
B-Bonacci and Fib are my c-classmates.
Translated: 博、博纳奇和菲本是我的同、同学。

English: Your name's Solus?
Listen, they were having a go<nl>at Otus here earlier too.
Translated: 听着，他们之前也这样欺负欧图斯。

English: If they give you any trouble,<nl>just yell for us.
Translated: 如果他们还找你麻烦，就大声<nl>叫我们。

English: T-Thanks, you g-guys!
T-They're right though,<40> I'm a c-c-coward.
Translated: 他、他们也没做什么过分的事，<nl><40>只是我太懦、懦、懦弱而已。

English: Don't say stuff like that about yourself, man.
Listen, why don't we-
[1]EEEEK!!!
[1]Someone! [1]Help!
<b>Mandolyn<b>!!!
Oh no! It's the <b>troublemaker<b>!
Quick Solus, call for help!<nl>Me and Otus will chase him down!
Translated: 快，索鲁思，快叫帮手来！<nl>我和欧图斯会负责追上他的！

English: Otus, pick me up, and <b>let's go<b>!
Translated: 欧图斯，带上我<b>一起飞吧<b>！

English: G<30>-Good luck!
Urk!
Don't do that again, please.
I haven't slept properly since<nl>before the pirate attack.
Translated: 从海盗袭击开始，我就一直没<nl>睡好觉。

English: I wish I had a bed.
Oh yeah, if you see my daughter,<nl>tell her dinner will be late...
Translated: 哦对了，如果你看到我女儿，<nl>告诉她晚饭要迟一些……

English: That's if she finds her way back at all.
Man, I wish that guy would stop<nl>playing the drums all the time.
Translated: 天啊，我希望那家伙不要整天<nl>拍他的鼓。

English: I haven't been kept awake this much since...
Translated: 我好久都没这样一直醒着了，自从……

English: ...<20>Well, ever since I had Pipp<nl>I guess haven't slept much.
Translated: ……<20>好吧，自从有了皮普后，<nl>我好像睡得都不多。

English: At least in Advent I could<nl>catch up on sleep at work...
Translated: 但至少在爱文德城的时候我还<nl>能在工作时打个盹。

English: Oh yeah, you seem like a nice kid,<nl>so maybe I can ask you a favour.
Translated: 对了，你看起来是个好孩子，<nl>也许我能请你帮个忙。

English: Could you please not wake me up when I'm sleeping?
Translated: 能请你不要在我睡觉的时候吵醒我吗？

English: Thanks.
So...
You woke me up again.
I guess you're not a nice kid after all.
Translated: 我想你根本就不是个好孩子。

English: Don't take it personally.
It just means you're like everyone else.
Translated: 我是说在座的各位都是坏孩子。

English: Still here?
Please stop waking me up.
Your friend ran off, huh?
Well, I don't know either<nl>of you too well, but...
Translated: 好吧，我跟你们两个都不熟，<nl>不过……

English: Maybe it's for the best, you know?
Translated: 这或许对大家都好，懂吗？

English: I mean, most people are pretty annoying.
Translated: 我的意思是，大多数人都很烦人。

English: Now you can get some peace.
A way into the pirate base?
I don't know, I've lived<nl>in Advent my entire life.
Translated: 我不知道，我这辈子都住在爱<nl>文德城。

English: Ask someone else.
My beautiful house in Advent is lost...
Translated: 我在爱文德城的漂亮房子被毁了……

English: My aviary, and my paintings...
Translated: 还有我的鸟窝，和我的画……

English: Only I and Chirpy made it out!
Translated: 只有我和喳喳灰逃了出来！

English: My relatives said they'd escape eastward.
Translated: 我亲戚说他们会往东面逃跑。

English: I hope they made it out before<nl>the pirate captain appeared...
Translated: 我希望他们能在海盗舰长出现<nl>前跑掉……

English: Oh, Chirpy...
Will we ever get out of this hopeless little village..?
Translated: 我们还有从这个绝望的小村庄<nl>离开的一天吗……？

English: I <30>miss Advent so much<5>.<5>.<5>.
We need to evacuate this<nl>shoddy little town at once!
Translated: 我们必须快点撤离这个破烂的小镇！

English: All this talk of rebuilding is nonsense!
Translated: 重建计划全都是无稽之谈！

English: We need to get as far away<nl>from the pirates as we can!
Translated: 我们要走得远远的，离那些海盗<nl>越远越好！

English: Hmm...
Oh, I don't believe we've met.
Forgive me, I have to make<nl>sure I don't miss any shipments.
Translated: 请见谅，我得保证任何一批货物<nl>都没有被错过。

English: I'm grateful that I have<nl>been allowed to stay in Vellie.
Translated: 我很高兴自己能被允许留在维里村。

English: We'll have to do our best to help the village grow.
Translated: 我们都得尽全力来重建村子。

English: We only have enough supplies<nl>for about a week or so...
Translated: 我们的补给只够维持一周……

English: We'll either have to plant<nl>new crops or evacuate...
Translated: 我们需要种些新庄稼，否则就得<nl>离开这里……

English: I think my work might go faster if I<nl>didn't have this big owl shouting at me.
Translated: 我想要是没有这只大猫头鹰冲我<nl>大叫，我的效率应该会更高。

English: But I don't want to create any conflict.
Translated: 但我不想引起任何矛盾。

English: Perhaps I should just pretend to listen when he speaks..?
Translated: 也许我该假装在听他讲话……？

English: Some distressed fellow went by here.
Translated: 一个愁容满面的家伙刚从这走过。

English: He had the same uniform as the city guards.
Translated: 他穿的制服和城市的守卫一样。

English: Friend of yours?
I hope you two figure it out.
Translated: 我希望你俩能消除误会。

English: Friendships can be tricky things.
Translated: 维护友谊可不是一件简单的事情。

English: Evacuate or stay..?
But where would we evacuate to..?
Oh, excuse me, I was lost in thought.
Translated: 哦，抱歉，我想得太入神了。

English: A way into the pirate base, hmm?
Well, there are some<nl>unexplored paths in Tropos...
Translated: 确实，在对流区有一些没人走过<nl>的小道……

English: Perhaps that would be a good place to start looking?
Translated: 也许从那开始寻找是个好方法？

English: Otus! You're awake!
I'm so happy you're OK!
Translated: 我真高兴你能平安无恙！

English: You were all beaten up when I found you!
Translated: 我找到你时你浑身都是伤！

English: Oh, this is all so horrible!
Those poor people from Advent! <30>We're<nl>taking as many refugees as we can.
Translated: 那些从爱文德城来的可怜难民！<nl><30>我们都尽可能收容了。

English: And luckily, the Owls from Advent are here as well.<30><nl><b>Strix<b> and his students are doing a really good job!
Translated: 而且幸运的是，爱文德城的猫<nl>头鹰也都来了。<30><b>斯吉克斯<b>和他<nl>的学生都做得很好！

English: We're all doing what we can,<30> but,<30> well...
Translated: 我们都在做力所能及的事，<nl><30>但是，<30>嗯……

English: ...Asio is out by the lookout point, <30>it's just...
Translated: ……艾西欧在外围的瞭望台待<nl>着，<30>只不过……

English: He's been there for days, <30>and<30><nl>he doesn't speak to anyone.
Translated: 他在那里已经好几天了，<30>也<30>不<nl>跟人说话。

English: Maybe <20>he'll talk to you, Otus?
Translated: 也许<20>他会对你开口，欧图斯？

English: Would you mind checking up on him out there?
At this rate, I worry he might<nl>end up leaving the village.
Translated: 照这样下去，我担心他最终会<nl>离开村子。

English: Oh.
I guess<45> our village has one of those now.
Translated: 我想<45>我们的村子现在有那样一个地方。

English: We've located it below the village, down there.
Translated: 位置大概在村子下方，从那边往下走。

English: Oh Otus,<15> it's as if the village<nl>has lost all its colours<30> and brightness.
Translated: 哦，欧图斯，<15>整个村子的氛围<nl>都变得<30>死气沉沉。

English: I hope everything will turn out alright.
Translated: 我希望所有事情都能好转。

English: Hi, bro!
My name is Pipp!
What's your name?
Can't talk, huh?
That's fine!
I'll just call you <b>bro<b>!
Owl bro!
Nice to meet you, owl bro!
Translated: 很高兴见到你，猫头鹰大哥！

English: Hi, bro!
I wish I could fly like you!
Translated: 我希望我能像你一样会飞！

English: I would fly everywhere!
Translated: 那样我就能飞到世界各地！

English: WHOOOOSH!!!
My mom wanted me to come eat dinner?
Hmmmm...
NAH!
I want to stay outside, bro!
I'll go home when it's bedtime!
Translated: 等到睡觉的时候我就会回家的！

English: Maybe a bit after bedtime!
Translated: 可能会比睡觉时间更晚一点！

English: Hi!
Hmm..!
I guess I'll call you<nl>bro<30>.<10>.<10>. and big bro!
Translated: 我想我可以叫你们大哥<30>…<10>…<10>…<nl>和大大哥！

English: My name is Pipp!
Hi, bro... and big bro!
Are you both out doing grown-up stuff?
Translated: 你们正在外面做大人才能做的事？

English: Don't worry!
I'll build all the new houses on my own!
Translated: 我会靠自己建起所有新房子的！

English: My mom wanted me to come eat dinner?
Hmmmm...
NAH!
I want to stay outside, bro!
I'll go home when it's bedtime!
Translated: 等到睡觉的时候我就会回家的！

English: Maybe a bit after bedtime!
Translated: 可能会比睡觉时间更晚一点！

English: Hey, bro!
Where's big bro?!
Did you annoy him until he left?
Translated: 是不是你惹烦他了，他才走的？

English: Don't worry, bro!
I do that to my mom all the time!
It's the best!
Cheer up, bro!
You can fly, after all!
That's incredible!
Big bro's back, huh?
Guess I'm no longer your only best friend!
Translated: 看来我不能独占你最佳好友位了！

English: Shared first place!
Translated: 我们要共享最佳好友位！

English: I'm glad we made it back.
Translated: 我们能安全回来真是太好了。

English: I'll hide before the villagers see me.
Translated: 我得在村民看到我前藏起来。

English: No... wait...
...Where is everyone?
Hi there, boy.
The counterattack on the<nl>pirates didn't go so well, huh?
Translated: 反击海盗的任务不太顺利，是吧？

English: I suppose I'm to blame for that as well.
Don't beat yourself up over it. We<nl>have to think about the future now.
Translated: 别责备自己了。现在我们都该<nl>想想未来的事。

English: Everyone is talking about leaving<nl>Vellie to hide from the pirates.
Translated: 大家都在讨论要不要离开维里<nl>村来躲避海盗。

English: They think they'll attack here next.
Translated: 他们都觉得海盗接下来会攻击<nl>这里。

English: In my opinion the only way to escape is upwards.
Translated: 在我看来唯一能逃离的地方只<nl>有上面。

English: You'll see what I mean when I<nl>finish my work on this building.
Translated: 等我完成这栋建筑后，你就会<nl>明白我的意思。

English: Excuse me, boy, I'm thinking very intently about something.
Translated: 不好意思，男孩，我正在集中<nl>精神思考事情。

English: And when I do...<30> I DON'T WANT ANY DISTRACTIONS.
Translated: 而当我思考的时候……<30>我不希望<nl>有任何干扰。

English: AT ALL.
I hope you understand.
If a task doesn't require focus, it's<nl>not worth doing, in my opinion.
Translated: 要是一项任务不需要你全神贯注，<nl>那在我看来它是不值得做的。

English: ...Hmmm...
Heh heh! I'm nearly done with this building.
Translated: 嘿嘿！我就要完成这栋建筑了。

English: You don't see what's different about it, do you?
Translated: 你看不出有什么变化，是吗？

English: Well, art isn't always so easily visible.
Translated: 也对，艺术从来都不是看外表的。

English: Heh heh heh!
So, here we are.
Remember, there will be no going back.
Translated: 记住，出发后就不能回头了。

English: Are you sure you're ready for this, Otus?
Translated: 你确定准备好了吗，欧图斯？

English: Good!
Excuse us.
We would all like to come along, Madam Kernelle.
Translated: 我们想一起去，科内尔女士。

English: That's right!
Otus's friends, are you?
Translated: 你们是欧图斯的朋友吗？

English: Wait a second...
Aren't you-
Not now, Professor!
Translated: 现在不是谈这个的时候，教授！

English: Alphonse is a pirate, and<nl>I caused some trouble here.
Translated: 阿尔冯斯确实是海盗，我也在<nl>这闯过祸。

English: But we're here to help now.
Translated: 不过现在我们都是来帮忙的。

English: Yes yes, no need for that.
You're all welcome to come along.
We're all here, so let's get going!
Translated: 既然人到齐了，那就出发吧！

English: Yes.
Huh?<30> What are we travelling in?
Oh, you'll see.
Professor, is everything ready?
Translated: 教授，事情都准备好了吗？

English: Yes.
The radar gave us some coordinates<nl>to aim for, so we should make it.
Translated: 雷达给我们定位了一些坐标，<nl>应该不会有问题。

English: Assuming your invention works, Kernelle.
Translated: 前提是你的发明能正常运行，科内尔。

English: Excellent.
Oh, I should probably repeat...
This will be dangerous.
Should we go get Asio and the other villagers?
Translated: 我们要不要把艾西欧和其他村民叫来？

English: Then they can see you off.
I don't think so.
They might try to stop us.
Translated: 他们很可能会阻止我们。

English: I don't think we want to part on bad terms.
Translated: 我不想以这样的方式分别。

English: ...Alright.
In that case, it's time to board.
...Board? Board what?
Do you mean this tall building here..?
Translated: 你不会是说这栋高楼吧……？

English: Yes!
Get in!
We're travelling in this thing?
It looks like it can't even move!
Translated: 它看起来不像是会动的样子！

English: QUIET, FOOLS!
YOU ARE ABOUT TO WITNESS MY TRUE GENIUS!
Translated: 你们即将见证我真正的才华！

English: YEARS OF WORK WILL ALL BOIL DOWN TO THIS MOMENT!
Translated: 多年的努力全都凝聚在此刻！

English: GET IN!
Better do it lads,<30> before she changes her mind.
Translated: 最好照做，小伙子，<nl><30>趁她还没变改主意。

English: QUICKLY NOW!
Heheheh..!
IT IS TIME!
PREPARE YOURSELVES!
ALL SYSTEMS ARE READY!
DETACH!
IGNITION!!!
LIFTOFF!
HAHA!
I KNEW IT WOULD WORK!
GOOD LUCK, YOU GUYS!
Alright.
Let me know when you're prepared.
Translated: 等你们准备好了就告诉我吧。

English: D-<20>d-<30>don't come any closer, <40>pirate!
Leave us alone!
GO AWAY, PIRATE!
Ah, Otus!
It is good to see you have come to!
As you can see, we are trying to cope with the<nl>poor state your <b>mentor<b> has left this village in.
Translated: 如你所见，我们正处理你<b>老师<b><nl>在这村子留下的烂摊子。

English: We never allowed such <30>incompetence <15>in Advent!
Translated: 我们<15>在爱文德城工作时可不允<nl>许如此<30>不称职！

English: But fret not, little one!
With our guidance, we may<nl>get your village up to snuff yet.
Translated: 有了我们的指导，你的村庄会<nl>走上正轨。

English: My students <15><b>Fib<b> and <15><b>Bonacci<b> <15>are highly trained in goods transport.
Translated: 我的学生<15><b>菲本<b>和<15><b>博纳奇<b><15>在运输<nl>方面受过高等教育。

English: Being <b>Asio's<b> student, I won't burden you<nl>with high priority tasks like transport, <30>Otus.
Translated: 因为你是<b>艾西欧<b>的学生，我不<nl>会用运输货物这种高优先级的<nl>任务来为难你的，<30>欧图斯。

English: If there are any easy requests from your<nl>villagers, you may deal with them as you wish.
Translated: 如果你的同乡有什么简单的要<nl>求，你就去帮助他们吧。

English: I'm sorry, Otus, I am rather busy at the moment.
Translated: 不好意思，欧图斯，我现在很忙。

English: Being <b>Asio's<b> student, I won't burden you with high priority tasks, <30>Otus.
Translated: 因为你是<b>艾西欧<b>的学生，我不<nl>会用高优先级的任务来为难你<nl>的，<30>欧图斯。

English: If there are any easy requests from your<nl>villagers, you may deal with them as you wish.
Translated: 如果你的同乡有什么简单的要<nl>求，你就去帮助他们吧。

English: Oh! You're back, Otus!
No need to look so guilty.
Translated: 别摆出那么内疚的样子。

English: In fact, from what I hear about you,<nl>it makes things simpler if you, er...
Translated: 其实，我已经听说了你的事，<nl>看来要让事情变简单，只要，<nl>呃……

English: ...If you find something to occupy yourself with.
When things have cleared up a bit here,<nl>I'll give you some proper instruction.
Translated: 等这里的形势明朗后，我会好<nl>好地指导你的。

English: In the meantime,<10> do as you please.
Translated: 这段时间，<10>你就做你想做的事吧。

English: I have little time to talk, Otus.
Translated: 我没时间多说了，欧图斯。

English: Just do what you want.
...Can't believe it...
I wonder what the pirates are up to now.
Translated: 我想知道海盗们现在又在谋划什么。

English: I hope they'll just leave us alone from now on.
Translated: 我希望他们以后都别来找我们麻烦。

English: We should evacuate this city.
Translated: 我们应该从这座城市撤离。

English: We need to get as far away<nl>from the pirates as possible.
Translated: 我们要尽可能地远离那些海盗。

English: I don't feel safe here.
Translated: 我在这里感觉不到安全。

English: Hello...
...Sorry, I would like to be left alone.
Looking for someone?
A guy walked through here earlier,<nl>with the same uniform as us.
Translated: 之前有个穿着和我们一样制服<nl>的人从这里走过。

English: He left Vellie again though.
Translated: 不过他又离开维里村了。

English: Don't know where he went.
I think I should leave too.
I don't belong here, and we can't<nl>defend this little city anyway.
Translated: 我本来就不属于这里，而且我<nl>们无法保护这座小城市。

English: This way: Vellie Outpost
This way: Professor's lab
Translated: 此路通往：教授的实验室

English: This way: Vellie
This way: Shooting Range<nl>Closed for testing.
Translated: 此路通往：射击场<nl>内测中，暂不开放。

English: Everyone!<15><nl>Quiet down!
Is everyone alright?
Everyone's okay.
Strix's students went to track the pirates.
Translated: 斯吉克斯的学生去跟踪海盗了。

English: ...<30>I don't think the pirates were here for us.
Translated: ……<30>我不认为海盗是冲我们来的。

English: Then, <30>why did pirates even come here?
Translated: 那，<30>海盗们为什么要来这？

English: Listen, all of you. We have no time for this.
Translated: 听着，各位。我们没时间了。

English: My readings show that the pirates<nl>are heading toward the capital.
Translated: 根据我的仪器显示，那些海盗<nl>正朝着首都移动。

English: They're going to attack Advent?!
Yes. We need to warn the city, and quickly.
Translated: 没错。我们得快点警告城里的人。

English: The pirate ships are slow, but they have a head start on us.
Translated: 海盗船虽然飞得慢，但比我们<nl>出发得早。

English: In that case, there's no choice. Professor, we'll have<nl>to use the <b>Owl temple<b> as a <b>defence mechanism<b>.
Translated: 既然如此，我们也没有别的选择了。<nl>教授，我们必须利用<b>猫头鹰神殿<b>作<nl>为<b>防御手段<b>。

English: Ah yes!
The Owl temple has been blowing the<nl>islands in the area apart for decades.
Translated: 数十年来，猫头鹰神殿都在把<nl>这个地区的岛屿向四周吹开。

English: If we deactivate the wind generators, the islands<nl>will close in on the pirates<5>.<5>.<5>.<20> and [1]<b>crush them<b>!
Translated: 如果我们停用风力生成机，那<nl>岛屿就会靠近海盗船<5>…<5>…<5>…<20>然<nl>后[1]<b>撞毁他们<b>！

English: (Or so I think...)
So perhaps the ancient Owls<nl>can help us protect Advent...
Translated: 那个老古董猫头鹰也许能够帮<nl>助我们保护爱文德城……

English: Otus!
You will go to the Owl temple.
The Professor and I need to go directly to Advent to warn them.
Translated: 教授和我直接到爱文德城警告那里的人。

English: ...And no-one else here can fly.
Translated: ……毕竟这里除了你没人会飞了。

English: But does Otus know his way around the temple?
Translated: 但欧图斯知道去神殿的路吗？

English: That's right!<20> I should join him, Asio!
Translated: 的确！<20>那我和他一起去，艾西欧！

English: Alright.
Be warned, Otus.
...If you disappoint me again, there will be S<2>E<2>R<2>I<2>O<2>U<2>S<2> C<2>O<2>N<2>S<2>E<2>Q<2>U<2>E<2>N<2>C<2>E<2>S<2>!
Translated: ……如果你再让我失望的话，<nl>后<2>果<2>将<2>会<2>很<2>严<2>重<2>！

English: You put our village in danger by leaving your post today.
Translated: 你今天擅离岗位，让我们的村<nl>子陷入了危机。

English: Do not do it again.
Otus, Geddy, Professor.<30><nl>Get ready to leave.
Translated: 欧图斯、格迪、教授，<30>准备出发吧。

English: Get to the <b>Owl Temple<b> as quickly as you can!
Translated: 用最快的速度赶往<b>猫头鹰神殿<b>！

English: Don't disappoint me, <15>Otus!
Guards! <30><b>Open the gates<b>!
Finally, the gate is open!<nl><30>Let's get out of here Otus!
Translated: 门终于开了！<nl><30>我们从这出去吧，欧图斯！

English: This sauna here sure's nice!<nl>I come here on weekends.<nl>Weekdays too!
Translated: 这里的桑拿真棒！我休息日会来！<nl>工作日也会来！

English: I rub my face with Bomboman's<nl>ointments every day! It keeps ya young!<nl>Wish it kept me young too!
Translated: 我每天都用邦伯曼的药膏擦脸！<nl>它能让你保持年轻！<nl>希望它也能让我保持年轻！

English: I've forgotten where I live!
I remember the day you was born!<nl>Heard all about it right<nl>here in this very hot spring!
Translated: 我记得你出生的那天！<nl>我就是在温泉收到消息的！

English: You set any records in your life?<nl>I'm trying for the record in relaxation!
Translated: 你的人生有创造过什么记录吗？<nl>我正尝试创造放松的记录！

English: At times like these, it's important to relax.
Translated: 像这种日子，学会放松是很重要的！

English: Clear your mind, young'un. These are dark times.
Translated: 净化心灵，年轻人。现在是黑暗的时代。

English: We have to do what we can, Otus.<nl>We have to calm down, and then do what we can.
Translated: 我们必须做力所能及的事，欧图斯。<nl>我们得静下心来，然后尽力而为。

English: If I'm talking to you right now, it's<nl>a bug. Well done! Please report it.
Translated: 如果我现在正跟你讲话，那就<nl>是个游戏异常。干得好！请告<nl>诉我们吧！

English: We're in danger, laddy!<nl>Get your things and escape while you can!
Translated: 我们有危险了，伙计！<nl>趁还有时间，收拾包袱跑吧！

English: This is not the time for<nl>sauna-bathin', laddy! Get to safety!
Translated: 现在可不是泡桑拿浴的时候，伙计！<nl>赶紧到安全的地方去吧！

English: Is Bomboman alright there?<nl>Was he inside the house?
Translated: 邦伯曼还好吗？他是不是在屋子里？

English: Don't mind me, boy, save yourself!
Translated: 别担心我，男孩，保护好自己！

English: Run! Run while you still can!
About time, Otus.
We will be keeping watch over Vellie today.
Translated: 今天由我们来负责维里村的巡<nl>逻任务。

English: There have been pirates about lately.<nl>You know the drill - <b>report to me or the guards<b><nl>if you see anything suspicious.
Translated: 最近常有海盗出没。流程你应<nl>该清楚——只要发现可疑情况，<nl>立即<b>上报给我或守卫<b>。

English: Any questions? <30>No?
Then get to it!
Otus!
Don't zone out!<30><nl>Get up here!
Otus! Where have you been?!
Get inside, right now!!!
Let's get into safety Otus!
Translated: 我们快到安全的地方去，欧图斯！

English: Ho there! Looks like we've<nl>got a slacker in the village!
Translated: 喂，那边的！看来我们抓住了<nl>一个懒鬼啊！

English: True that!
Are you the troublemaker that's<nl>been lurking around town, Otus?
Translated: 你就是那个一直在村子附近晃<nl>荡的捣乱鬼吗，欧图斯？

English: You sure look like a troublemaker to me.
Translated: 在我看来你很像那个捣乱鬼。

English: True that!
I saw Asio on his way to the professor.
Translated: 我看到艾西欧往教授家去了。

English: For someone as strict as Asio,<nl>he sure lets you off easy.
Translated: 艾西欧这么严格的人，对你倒<nl>是挺纵容的。

English: Now, be a good owl and return to your duties.
Translated: 好了，做个好猫头鹰，回到你<nl>的岗位上去吧。

English: True that!
What was that sound?
Sounded like someone screaming!
Translated: 听起来像是有人在尖叫！

English: True that!
Well, I'm feeling pretty sleepy...
...<10>I'm sure it was nothing!
True that!
Boo!!!
Hahaha!
Heh, you got him good, Fib!
Yeah, Bonacci!
Guess he can fly after all!
Translated: 我就知道他会飞起来的！

English: Man, you're such a scaredy-cat Otus!<nl>Owls should be tough and fearless!
Translated: 看啊，你就像是受惊的小猫，欧图斯！<nl>猫头鹰应该是勇敢而坚强的！

English: Are you sure you should be<nl>allowed to keep watch?
Translated: 你确定自己能胜任放哨的工作吗？

English: Doesn't everyone think you're an idiot?
Translated: 不觉得大家都当你是傻瓜吗？

English: I mean, are you even a real owl?
Translated: 我的意思是，你真的是只猫头鹰吗？

English: Asking him questions is pointless, Fib.<nl>He can't reply anyway.
Translated: 问他问题根本没有意义，菲本。<nl>他连回答都没法做到。

English: Oh yeah, he's a mute!
Mute, silly Otus!
Hahaha!
Hahaha!
[1]HEY!
You two lay off Otus!
Translated: 你们俩个从欧图斯身边滚开！

English: And get back to patrolling,<nl>or I'll tell Strix!
Translated: 快回去你们的巡逻，不然我就<nl>告诉斯吉克斯！

English: Don't mind them, Otus.
They're just being childish.
Translated: 他们只是群幼稚鬼而已。

English: Hey, why don't I join you?<nl>I can help you keep watch!
Translated: 嗨，为什么不让我和你组队？<nl>我能帮你一起去放哨！

English: We'll show them!
Translated: 让他们见识下我们的能耐！

English: Just pick me up and let's go!
Whoa!
Haha, careful where you drop me, Otus!
Translated: 哈哈，放我下来时小心点，欧图斯！

English: I'm not very proficient at flying.
I'm getting better at climbing.
Please stop.
Whoa!
Hey, buddy!
Psst..!
Master Otus!
I must not be seen here,<nl>but we must talk.
Translated: 我得和你谈谈，但不能让其他<nl>人看见我。

English: Let's meet up in your house.
We can talk there in private.
Translated: 在那里我们可以私下进行讨论。

English: ...A disaster.
Advent destroyed.
Pirates roaming free.
...And the Professor comes and<nl>tells me that the ruin holding<nl>the <b>relic<b> was opened.
Translated: ……教授还来告诉我守护<b>圣物<b><nl>的遗迹大门被打开了。

English: If the pirates gather all the relics,<nl>then we are all doomed.
Translated: 要是海盗集齐了圣物，那我们<nl>都在劫难逃。

English: And with Advent gone, we can't stop them...
Translated: 爱文德城已经没了，我们无法<nl>阻止他们……

English: Otus.
You're here, are you?
Leave me.
I don't want to see you here again.
Translated: 我不想再在这里见到你。

English: You <30>fool!
Imbecile! <60>Moron!
Leave this place at once!
Otus, <30>why have you come back?
Translated: 欧图斯，<30>为什么你要回来？

English: You should leave! <30>Now!
This place is no longer <15>safe.
I couldn't keep the village from harm.
Translated: 我无法让村庄免遭伤害。

English: Not me, <30>nor Strix, <30>nor any other owl.
Translated: 我不行，<30>斯吉克斯不行，<nl><30>其他猫头鹰也不行。

English: We are... <60>frail. <60>Arrogant. <60>Short sighted.
<30>If you hadn't left the school...
Otus...
We have been spared<30> from my own <nl>foolish actions this time.
Translated: 这次我们幸免于<30>我愚蠢行为所<nl>带来的灾难。

English: Fly away as far as you can, Otus.
Hide yourself from others, and never return.
Translated: 从其他人的眼里消失，永远也<nl>不要回来。

English: Heed my final lesson now, <60>so that<nl>you may live a little longer.
Translated: 这是我给你上的最后一课，<nl>那<60>能让你活得更久一些。

English: I <15>am <15>so <15>s<5>o<5>r<5>r<5>y <90>for everything.
Translated: 我<15>真的<15>非常<15>抱<5>歉，为我所作的一切。

English: Thank you!
So many lives lost<15>.<15>.<15>.
I<15>.<15>.<15>. I can't believe this happened.
Translated: 我<15>…<15>…<15>…我无法相信眼前发生的一切。

English: I was right there, <30>and <30>I couldn't help.
Translated: 我就在那里，<30>却<30>无能为力。

English: None of the things we accomplished <30>mattered at all...
Translated: 我们所做之事<30>根本一文不值……

English: We were doing so great, <30>and yet <30><nl>this is how it all turned out.
Translated: 我们做得那么好，<30>但<30>最后却变成<nl>了这样。

English: We failed them.
We failed them <15>all.
Translated: 我们辜负了他们<15>所有人。

English: I miss it, <30>Otus. <60>I miss it so much.
Translated: 我想念它，<30>欧图斯。<60>我太想念它了。

English: Even though we never got<nl>to fully experience Advent.
Translated: 虽然我们还没彻底感受过爱文<nl>德城的风土人情。

English: Its streets. <30>Its culture. <30>The people.
Translated: 它的街道…<30>它的文化…<30>它的住民…

English: We never got to see how it'd all <30>turn out.
Translated: 但我们再也没有机会看到它的<nl><30>未来了。

English: Did we<5>.<5>.<5>. <30>Try <30>hard <30>enough?
I don't know if I can go back there, <30>Otus.
Translated: 我不知道自己能否回到你那边，<nl><30>欧图斯。

English: Do you think it makes any difference<nl>what we do from now on?
Translated: 你觉得我们从现在开始努力还<nl>会有用吗？

English: Our future is lost!
Our capital is completely gone!
Translated: 我们的首都彻底消失了！

English: Think about it. <30>The pirates<nl>destroyed Advent this easily!?
Translated: 仔细想想。<30>海盗这么简单地就<nl>把爱文德城给摧毁了！？

English: What are we to do?
I...<30> I don't feel like I<nl>belong in this village anymore.
Translated: 我……<30>我感觉自己不再属于这<nl>个村子。

English: I've <60>failed all of them.
Is it OK if I stay at your place for a while?
Translated: 我可以在你家待上一阵子吗？

English: I need to <15>get <15>away <15>from here.
[1]I am the great master Strix <30>and I<nl>am [3]smart,<30> [3]strong <30>and [3]fantastic!
Translated: [1]我是伟大的斯吉克斯大师，<nl><30>我[3]聪明<30>[3]、强大<30>且[3]优秀！

English: I am Asio, <30>and I'm [1]stupid!
Hahaha!
Hahaha!
Oh wait, I got another one!
Translated: 哦等等，我还有另外一种说法！

English: Hum-um!
I am Asio, <30>and I am, uh,<30> [1]incompetent!
Translated: 我是艾西欧，<30>我很，嗯，<30>[1]无能！

English: [1]Extremely<30> [1]incompetent!
Hahaha!
Hahaha!
Hey now! <15>Look who it is!
Oh man, it's scaredy cat Otus!
Translated: 哦天啊，是那个胆小的猫仔欧图斯！

English: I heard he was <30><b>bravely<b> <30>locked up<nl>by his mentor during the attack!
Translated: 我听说袭击发生时，他被他老师<nl><30><b>勇敢地<b><30>锁了起来！

English: And that he <30><b>bravely<b> <30>fainted during the commotion!
Translated: 而且在暴乱的时候，他<30><b>勇敢地<b><nl><30>晕倒了！

English: Haha, yeah!
Not everyone is out to make a difference, Bonacci!
Translated: 不是每个人都能有所作为的，博纳奇！

English: That's right, <30>at least we got a crate of<nl>food outta Advent before it was too late!
Translated: 是啊，<30>至少我们在爱文德城被<nl>毁前搬出了一箱食物！

English: <b>Strix<b> even gave us guard duty<nl>over these supplies! We're the best!
Translated: <b>斯吉克斯<b>还安排我们看守补给<nl>品的工作！我们是最棒的！

English: Yeah, so beat it Otus! <30>We've<nl>got this taken care of!
Translated: 没错，所以你快滚吧，欧图斯！<nl><30>我们会处理这些的！

English: Vellie will become a much<nl>better place from now on!
Translated: 从现在开始，维里村会变成一个<nl>更好的地方！

English: How are we doing on supplies!?
Ummm.
This is all there is, sir <b>Strix<b>!
Translated: 全都在这了，<b>斯吉克斯<b>长官！

English: This is it!?
This village's supplies won't even last a week.
Translated: 这个村庄的补给连一个星期都<nl>维持不了。

English: Preposterous! <30><b>Asio<b> has done<nl>a lacklustre job here, <15>at <15>best!
Translated: 太荒谬了！<30><b>艾西欧<b>在这做了多少<nl>没用的工作！

English: We need to start planning a long-term<nl>solution for all of Advent's refugees.
Translated: 我们得为爱文德城的难民制订<nl>一套长期的解决方案。

English: Comfort is secondary, survival is top priority!
Translated: 舒适第二，第一要务是生存！

English: Hm... Yes, sir!
Otus! What are you doing!
We need to get to the Professor's laboratory!
Translated: 我们得赶去教授的实验室！

English: T-This... This is too much<10>.<10>.<10>.
I can't believe it, Otus!
Everything has gone wrong!
I can't stay here in Vellie.
Translated: 我不能继续待在维里村了。

English: ...It's been nice to know you, Otus.
I don't think we'll see each other again...
Translated: 我想我们不会再见面了……

English: Hey, Otus! Take me with you!
The present beckons you...
You seem to be struggling with the heat, my boy!
Translated: 看来你很不耐热啊，我的男孩！

English: Let me teach you a little trick to deal with it.
Ahhh, feel that?
It's all about accepting the scalding water!
Translated: 诀窍就是接受滚烫的热水！

English: Relax in it. <30>Soak in it!
Give it a try.
There you go, lad.
Never forget to take your time to relax.
Translated: 千万别忘了抽点时间来放松放松。

English: Take it from ol' Toby! <30>He's a relaxer!
Translated: 谨记老托比的话！<30>他可是放松专家！

English: Ahhh...
There's nothing like relaxing in the hot spring!
Translated: 没什么能比待在温泉里更放松的了！

English: You seem to be getting hot under the collar, Otus.
Translated: 你下半身正在变热，欧图斯。

English: You've gotta relax, buddy!
Unclench your muscles and let<nl>the heat into your pores!
Translated: 放松你的肌肉，让热量通过你<nl>的毛孔！

English: C'mon! Try it!
That's the way, Otus!
Now we can both enjoy the hot spring!
Translated: 现在我们能一起享受温泉了！

English: I wonder where Toby went.
He never used to leave this hot spring.
Translated: 他从没离开过这座温泉。

English: Mandolyn told me he just<nl>left without saying anything.
Translated: 曼德林告诉我说他没留下任何<nl>信息就离开了。

English: Hmm...
We'll have to become the hot spring<nl>experts until he comes back, huh?
Translated: 那在他回来前，我们就是温泉<nl>大师了，对吧？

English: Toby's taken good care of this hot spring.
Translated: 托比总是护着这座温泉。

English: We should make good use of it while he's away.
Translated: 现在他不在，我们应该乘机好<nl>好享用一番。

English: Aahhh...
You feel that, Otus?
Things are tough now, but<nl>there's always time to relax a bit.
Translated: 虽然如今的日子非常艰难，但<nl>总该抽出点时间来放松一下。

English: Anyway, my <b>mapping machine<b> is incredible.
Translated: 不管怎样，我的<b>地图绘测仪<b>都<nl>是最优秀的。

English: Even you have to admit that, Asio.
Translated: 就算是你也必须承认，艾西欧。

English: Nonsense.
The owls have done this for centuries.
Translated: 猫头鹰几个世纪前就做过这个了。

English: Your attempt to undermine my<nl>influence in the village is pathetic.
Translated: 任何想削弱我在村里威信的企<nl>图都是徒劳的。

English: You stubborn old..!
You think I'm playing petty politics?!
Translated: 你认为我在玩可笑的政治把戏？！

English: You're far too proud, Asio!
Translated: 你太自以为是了，艾西欧！

English: So you say after you try<nl>to spit on my heritage.
Translated: 你在污蔑了我族遗产后倒是摆<nl>出了一副正人君子的模样。

English: *Sigh*
I pity you for having this<nl>fool as a mentor, Otus.
Translated: 我为你有这样一位愚蠢的老师<nl>而感到遗憾，欧图斯。

English: Hey again, Otus.
Just showing your teacher<nl>what the future looks like.
Translated: 我只是想给你的老师展示下未<nl>来会是什么样子的。

English: Try not to break anything<nl>while you're here.
Translated: 你小心别损坏这里的设备。

English: Careful where you fly, Otus.
There's a lot of important equipment in here.
Translated: 这里有很多贵重的设备。

English: Not that Asio seems to understand that.
Translated: 它们不像艾西欧想的那样廉价。

English: A great structure above the skies...
I almost wish I could come with you, Otus.
Translated: 我好希望能跟你一起去，欧图斯。

English: It must be quite a sight.
Translated: 那景象肯定会让人惊叹。

English: Otus? Why are you here?
You should evacuate!
The pirates could strike at any moment!
Translated: 海盗随时都有进攻的可能！

English: The Professor is right.
There's even been sights of landmasses rising.
Translated: 现在都能看到陆地翘起的现象了。

English: ...Something isn't right with the world.
We need some help, Professor.
We're tracking someone who might<nl>hold the key to saving Vellie.
Translated: 我们正在追踪一个可能握有拯<nl>救维里村钥匙的人。

English: Really?<30> Who?
We don't know.
Whoever it was went above the<nl>Mesosphere before we could catch him.
Translated: 那人在我们能抓住他前就已经<nl>逃到中间层上空去了。

English: Otus can't fly that high...
Well, we could perhaps help you get up there.
Translated: 好吧，或许我们能帮你们去到那里。

English: But I don't see why we should.
Translated: 但我没看到必须这么做的理由。

English: The last time I helped you out,<nl>things didn't go so well.
Translated: 上次我帮你们出去的结果可不<nl>怎么好。

English: Please!
We have to do something!
Whoever's up there has all three Relics!
Translated: 在那上面的人拥有全部三件圣物！

English: Three... Relics..?
...You mean... The <20>Hex Relics<10>.<10>.<10>?
You've heard of them!
Then you know we're not making this up!
Translated: 那你肯定知道我们没有乱说！

English: What are they talking about, Professor?
Alright, Otus and Geddy.
Let's do a test.
Whoever it was, if he went above the Mesosphere,<nl>he must have had somewhere to go.
Translated: 不管是谁，要是那人去了中间<nl>层上方，那他肯定需要待在某<nl>个地方。

English: We should be able to track any<nl>landmass up there with <b>my machine<b>.
Translated: 我们应该能用<b>我的机器<b>探测到<nl>那片陆地。

English: If there's nothing to find up there,<nl>there's no reason to believe you.
Translated: 如果什么都没找到，那我就没<nl>有理由相信你们了。

English: Alright, go ahead and check!
I'm pretty sure you'll find something...
Translated: 我很确定你能发现一些东西……

English: Well, would you look at that!
They're right!
Incredible! A structure in Mesos?
Translated: 难以置信！中间区竟有这样的建筑？

English: How can anything even be built so high up?
Translated: 它是如何在这么高的地方建起来的？

English: Alright.
I can help you get up there.
...But it will be a dangerous flight.
If you want to go, you should prepare.
Translated: 如果你们想去，就做好准备吧。

English: Heheheh..!
Make sure you've done everything you need to do.
Translated: 确保你们把所有事情都处理好了。

English: You won't be coming back for a while.
Translated: 你会有很长一段时间不能回来。

English: Ready to go, buddy?
Oh man, Otus, Asio isn't here!
Translated: 哦天啊，欧图斯，艾西欧不在这里！

English: That means we can't just report this!
Translated: 也就是说我们无法向他报告这<nl>件事！

English: We don't have time to go look for him!
Let's get that troublemaker before<nl>he slips away from us!
Translated: 先去抓那个捣乱鬼，不然他会<nl>从我们手上溜走的！

English: Asio will understand!
So as you can see, Asio, this screen<nl>is at the heart of the machine.
Translated: 正如你所见，艾西欧，这块屏<nl>幕就是机器的核心。

English: It will show you a map of the<nl>area, generated in real time!
Translated: 它能向你展示附近区域的地图，<nl>而且是实时生成的！

English: It's my greatest accomplishment!
I don't understand.
Translated: 我不明白这有什么意义。

English: We have maps.
The OWLS keep the maps up to date.
Translated: 猫头鹰们也一直在更新地图。

English: Don't be daft, Asio.
The islands are floating around<nl>and there are so few owls left.
Translated: 那些岛屿在四处漂动，我们可<nl>没有多余的猫头鹰来做这些事。

English: This is the future!
Ugh...
Behold!<nl>Groundbreaking technology at work!
Translated: 注意看！跨时代的科技即将诞生！

English: I'm<30> not impressed.
Blast!<nl>It worked perfectly fine before you showed up!
Translated: 该死的！在你出现前它还可以<nl>正常工作！

English: Something must have...
Blast!<nl>It worked perfectly fine before you showed up!
Translated: 该死的！在你出现前它还可以<nl>正常工作！

English: Something must have broken.
Translated: 肯定是哪里的零件坏了。

English: Let me think for a bit...
Huh..?
Your student is in my lab, Asio.
Translated: 你学生来我实验室了，艾西欧。

English: [1]Otus!<nl>What are you doing in here?!
Give the boy some space, Asio.
Translated: 别对他太严格了，艾西欧。

English: It's fine as long as he doesn't<nl>break anything<10>.<10>.<10>. again.
Translated: 我不介意他待在这，<nl>只要别<10>…<10>…<10>…再弄坏东西。

English: Just don't idle here for too long.
Go out there and keep a lookout for pirates!
Otus get up here immediately!
Otus! You were supposed to<nl>keep watch! Where were you?!
Translated: 欧图斯！你应该在站岗的！<nl>怎么不见了？！

English: Geddy, you should have known better than to-
Translated: 格迪，你应该更清楚这点，<nl>而不是——

English: Asio, we have no time for this bickering.
Translated: 艾西欧，我们没时间在这吵架了。

English: Geddy! Get this machine working<nl>so we can get a visual of the pirates.
Translated: 格迪！快让机器运作起来，<nl>我们要获取海盗的影像。

English: Uh<5>.<5>.<5>.<nl>I'll try my best, Professor!
Try it now!
It works!<15> Those are the<nl>pirate ships on the screen.
Translated: 成功了！<15>屏幕上显示的就是海盗船。

English: It looks like<20> the pirates are leaving!
They are!<45> No doubt about it.
Why would they leave?
Oh no... This is bad..!
[1]Asio! Call a town meeting at once!
There is no time to lose!
...Alright.
Otus, Geddy, follow me!
...This timing...
Have the pirates noticed it too..?
That the islands are<30>.<30>.<30>.
No,<20> surely not.
Oh, Otus!
I'm so glad you're back!
Translated: 你能回来我真是太高兴了！

English: Geddy regretted leaving you very much.
I'm glad you two are friends again!
Yes, we're hiding in here.
Some people were hit by rocks<nl>that started floating upwards.
Translated: 已经有人被向上漂浮的石头给<nl>砸伤了。

English: It seemed safer to be indoors.
Translated: 看来在这种现象停止前。

English: Until it stops.
Hmm...
Yes, we're hiding in here for the moment.
Translated: 没错，我们会暂时躲在这里。

English: The islands seem to be unstable,<nl>which of course means there's<nl>nowhere to run.
Translated: 周围的岛屿看起来很不稳定，<nl>当然这也就说我们无处可逃。

English: I just hope we have enough food to<nl>hold out until it settles down.
Translated: 我只希望我们能有足够的食物<nl>撑到事情平定下来。

English: Hmm...
I don't remember exactly how to use a kitchen.
Translated: 我不太记得怎么使用厨房了。

English: I'll have to take some notes<nl>as it comes back to me.
Translated: 要是我能回想起来就得赶紧写<nl>入笔记。

English: Things I like:
1. Fruit from my garden.
2. My musical instruments.
3. Performing in front of a crowd.
I've finished a wonderful new song in the past few days.
Translated: 在过去几天我完成了一首绝妙<nl>的新歌。

English: I think I might go out of town to<nl>perform it in front of a big audience!
Translated: 或许我会离开村子去让更多的<nl>听众来感受我的音乐！

English: I think maybe Otus and Geddy could benefit<nl>from getting out of Vellie for a bit too.
Translated: 或许欧图斯和格迪稍微离开下<nl>维里村能增长更多的见识。

English: Asio and the Professor are always angry with them.
Translated: 艾西欧和教授总是对他俩发火。

English: Otus means well, but...
He just gets into the worst sort of trouble!
Translated: 他总会闯出最糟糕的祸！

English: If only he could be a bit more responsible,<nl>and help out every once in a while...
Translated: 要是他能变得更有担当以及偶<nl>尔能出来帮忙就好了……

English: Oh, I can hardly believe it!
We've been attacked by pirates!
I was very scared... but thankfully they left everyone alone.
Translated: 我很害怕……但万幸的是那些<nl>海盗没有伤人。

English: Asio says they're going to Advent next.
Translated: 艾西欧说他们接下来的目标是<nl>爱文德城。

English: I hope they will leave everyone alone there too...
Translated: 我希望他们也不要伤害那里的人……

English: Bomboman and I went to Advent a few years ago.
Translated: 邦伯曼和我几年前去过爱文德城。

English: We held a concert there, and the people crowded up to see us.
Translated: 我们在那办了场演唱会，人们<nl>排着长龙来看我们。

English: I was so happy that I could bring<nl>a bit of Vellie to the capital.
Translated: 我很高兴能把维里村的特色风<nl>情带去给首都的人。

English: The people there were so lovely...
Translated: 那里的人真是太有爱了……

English: Maybe next time Strix goes up there, I'll come along!
Translated: 也许下次斯吉克斯去那的时候，<nl>我会跟着去！

English: ...Though of course I can't now,<nl>with pirates on the loose...
Translated: ……但现在肯定不行，海盗还<nl>没有被抓住呢……

English: ...I wasn't sure if I should<nl>write a diary entry today.
Translated: ……我有些犹豫要不要写今天<nl>的日记。

English: But I figured I should.
Translated: 但我觉得还是应该做个记录。

English: I've taken Otus in to recover in my house,<nl>where we can take care of him.
Translated: 我把欧图斯带到家里休养，在<nl>这里我们能够照顾他。

English: I can only hope that he's still<nl>himself when he wakes up.
Translated: 我只希望他在醒来后还能保持<nl>自我。

English: As for the rest of us...
I think we might never be the same.
Translated: 我们可能都没法像往常一样了。

English: Otus is still sleeping.
I wonder how much we should<nl>tell him about what happened...
Translated: 我不知道我们该把发生的事跟<nl>他说到什么程度……

English: I don't want to lie to him,<nl>but if I tell him everything...
Translated: 我不想对他撒谎，但如果全都<nl>跟他说的话……

English: What if he blames himself for all this tragedy?
Translated: 要是他把悲剧发生的原因全算<nl>在自己头上怎么办？

English: He's just a child..!
Otus and Geddy have left again.
Translated: 欧图斯和格迪又要离开了。

English: I hope they won't get themselves into more trouble...
Translated: 我希望他们不要让自己陷入更<nl>多的麻烦之中……

English: But maybe they need to do<nl>something to help their recovery.
Translated: 不过也许他们需要做些事情来<nl>平复自己。

English: There's nothing like going<nl>outside to help your mind relax!
Translated: 没有什么能比出去走走更能帮<nl>你放松身心的了！

English: Geddy dropped by without Otus today.
Translated: 今天格迪没有和欧图斯一起来。

English: He didn't seem like himself.
Translated: 他看起来不像他平常的样子。

English: I suppose none of us have been<nl>since what happened in Advent.
Translated: 我想没有人能在经历爱文德城<nl>一事后还能若无其事。

English: I've never seen him so angry...
Translated: 我从没见过他这么愤怒……

English: To be honest, I'm glad he didn't stay here.
Translated: 老实说，我反而很高兴他没待在这。

English: I wonder if Geddy and Otus will remain friends..?
Translated: 我想知道格迪和欧图斯还是好<nl>朋友吗……？

English: I mean, they've never been able to have a conversation.
Translated: 我的意思是，他们都没有好好<nl>地交流过一次。

English: How well can they really understand each other..?
Translated: 他们对彼此又有多少了解呢……？

English: I'd better offer Otus some<nl>encouragement when he gets back.
Translated: 我得在欧图斯回来时安慰下他。

English: I can't let him know I've been<nl>thinking these things!
Translated: 我不能让他知道我一直在想这<nl>些事情！

English: I'm so relieved that Geddy<nl>and Otus are friends again!
Translated: 我很高兴格迪和欧图斯又和好了！

English: I only wish the situation<nl>in Vellie were different.
Translated: 我只希望维里村的情况能有所好转。

English: Everyone is talking about evacuating,<nl>and Asio is just brooding...
Translated: 每个人都在讨论离开的事，<nl>艾西欧也整天愁眉苦脸的……

English: But I'm not evacuating!
Geddy says there's still hope!
Even though times are tough,<nl>I'm happier than I've been in a while.
Translated: 虽然日子还很艰苦，但我比之<nl>前要开心一些。

English: Geddy just wasn't the same without Otus.
Translated: 没有欧图斯在身边，格迪就不<nl>是往常的格迪。

English: Now he's his good old, dependable self again!
Translated: 现在他又变回那个可爱又值得<nl>信赖的人了！

English: Maybe he'll want to move in with me now?
Translated: 也许现在他会想搬来和我一起住？

English: We always used to talk about it...
Translated: 以前我们经常讨论这事……

English: Medicine and supplies! Quickly!
Look for survivors!
Alright, take the food over there!
We need more scaffolding for the tents!
Translated: 我们需要更多的脚手架来搭建帐篷！

English: Lumber here!
We need more water!
Welcome back, Otus.
Are you well?
Good.
We are in hiding here.
Something bad is happening out there.
Translated: 外面发生了一些不好的事。

English: People are being hit<nl>by rocks that come loose.
Translated: 人们被四处漂浮的石头砸伤。

English: It's safer here till it's passed.
Translated: 待在这里等事情过去会更安全。

English: I'm going to teach little<nl>Pipp to play drums with me.
Translated: 我打算教小皮普跟我一起打鼓。

English: We're going to have lots of fun!
Hi, bro!
We're playing in the <b>Bombo-house<b>!
Translated: 我们正在<b>鼓房<b>演奏音乐！

English: There's music here all the time!
Translated: 这里无时无刻都在演奏音乐！

English: I can't get enough of it!
I think I need to learn<nl>how to play drums too!
Me and Bomboman would stay<nl>up all night and practice!
Translated: 我和邦伯曼整夜都在练习！

English: You can practice it with me, bro!
Translated: 你也能和我一起练习打鼓吧，大哥！

English: Maybe we'll be as cool as Bomboman one day!
Translated: 或许某天我们会像邦伯曼一样酷！

English: Urk!
I don't know why I chose<nl>to stay in this house.
Translated: 我不知道我为什么会选择留在<nl>这间房里。

English: Constant drumming...
Can't sleep...
Oh man, we're doomed.
I can't feel my legs.
I don't know what to do!
Someone help!
Ow, my knee!
It's going dark!
I'm so scared!
We need to get out!
Hnng!
Any ideas?
Go man, go!
Yeah! Do it!
Great going!
Keep at it!
You can do it!
Yes!
Just a little more!
You can do it!
Keep trying!
Put your back into it!
Excellent, Otus!
Do you think you'll be able<nl>to help me down from here too?
Translated: 你也能帮我从这里下来吗？

English: YES! Amazing!
You saved our lives, Otus!
Translated: 你救了我们的命，欧图斯！

English: That's my best buddy for ya!
Ok, before we get out of here,<nl>I'm just gonna collect a tiny chip from that relic!
Translated: 好了，在我们离开这前，我要<nl>从那件圣物身上取下一小块碎片！

English: Who knows what the <b>Professor<b><nl>might be able to learn from it?
Translated: 也许<b>教授<b>能从这块碎片中研究<nl>出什么东西？

English: Otus, look! It's the <b>troublemaker<b>!
Translated: 欧图斯，快看！是那个<b>捣乱鬼<b>！

English: Let's get him!
Hmm, this seems like a bad idea!
Translated: 嗯，看起来这不像是个好主意！

English: What is this..?
It's some kind of device with<nl>a <b>button<b> on it!
Translated: 像是某种装置，上面还有个<b>按钮<b>！

English: Strange... if it's made by the owls<nl>then it should be hundreds of years old...
Translated: 奇怪……如果是猫头鹰制造了这个，<nl>那它应该有几百年的历史了……

English: But it looks completely intact.
Translated: 但它看起来还是完好无损。

English: I wonder what might happen<nl>if we pressed the button<20>.<20>.<20>?
Translated: 我想知道如果我们按下这个按<nl>钮会发生什么<20>…<20>…<20>？

English: I think you should have it!
Go ahead Otus, push the button.
Translated: 上吧，欧图斯，按下那个按钮。

English: ...stay over here.
Gah!
[1]Wow!<30> Did I just get teleported?!
This is incredible technology!<nl>The owls made stuff like this?!
Translated: 这科技可真了不起啊！<nl>是猫头鹰制作了这样的东西吗？！

English: Do it again!
Weeeee!
Hah! Just wait till we can<nl>show this to the <b>Professor<b>!
Translated: 哈！我都等不及把这东西展示<nl>给<b>教授<b>的时候！

English: Although...
We should get out of here while<nl>the cave is still holding.
Translated: 趁洞穴还没塌我们得赶紧离开。

English: Oh wow... What is <b>that<b>?
It looks like an ancient <b>owl relic<b>!
Translated: 看起来像是一件很古老的<b>猫头鹰圣物<b>！

English: I've never seen one so pristine.
Translated: 我从没见过这么古朴的东西。

English: I can almost feel the energy it emits.
Translated: 我几乎都能感觉到它散发出来<nl>的能量。

English: But<5>.<5>.<5>. Why is it here?
...I'm really curious about this artifact.
I think we ought to bring a fragment<nl>of it to the <b>Professor<b>.
Translated: 我们应该带走它的一块碎片给<nl><b>教授<b>看一下。

English: Ha! Got ya!
GAH!
That freaky <b>spider person<b> got us!
Translated: 那个可怕的<b>蜘蛛人<b>抓住我们了！

English: We need to get out of these webs!
Translated: 我们需要从这些网中挣脱出去！

English: PHEW!
Yay<5>, hurrah<10>, whoopie!
I found you!
I'm alive!
And so are you!
We're [1]AMAZING!
But calm down <20>Otus,<nl>this is no time to celebrate.
Translated: 不过冷静点，<20>欧图斯，<nl>我们没时间在这庆祝了。

English: We should probably get out of here<nl>before there's another collapse, huh?
Translated: 我们得在下次塌方前离开，对吧？

English: Whoop!
Otus! I found you!
Let's get out of here Otus.<nl>This place is becoming a bit too dangerous.
Translated: 我们快离开这，欧图斯。<nl>这地方变得有点太危险了。

English: Huh?
Otus! We better keep moving, buddy!
Translated: 欧图斯！我们最好不要停下，伙计！

English: Ahhh!
Watch out!!!
OTUS!
Otus, wake up!
Please tell me you're OK, Otus!
Oh man... I didn't know<nl>the cave was this dangerous!
Translated: 哦天啊……我都不知道这洞穴<nl>原来这么危险！

English: Hang in there, buddy!
I'm coming for you!
OTUS!
Otus, wake up!
Please tell me you're OK, Otus!
Oh man... I didn't know<nl>the cave was this dangerous!
Translated: 哦天啊……我都不知道这洞穴<nl>原来这么危险！

English: Hang in there, buddy!
I'm coming for you!
Oh man, <30>I can get used to this<nl>teleporting business, Otus!
Translated: 哦天啊，<30>我会尽快习惯传送的，<nl>欧图斯！

English: I'll never have to walk again!
Translated: 我以后再也不需要走路了！

English: Now, <30>let's return to-
Oh no! Another tremor!
But...
It seemed to be coming from the outside!
Translated: 这次好像那是从外边传来的！

English: Quickly, Otus! <30>Let's check what's going on!
Translated: 快点，欧图斯！<nl><30>我们得出去看看发生了什么！

English: Hey, buddy, wait up.
Say, what did you find in here..?
Whoa!
Oh no, this can't be good.
