That is strange<10>.<10>.<10>.<20> There is<nl>some kind of tremor.
I wonder if the village<nl>could be fighting back?
Translated: 我想是不是村庄在进行反击？

English: It doesn't matter.
We already have what we came for.
Translated: 我们已经得到我们想要的了。

English: Am I to understand that we<nl>have the <b>relic<b> in our possession?
Translated: 你是说我们已经拿到<b>圣物<b>了吗？

English: Yup.<20> It was right where that<nl>little owl led us.<20> No problems.
Translated: 没错。<20>它就在那只小猫头鹰带<nl>我们去的地方。<20>很容易就弄到<nl>手了。

English: Excellent.<20> Then it is time to leave.
Translated: 很好。<20>那么是时候离开了。

English: Not yet, it's not!<nl>It's time for pillaging!
Translated: 不，还不到时候！<nl>现在才是掠夺村子的好时机！

English: Do not be ridiculous.<20> We're done here.
Translated: 别犯迷糊了。<nl><20>我们在这的任务已经完成了。

English: Captain Molstrom's order was<nl>to move on to attack Advent.
Translated: 摩斯特罗舰长传来的命令是进<nl>攻爱文德城。

English: <b>Advent<b>?<20> We're finally going to<nl>attack the <b>capital<b>?
Translated: <b>爱文德城<b>？<nl><20>我们终于要进攻那座<b>城市<b>了吗？

English: That's right. It seems the Captain is<nl>confident that our forces are strong enough.
Translated: 是的。舰长确信我们有足够的<nl>力量能获得胜利。

English: And if we get the relic hidden in Advent<nl>as well, we will be stronger still.
Translated: 如果把爱文德城的圣物也弄到<nl>手，我们就会更强大。

English: Of course, the journey will be dangerous...<20><nl>We'll have to fly near the <b>Owl temple<b>.
Translated: 当然，这次旅程也会很危险……<nl><20>我们得飞近<b>猫头鹰神殿<b>。

English: Quit yer whining!<30><nl>Let's go!
Translated: 别说牢骚话了！<30>我们出发吧！

English: Alright,<20> let us be off.
Alright...
No going back after this!
So we have found them at last...
The <b>Relics<b>!
So <20>Dirk DID get the third one<nl>out of the Floating Continent..!
Translated: 所以<20>德克真的从漂浮大陆拿走<nl>了最后一件圣物……！

English: How are we gonna get them out!?
Translated: 我们要怎么把它们弄出来！？

English: Let us try to break the Relics<nl>out of these cages while we can!
Translated: 趁现在还没被发现，让我们<nl>试试打破笼子把圣物弄出来！

English: If we can make it out of the ship with <b>just one relic<b>.<20>.<20>.
Translated: 就算我们只能从这艘船带走<nl>一件<b>圣物<b>…<20>…<20>…

English: O-<30>OK, <30>but let's hurry! <30>More<nl>pirates could show up any second now!
Translated: 好、<30>好的，<30>不过我们得快点！<nl><30>随时都有可能出现更多的海盗！

English: Indeed, we'll need to be quick!
Translated: 没错，我们的动作得迅速！

English: Let's crack these cages open, Master Otus!
Translated: 让我们把这些笼子炸开吧，<nl>欧图斯少爷！

English: These cages sure don't seem to break easily.
Translated: 看来要破坏这些笼子并非易事。

English: Hm...
Alphonse? Do you know anything about these things?
Translated: 阿尔冯斯？你对这些东西了解吗？

English: How can we break them?
It is as I feared.
The cages are too heavily reinforced.
Translated: 这些笼子都是经过特别加固的。

English: We will need to get <b>the key<b> from its custodian.
Translated: 我们得从保管人手中获取<b>钥匙<b>。

English: And the only one who would have the<nl>keys to the Relics<30> would be<20>.<20>.<20>.
[1]<b>Captain Molstrom himself<b>.
Crud...
So that's it..?
I mean, we can't defeat Molstrom.
Translated: 我的意思是，我们打不过摩斯特罗。

English: You guys saw him in Advent.
Translated: 在爱文德城你们都见识过他的强大。

English: I'm a [1]GREAT fighter, but even I'm not<nl>going up against Molstrom after that.
Translated: 我自认为是个[1]强大的战士，但<nl>经过那件事后我也不会想去和<nl>摩斯特罗战斗。

English: Take heart, my friends.
Yes, this is ill news, but...
Translated: 没错，情况是不太乐观，但……

English: In Advent, Molstrom had <b>a Relic<b>.
Translated: 在爱文德城时，摩斯特罗是带<nl>着<b>一件圣物<b>的。

English: Currently, the Relics are all here.
So he should be considerably <b>weaker<b> compared<nl>to when we met him in Advent.
Translated: 所以他应该比我们在爱文德城<nl>看到的要<b>弱<b>很多。

English: The odds are still not in our favour,<40> but...
Translated: 我们的胜算依然不大，<40>不过……

English: If there was ever a time when we<nl>could defeat him,<30> it would be now.
Translated: 如果我们还有打败他的机会，<nl><30>那一定是现在了。

English: I'm in!
We've gone up against terrible odds before!
Translated: 我们以前也是在这种劣势下挺<nl>过来的！

English: In fact, I prefer it this way!
Translated: 实际上我也更喜欢这样的方式！

English: An hour from now, I'll be able to tell everyone<nl>that Twig, the world's greatest spider...
Translated: 一个小时后，我要告诉所有人，<nl>特维格是世上最伟大的蜘蛛……

English: Defeated Captain Molstrom, the scourge of the skies!
Translated: 他打败了摩斯特罗舰长，他消<nl>灭了天空灾难的源头！

English: I believe Captain Molstrom's cabin lies at the end of this corridor.
Translated: 我想摩斯特罗舰长的房间就在<nl>这条走廊的尽头。

English: Whatever happens, this will likely<nl>be the last time we fight together.
Translated: 不管发生什么，这也许是我们<nl>最后一次并肩作战了。

English: Win or lose, our struggle ends here.
Translated: 无论输赢，我们的战斗都会在这迎来终结。

English: You should both prepare yourselves for that.
Let us go.
TO VICTORY!!!
Say, <30>Otus, <30>maybe we should get<nl>a little rest before we move on?
Translated: 我说，<30>欧图斯，<nl><30>也许我们应该在行动前歇会？

English: Hmm, I think we should get moving to Advent.
Translated: 嗯，我觉得我们该去爱文德城。

English: Better not give Asio a reason to throw another tantrum.
Translated: 最好别给艾西欧发脾气的机会。

English: It would be nice to rest a bit<5>.<5>.<5>.
But we need to keep up with Dirk!
If he gets the last Relic, we'll be in trouble.
Translated: 如果他拿到了最后的圣物，<nl>那我们就有大麻烦了。

English: Indeed, Geddy.
Let us rest up at another time.
Should we rest a little before we move on, Master Otus?
Translated: 我们要在行动前歇会吗，<nl>欧图斯少爷！

English: Say, <30>Otus, <30>maybe we should get<nl>a little rest before we move on?
Translated: 我说，<30>欧图斯，<nl><30>也许我们应该在行动前歇会？

English: Hey hey, bud!
Hey hey, bud!
Hey hey, bud!
Hey there, Otus!
I'm glad to see you made it out of Advent!
Translated: 我很高兴你能从爱文德城安全<nl>地逃出来！

English: We barely made it...
And our squad leader didn't make it out.
Translated: 不过我们的队长就没那么幸运了。

English: If it hadn't been for my injury,<nl>we would have been in there<40> when...
Translated: 要不是我受了伤，我们原本也<nl>会在那的……

English: I know I said I'd invite you to my home after the battle.
Translated: 我记得之前曾说过战争结束后<nl>我会邀请你到我家作客。

English: I guess this is my home at the moment.
Translated: 我想这就是我现在的家了。

English: I was invited to stay in Vellie, but...
I think I'd rather try to build something up here.
Translated: 我还是更想在这上面建些什么。

English: I guess it's time to try to<nl>turn a new leaf and plan ahead.
Translated: 我想是时候翻开新篇章，以及<nl>规划未来了。

English: Can't grieve forever.
Bonanza is away gathering supplies for us.
Translated: 伯南扎为我们出去找补给了。

English: I have to keep myself fed and<nl>try to figure out what to do next.
Translated: 我也得吃饱并考虑接下来的计划。

English: One step at a time...
Your friend left?
Ah, I remember him.
Geddy, right? I trained with him,<30> many years ago.
Translated: 格迪，是吧？<nl><30>在多年前，我曾和他一起受过训。

English: He was never the best soldier,<30> but...
Translated: 他从来都算不上是最好的士兵，<nl><30>但是……

English: He had a good attitude.
That's probably why he was sent<nl>to an idyllic place like Vellie.
Translated: 也许那就是他能被派去像维里<nl>村这样清闲之地的原因。

English: He'll come back to you soon enough.
Translated: 他很快就会回到你身边的。

English: He's not the type to brood forever.
Translated: 他不是那种会一直忧虑的类型。

English: The woman running the shop here doesn't<nl>seem to be a good person<20>.<20>.<20>.
Translated: 经营这间商店的女人看起来不<nl>像是个好人<20>…<20>…<20>…

English: I think she tried to steal my<nl>hat to add to her inventory.
Translated: 我觉得她在试着偷走我的帽子<nl>来增加她的收藏。

English: Her boguins are trying to nab stuff too.
Translated: 她的普利鹅手脚也不干净。

English: Be careful when you shop there.
I'm glad you found Geddy again.
Translated: 我很高兴你能找回格迪。

English: Friends shouldn't be apart for too long.
Something seems to be wrong with the world, Otus.
Translated: 这个世界好像哪里出错了，欧图斯。

English: I think me and Bonanza might<nl>have to try to get away from here.
Translated: 我和伯南扎可能要离开这里。

English: Maybe you should try to get out of here too.
Translated: 也许你也应该离开此地。

English: Maybe we'll find somewhere that's safe.
Translated: 也许我们能找到安全的地方。

English: Thanks for your help in Advent, youngling.
Translated: 感谢你在爱文德城提供的帮助，<nl>年轻人。

English: It's a shame that<10>.<10>.<10>.
...We met our squad leader on the way back down.
Translated: ……我们在回来的路上看见了<nl>我们的队长。

English: He... didn't make it.
I've never seen him like that.<30><nl>He'd completely lost it.
Translated: 我从没见过他那个样子。<nl><30>他完全失去了理智。

English: I've known him for a long time, Otus.
Translated: 我认识他很久了，欧图斯。

English: He was no coward.
But even brave people sometimes<nl>lose it when things get terrible enough.
Translated: 但就算是勇敢的人，有时在面对如<nl>此恐怖的事情时也会失去理智的。

English: In the end, you saved us before he did, but...
Translated: 最后，你在他之前把我们救了，但……

English: Even as shocked as he was,<nl>he didn't give up until we had made it out.
Translated: 尽管他的内心非常动摇，但在我们<nl>成功逃脱前他都没有放弃。

English: But desperation can look like cowardice, I'm sure.
Translated: 我确信，绝望也并非是不可战胜的。

English: ...I wish you could have met him before...
I'm sorry...
It's a lot to take in.
I've never lost a battle before.
I've always tried to prepare myself for it, but...
Translated: 我无时无刻不做好战斗的<nl>准备，但……

English: It seems that's not possible.
Translated: 那看起来没有任何胜算。

English: I'm sorry...
It's a lot to take in.
I've never lost a battle before.
I've always tried to prepare myself for it, but...
Translated: 我无时无刻不做好战斗的<nl>准备，但……

English: It seems that's not possible.
Translated: 那看起来没有任何胜算。

English: You're looking for someone?
Let me give you some advice...
Just jump around absolutely everywhere,<30> super fast.
Translated: 只要<30>快速地将每个地点都找一遍。

English: Then you'll find them eventually.
Me? No, I can't find them for you.
Translated: 我？不行，我不能帮你找他们。

English: I need to stay here and think.
Translated: 我需要待在这里思考事情。

English: Sorry.
I have a lot on my mind.
Translated: 我有许多需要思考的事情。

English: I miss Advent.
It was my home for a very long time.
Translated: 我在那住了很长一段时间。

English: I haven't been to the graveyard in Vellie.
Translated: 我还没去过维里村的墓地。

English: I don't think I could take it.
Translated: 我不觉得我能接受这种事实。

English: I don't think the world is safe anymore.
Translated: 我不认为这世上还有安全的地方。

English: Me and Anne are getting out of here, but<20>.<20>.<20>.
Translated: 我和安妮正准备离开这里，<nl>但<20>…<20>…<20>…

English: I'm not sure if anywhere is safe.
Translated: 我不确定还有哪个地方是安全的。

English: Still,<40> we can't give up while there's hope.
Translated: 不过，<40>只要还有希望我们就不<nl>能放弃。

English: I'm here for you, man.
You... <30>you know that, right?
With all this stuff going on, <30>I haven't really<nl>gotten to ask you<30> how you've been doing lately.
Translated: 最近发生了太多事情，<30>我一直<nl>都没机会问你<30>最近的情况。

English: I never meant to leave you, <15>you know... <30>back in Mesos.
Translated: 我从没想过要抛弃你，<15>你知道<nl>的……<30>之前在中间区的事。

English: I was just so angry<10>.<10>.<10>. <30>after Advent.
Translated: 我只是太过愤怒<10>…<10>…<10>…<30>因为刚<nl>经历了爱文德城的事。

English: You know you're my best buddy, right?
Translated: 你知道我最好的伙伴是你，对吧？

English: Whatever happens next, <30>let's stick together!
Translated: 不管接下来发生什么，<30>我们都<nl>要团结一致！

English: You know, <15>after all this, <15>I really feel like...
Translated: 你知道，<15>经历这些事情后，<nl><15>我真觉得……

English: ...We actually <15>are an [1]<b>unstoppable team<b>!
Translated: ……我们的的确确<15>是一支[1]<b>无敌的团队<b>！

English: I'll hang around <30>if you<nl>want to stay here for a bit.
Translated: 如果你想在这待会，<30>我会在这<nl>附近待着的。

English: Happy place, this way, bud!
Translated: 此路通往开心乐园，伙计！

English: Tropos this way!
The Guardians... and the Machines...
I, Aegolius of the owls, made them all.
Translated: 是由我，猫头鹰族的艾格里尔斯，制作了它们。

English: With this token, you hold the key.
Translated: 拥有令牌，你就拥有了钥匙。

English: Come to the Sanctuary to see the glory of my accomplishment.
Translated: 来庇护所看看我光辉的成就。

English: And learn of this mistake that I have wrought.
Translated: 并从我的错误中汲取教训。

English: OK, Otus! We're in Tropos!
Translated: 很好，欧图斯！我们到对流区了！

English: Now, if I remember correctly[2]<5>.<5>.<5>.
I think the <b>Owl Temple<b> should be around here.
Translated: 我想那个<b>猫头鹰神殿<b>应该就在这附近。

English: Let's investigate a bit! Hopefully we'll find the entrance!
Translated: 让我们稍微调查下！希望我们<nl>能找到入口！

English: Alright, friends! This is Tropos!
Translated: 好了，朋友们！这里就是对流区！

English: If we continue upwards,<nl>we'll eventually reach Strato!
Translated: 只要我们继续向上走，最后就<nl>能抵达平流区！

English: I've never been that high up<nl>before, is it really safe, Alphonse?
Translated: 我从没到过这么高的地方，这<nl>里真的安全吗，阿尔冯斯？

English: Not to worry, Master Geddy.<nl>I've sailed the Strato skies plenty of times.
Translated: 别担心，格迪少爷。我在平流<nl>区的天空飞过很多次。

English: There are no more dangers there<nl>than any other places we've been.
Translated: 那里并不比我们之前去过的地<nl>方危险。

English: A-<15>a-<15>alright!
Woah!
You totally saved me!
Wow, mister! <30>Thank you so much!
I can totally make it from here!
Translated: 从这里开始我就能自己走了！

English: I'll be hanging outside<nl>Buccanary's with my bros!
Translated: 我和我的兄弟会在布卡娜里的<nl>店外待着！

English: Come visit us soon why don't ya!
Translated: 你有空就来看看我们吧！

English: Help! <45>[1]Help!
Please! <30>[1]ANYONE!!!
Thanks, buds!
I thought those beasts<nl>were gonna stomp me!
Translated: 我以为那些野兽要踩我！

English: And kick me!
And chew on my eyeballs!
But they didn't!
Thanks to you, guy!
I was just making my merry<nl>way back to Buccanary's!
Translated: 当时我正准备踏上返回布卡娜里<nl>商店的快乐之旅！

English: When those monsters<nl>jumped out and said-
Translated: 结果那些怪物突然出现，说——

English: H[1]ey!
W[1]e're gonna cut you!
...and I was like...
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!
Translated: 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！！

English: But then you guys came along!
Yep!
Say!
I'm gonna rejoin my<nl>brothers outside Buccanary's!
Translated: 等会我就要和布卡娜里店外的<nl>兄弟团聚！

English: Come and visit us why don't ya!
Translated: 你们有空就来看看我们啊！

English: I'll see you there!
That...
...Was a very <15>weird <15>fella!
Help! ANYONE!!!
I'm totally stuck down here!
OH HAPPY DAY!!!
Mister! <30>Are you here to save me?
I've been stuck down here for ages!
I'm so hungry, I was just about<nl>to eat my own feet, <15>he<15>he!
Translated: 我好饿，差点就要吃掉自己的<nl>脚了，<15>嘿<15>嘿！

English: Would you mind carrying me<nl>out of here, mister Owl?
Translated: 你介意把我从这带出去吗，<nl>猫头鹰先生？

English: Hey there, fella!
Wow!
Did you just get teleported!?
Translated: 你刚才是传送过来的吗？！

English: Um, <30>yeah, he<10>he<10>. <30>I did actually!
Translated: 嗯，<30>没错，嘿<10>嘿<10>。<nl><30>我确实是传送过来的。

English: I guess I'm getting kind of used to it now!
Translated: 现在的我已经习惯传送了！

English: Wow! <30>I wish I could teleport!<nl><30>I'd never be stuck again!
Translated: 哇！<30>我也希望学会传送！<nl><30>那样我就不会再被困住了！

English: WOOSH!
That's what it would sound like, <15>hehe.
Translated: 听起来传送的声音就像这样，<15>嘿嘿。

English: That's um, <30>that's great!
I'd even be able to teleport away<nl>from <b>Buccanary's<b> punch- [1]I mean!
Translated: 我甚至能从<b>布卡娜里<b>的拳头下<nl>传走——[1]我是说！

English: I'd be able to return to<nl>Buccanary's right away!
Translated: 我得马上回到布卡娜里商店！

English: Yep! <60>That's where I want to be!
Translated: 耶！<60>那就是我想去的地方！

English: OK, so<10>.<10>.<10>. <30>Should we help you out of here, <15>or?
Yes please.
Alright, Otus, <30>you're the carrying expert around here!
Translated: 好吧，欧图斯，<30>这里只有你擅长搬运！

English: I'll leave this one to you.
Bye-bye, teleporting man!
Buds!
You're all here!
Sure are!
Let's have some fun!
Bah!
But what should we do?
Oh!
I know!
Let's go to...
Yes!
Yes!
Let's <20>roll!
Oof!
Hey!
Wait up, guy!
Woah! <30>Otus, did you just get teleported!?
Translated: 哇哦！<30>欧图斯，你刚才是传送<nl>过来的吗！？

English: I guess <30>now we all know how it feels.
Translated: 现在<30>我们全员都知道传送的滋味了。

English: Although...
We lost track of <b>Dirk<b>!
At this rate, he'll get to the<nl><b>final relic<b> before we can.
Translated: 再这样下去，他会比我们先拿<nl>到<b>最后的圣物<b>的。

English: Maybe not, Master Geddy.
The doors in the Floating Continent act as defence gates.
Translated: 漂浮大陆的大门拥有防御机制。

English: He'll surely be trapped in there,<30><nl>until we can figure a way to open them.
Translated: 他肯定会被困在那里，<30>直到我<nl>们找到开门的办法。

English: Reactivating this teleporter would<nl>surely bring us back to that room.
Translated: 只要重启这台传送器，我们肯<nl>定能回到那个地方。

English: If memory serves, <30>there should be a<nl>way to reactivate it around here.
Translated: 如果我没记错的话，<30>这附近应<nl>该有重启它的方法。

English: Oh, alright! <30>Still...
...Let's hurry and try to find a way<nl>back <30>before Dirk reaches the relic!
Translated: ……我们还是要快点找到回去<nl>的路，<30>不然德克会比我们先拿<nl>到圣物！

English: Here we are guy! <30>The shop is right down there!
Translated: 我们到了，伙计！<30>商店就在右下方！

English: Go get your trinket bud!
Good <30>luck!
Alright fellas!
We can get down to <b>Tropos<b> over there.
Translated: 我们能从那边往下去到<b>对流区<b>。

English: So...
Your brother mentioned a <b>waterfall in Tropos<b>.
Translated: 你大哥提到过<b>对流区有一处瀑布<b>。

English: To find the <b>the pirate base<b>,<nl>we should look around down there.
Translated: 为了找到<b>海盗基地<b>，我们最好<nl>去那下面看看。

English: With Otus wings and my webs,<nl>we'll find it in no time!

English: No bloody chance! <30>That's not the <b>Pirate Way<b>!
Translated: 没门！<30>这可不符合<b>海盗之道<b>！

English: I would question whether we even<nl>follow the pirate way anymore.
Translated: 我对我们是否还要继续遵循海<nl>盗之道抱有疑问。

English: <b>Captain Molstrom<b> got us stuck here,<nl>and has yet to return for us.
Translated: <b>摩斯特罗舰长<b>害我们困在这里，<nl>却没有回来救援。

English: Are we proudly part of his crew,<nl>or just pawns in his ruthless plot?
Translated: 我们是他值得自豪的舰队成员，<nl>还仅仅是他残忍计谋中的棋子？

English: WHAT!?
YOU <30>DARE <30>stab at the Captain<nl>with your prissy accusations!?
Translated: 你<30>竟敢<30>在背后说舰长坏话！？

English: A real crew of pirates<nl>would never abandon each other.
Translated: 真正的海盗队伍是不会抛弃彼此的。

English: I would find deeper pride<nl>sailing the winds alone...
Translated: 我宁愿带着自己的尊严独自在<nl>风中航行。

English: ...than with an unprincipled band of thugs.
Translated: ……也不愿和一群没有原则的<nl>土匪在一起。

English: WHY YOU..!<30><nl>You'll pay for your treacherous words!
Translated: 什么你……！<30>你要为你的出言<nl>不逊付出代价！

English: I'll skewer you right where you stand!
Huh?
Did I just crash the party?
Translated: 我是不是刚好破坏了聚会？

English: You!?
I thought we got rid of-
I mean...
Help me get out of here!
You got it!
He-hey!
Wait just a minute!
You're that troublemaker from Vellie!!!
Translated: 你就是那个维里村的捣乱鬼！！！

English: And you're in league with the pirates!?
You distracted us during the<nl>attack on purpose didn't you!?
Translated: 在海盗进攻时，你是故意扰乱<nl>我们的，是不是！？

English: Pirates? Attack?<nl>What are you babbling about?
Translated: 海盗？进攻？你在胡说什么呢？

English: Dirk's my friend,<nl>I do what he tells me!
Translated: 德克是我的朋友，我只是在帮<nl>我的朋友！

English: You're just jealous because all you've<nl>got is feather-face over here!
Translated: 你肯定是在妒忌，因为你交到<nl>的朋友只有那边的羽毛脸！

English: <b>Twig<b>! Enough squabble!<nl>Let's get outta here!
Translated: <b>特维格<b>！吵够了！我们要离开这！

English: Righty-o!
Jump on and let's go!
Ummm...
Well...
I hope my musket did not leave too many scratches on you.
Translated: 我希望我的火枪没在你身上留<nl>下太多伤口。

English: You have remarkable resilience,<nl>and put up an honourable fight.
Translated: 你的坚毅让我印象深刻，战斗<nl>也是堂堂正正的。

English: Please accept my apologies.
We were desperate to get through<nl>these ruins, you understand.
Translated: 为了穿过这些废墟，我们差点<nl>丢了命，你懂的。

English: But that does not matter now.
I hope we can part<nl>without any ill will.
Translated: 我希望我们能和平道别。

English: Good luck finding your way out of this place.
Translated: 祝你能找到离开这里的路。

English: I say! How does it look in there?
Translated: 我说！船体情况怎么样了？

English: Whadda ya think it looks like?
Bah!
The final impact snapped what<nl>was left of her in half.
Translated: 最后的撞击把她折断成两半。

English: She's bleeding gears out her side<nl>for crying out loud!
Translated: 机油随着她巨大的悲鸣不断溅射。

English: What nonsense possessed the captain<nl>to have us fly through this death trap?
Translated: 舰长是听了什么鬼话才要派我<nl>们来飞越这个死亡陷阱。

English: Can it! We've got more important things<nl>to worry about, like how to get out of here!
Translated: 别说了！我们还有更重要的事<nl>要担心，比如说怎么出去！

English: Where's that Gawk pest gone to?<nl>Looks like she's carrying us out of here.
Translated: 那个白痴虫子去哪了？看来还<nl>需要她带我们出去。

English: Hm, she won't be able to carry both of us.
Translated: 嗯，她可带不动我们两个人。

English: So what the heck do you want us<nl>to do? Flip a coin and...
Translated: 那你他妈想让我们怎么做？<nl>是要抛硬币还是……

English: Hey!!!
We've got <b>company<b>...
A little Owl! Why hello th---!
The kid is wearing an authentic <b>Owl Cloak<b>!<nl>We could use that thing to bust this joint!
Translated: 那小子正穿着正宗的<b>猫头鹰斗篷<b>！<nl>我们能用那东西打破这个接合处！

English: Hmm...
Very well, it seems this is our last option.
Translated: 很好，看来这是我们最后的选项了。

English: Sincere apologies, young sir, we will<nl>have to take that cloak off your hands now.
Translated: 真的很抱歉，年起的先生，现<nl>在我们要夺走你的斗篷了。

English: Oh!
Great work up there!
My thanks!
Another predicament!
This seems a bit much<nl>for either of us to handle.
Translated: 看起来要单独解决问题对我们<nl>双方来说都有些困难。

English: Perhaps it would be best<nl>if we could work together?
Translated: 也许我们合作解决才是最好的方法。

English: The pirates will not want me back,<nl>and I am free to do as I please.
Translated: 海盗们不会想我回去的，我也<nl>算是个自由人了。

English: I, <b>Alphonse<b>, would be honoured to<nl>join your crew if you would accept me.
Translated: 如果你愿意接纳我的话，我，<nl><b>阿尔冯斯<b>，会很荣幸地加入<nl>你们的队伍。

English: Well, you DO seem more friendly than the other pirates.
Translated: 好吧，你看起来确实比其他海<nl>盗更友善。

English: And I have a feeling that other<nl>guy would have attacked us earlier<nl>if it weren't for you.
Translated: 而且我有种感觉，要不是有你，<nl>另外的那个家伙早就来攻击我<nl>们了。

English: What do you think, Otus?
Alright. I guess we'll take our<nl>chances with you... Alphonse.
Translated: 好吧。我想我们应该尝试和你<nl>组队……阿尔冯斯。

English: Just... don't get too surprised<nl>when you get teleported around.
Translated: 只是……当你被传送的时候可<nl>别太惊讶。

English: Hey guys, look!
I think...
...That's the entrance to the <b>Control room<b>!
Control room?
Yeah.
Our plan was to stop you-
I mean...
Our plan was to stop the wind machinery so<nl>the temple would block your fleet's path.
Translated: 我们的计划是暂停风力机器，<nl>这样神殿就能阻止舰队的前行。

English: It's the only way we can stop<nl>the pirates from reaching Advent.
Translated: 这是我们阻止海盗抵达爱文德<nl>城的唯一办法。

English: Are... <30>Are you with us on this Alphonse?
Translated: 你……<30>你会站在我们这边吗，<nl>阿尔冯斯？

English: Leaving the pirates is one thing...
Getting on their bad side is another.
Translated: 和他们作对又是另一回事了。

English: The pirates are threatening to attack <b>Advent<b>!
Translated: 海盗正威胁着要进攻<b>爱文德城<b>！

English: If you won't help us,<nl>why even bother to abandon the pirates!?
Translated: 如果你不帮我们，那又何必放<nl>弃当海盗呢？！

English: You left because of your pride?<nl>Are you proud of doing nothing?
Translated: 为了自己的尊严而离开海盗？<nl>你的尊严就是什么都不做吗？

English: I was so sure you<nl>claimed to be noble, <b>Alphonse<b>.
Translated: 我还认为你是个高尚的人，<b>阿尔冯斯<b>。

English: I have decided!
I will aid you!
It is true that the pirates have gone too far lately.<nl>As you say, I cannot simply stand by and watch.
Translated: 海盗们最近确实做的太过火了。<nl>如你所说，我不能袖手旁观。

English: If <b>Captain Molstrom<b><nl>truly aims to attack Advent...
Translated: 如果<b>摩斯特罗舰长<b>真的要攻击<nl>爱文德城……

English: ...We must stop it in any way we can!
I, Alphonse, would be proud to join your ranks!
Translated: 我，阿尔冯斯，非常荣幸能够<nl>加入你的队伍！

English: I knew we could count on you, Alphonse!<nl><30>Right, Otus!?
Translated: 我就知道你很可靠，阿尔冯斯！<nl><30>对吧，欧图斯！？

English: Now,<30> let's go!
We gotta get to the <b>Control room<b>!
Hmm, I seem to be stuck here.
Not the elegant sortie I was hoping for.
Translated: 我还以为很容易就能出去。

English: Perhaps you can find a way forth, little one?
Translated: 也许你能找到前进的方法，小家伙？

English: The lessons of history must be preserved.
Translated: 历史的教训应当被传承。

English: Even when that history is a terrible one.
Translated: 即使那段历史不怎么光彩。

English: With this token, you hold the key.
Translated: 拥有令牌，你就拥有了钥匙。

English: Find me at the Sanctuary.
And you will see what once was.
And what became of our fragile dreams.
Translated: 以及我们脆弱梦想所带来的结果。

English: Guys, I don't think we should leave just yet.
Translated: 伙计们，我觉得我们还不能离开。

English: Leaving the Owl Temple before we've<nl>reached <b>Advent<b> seems like a bad idea.
Translated: 在我们到达<b>爱文德城<b>前最好不<nl>要离开猫头鹰神殿。

English: ...And I don't want to anger Asio more than we need to.
Translated: ……而且我也不想让艾西欧生<nl>不必要的气。

English: Aye! I will stay behind and look for a way out.
Translated: 赞成！我会待在这里另找出路。

English: I won't stray too far from this<nl>vicinity, in case you should return!
Translated: 我不会走远的，以免你回来时<nl>找不到我！

English: I'll come with you if you need me Otus, but<nl>finding <b>Advent<b> should be our first priority!
Translated: 如果你有需要的话，我会跟你一<nl>起去，欧图斯，不过我们最优先<nl>的任务是找到去<b>爱文德城<b>的路！

English: Um, Otus...
What was that???
Oh my!
Guys!!! S-Stand back!
Ahhhhhh!
Master Otus, <45>Master Geddy.
Alphonse, <30>are we dead?
I think you can open your eyes.
AH!!!
What happened to it?
It just froze in place...<30><nl>I don't think the water did it any good.
Translated: 它凝固在那了……<30>我想它不怎<nl>么防水。

English: Is this another relic left here by the <b>owls<b>?
Translated: 这是<b>猫头鹰<b>遗留下来的另一件圣物吗？

English: Um, Master Geddy,
W-What are you doing?
OK! <30>YEAH! <30>Bad idea!
Translated: 好吧！<30>你说的没错！<30>这不是个<nl>好主意！

English: Let's <b>move<b> guys, before it does.
Translated: 我们<b>快走<b>吧，伙计们，趁它还<nl>不能动。

English: Hey! Over there!
It's the <b>Control room<b>! But...
All this machinery...
It looks like it's been broken for decades...
Translated: 看起来都像是坏了几十年……

English: But then<10>.<10>.<10>. <30>Shouldn't the temple be closed off?
Translated: 可这样的话<10>…<10>…<10>…<30>神殿不早就<nl>停止运行了吗？

English: The Professor said that this machine was blowing the islands apart...
Translated: 可教授说是这些机器在吹开岛屿……

English: Could he have been wrong..?
We have to hurry up, guys!
If we can't use this machine to<nl>slow the pirates down<10>.<10>.<10>.
Translated: 要是我们无法利用这些机器拖<nl>慢海盗的行动<10>…<10>…<10>…

English: ...They'll have a clear path to <15><b>Advent<b>!
Translated: ……他们就能畅通无阻地抵达<nl><15><b>爱文德城<b>了！

English: We might already be too late!
Let's go!
Oh!<20> Hello, Otus.
What brings you up here?
Translated: 是什么风把你给吹到这儿？

English: Well, now that the islands are coming apart<nl>and the rocks are floating upwards...
Translated: 如今岛屿四散，石头正不断地<nl>往上浮起……

English: I figured it was time to come back here.
Translated: 我觉得是时候回到这里。

English: To remember.
I grew up here in Advent, Otus.
Translated: 我是在爱文德城长大的，欧图斯。

English: This is where I learned how to swim.
Translated: 我在这里学会了怎么游泳。

English: How to build a house, how to fish.
That sort of thing.
I could never stop working back then.
Translated: 那时的我就是闲不下来。

English: Always had somethin' to do.
It's where I met my wife.
Translated: 在那里我遇见了我的妻子。

English: After that, I didn't<nl>need to work so hard.
Translated: 从那之后，我就没那么刻苦地<nl>工作了。

English: I had all I wanted.
Translated: 我拥有了我想要的一切。

English: Can you imagine that, Otus?
Translated: 你能想象那光景吗，欧图斯？

English: Such perfect peace.
I've missed her for so long now.
Translated: 虽然事情已经过去很久，但我<nl>心里一直想念着她。

English: I wish she could have come to<nl>Vellie and seen you grow up.
Translated: 我曾希望把她带到维里村，一<nl>起看着你长大。

English: But I buried her up here... In her home.
Translated: 但我还是把她葬在了这上面……<nl>就在在她家的位置。

English: And now that home is in ruins.
Translated: 可现在那个家也变成了废墟。

English: And the Professor says that the<nl>rest of the world is ending too.
Translated: 而且教授还说世界的其它地方<nl>也在走向终结。

English: I'm glad I met you, Otus.
Translated: 我很高兴能认识你，欧图斯。

English: With you and the other villagers in Vellie,<nl>I've had a life worth living.
Translated: 有你和其他村民的陪伴，我在<nl>维里村的生活也算是有意义。

English: Even though the world ended for me years ago.
Translated: 虽然对我来说世界早在多年前<nl>就已经终结了。

English: Thanks for listening to me, Otus.
Translated: 谢谢你听我唠叨，欧图斯。

English: I couldn't bring myself to say<nl>goodbye to anyone when I left.
Translated: 离开村子时我还没来得及和其<nl>它人说再见。

English: Just took the first ferry I could find!
Translated: 就这么登上了我能找到的第一艘船。

English: But we're like family,<20> all of us in Vellie.
Translated: 但我们，<20>维里村的所有人，依<nl>然是个大家庭。

English: And... it was scary to go up here alone.
Translated: 而且……一个人来这里多少有些害怕。

English: Now that you're here, I feel a lot stronger.
Translated: 现在你来了，这让我安心多了。

English: Ahh, feel that breeze, Otus!
It makes me feel like a young man again!
Translated: 它让我感觉又年轻了一回！

English: What's going on here?
Uh, where is everyone?
Alas, it has come to this.
Alphonse?
Listen, you two.<10> I need to hide for now.<20><nl>You cannot be seen with me here.
Translated: 听着，你俩。<10>我现在要躲起来了。<nl><20>不能被人看到你和我在一起。

English: When the time comes, summon me<nl>with your teleporter, Otus.
Translated: 时机合适时，再用你的传送器<nl>召唤我，欧图斯。

English: I must be off.
...What's he thinking<5>.<5>.<5>?
Let's go, Otus!
We've gotta check if Asio and the Professor made it in time!
Translated: 我们要去确认艾西欧和教授是<nl>不是赶得及！

English: <b>Otus!<b>
Don't just stand there! Get inside!
Hurry, you fool!
Ha<20> ha<20> ha!
Alright, soldiers!
It's going to be tough out there,<nl>but we have to succeed!
Translated: 外面的战况不太乐观，但我们<nl>必须成功！

English: Are you all ready?
Let's move out and save this city!
Translated: 让我们拯救这座城市吧！

English: Move it!
HEY!
Lay off Otus!
Be quiet, Geddy!
You're both to blame for this!
What?! <30>What for?
You idiots!
You were supposed to shut down the Owl Temple!
Translated: 你应该停止猫头鹰神殿的运作！

English: Did you think we sent you<nl>out to have fun?!
Translated: 你以为我们是派你出去玩的吗？！

English: ...Oh, how I wish I could have<nl>sent someone competent instead...
Translated: ……唉，我真希望当初能派其<nl>它有能力的人去……

English: H<20>-hey now...<30> There<nl>was nothing to shut down!
Translated: 嘿，<20>现在那里……<30>根本没东西<nl>需要关闭！

English: The control room was broken...
The Owl Temple has been shut down for years!
Translated: 猫头鹰神殿已经停止运作了好几年了！

English: The wind machinery was <30>never<30> active!?
Translated: 风力机器<30>从来就没有<30>启动过！？

English: Don't be ridiculous.<nl><50>We're all familiar with you and<nl>Otus's slackery!
Translated: 别开玩笑了。<50>我们都很清楚你<nl>和欧图斯喜欢偷懒！

English: Your actions are inexcusable, Otus.<30><nl>You bring shame to owls everywhere.
Translated: 你们的行为是不可饶恕的，欧图斯。<nl><30>你丢了所有猫头鹰的脸。

English: And most of all,<30> you<nl>bring shame upon me.
Translated: 最重要的是，<30>你让我蒙羞了。

English: This is quite enough, Asio.
Rather than blow up on this child,<nl>you should get to work defending Advent!
Translated: 与其在这大骂孩子，你更该去<nl>保卫爱文德城！

English: Strix, will you stop this silliness?
Translated: 斯吉克斯，你能阻止这无谓的<nl>争吵吗？

English: Absolutely, Kernelle.
Asio, we don't have time for this.<30><nl>As a fellow owl, you should know better!
Translated: 艾西欧，我们没时间理这些事<nl>了。<30>作为我的同辈，你应该很<nl>清楚事情的轻重！

English: The entirety of Captain Molstrom's fleet<nl>is raining down fire upon Advent.
Translated: 摩斯特罗舰长正带领全体舰队<nl>向爱文德城倾泻弹雨。

English: My students and I plan to carry<nl>supplies to the turret gunners<nl>and do repairs.
Translated: 我的学生和我会准备好补给品<nl>支援炮手，并负责修理的工作。

English: It will be dangerous, but<nl>it's the least we can do.
Translated: 虽然会有危险，但这是我们最<nl>低限度能帮上忙的事。

English: Is there no way to strike<nl>back at the pirates?
I'm afraid not.
Our only recourse is our turrets. The<nl>pirate <b>Dreadnoughts<b> are too heavily fortified<nl>to assault with our own ships.
Translated: 我们的武器只有炮塔。海盗的<nl><b>无畏舰<b>防御坚固，我们的船很<nl>难攻破。

English: We can only hope that our<nl>turret fire will ward them off.
Translated: 只有寄希望于我们的炮火能逼<nl>退他们了。

English: Bonacci! Fib! Let's go help the turret gunners!
Translated: 博纳奇！菲本！我们去协助那<nl>些炮手！

English: You and your student should<nl>do the same, Asio!
Translated: 你和你学生也该这么做，艾西欧！

English: If you can.
Solus<10>.<10>.<10>.<30> You keep guard here.
S<30>-Shouldn't we evacuate?
No.<30> We have to hold Advent.
Translated: 不，<30>我们必须死守爱文德城。

English: Stay here.
...Y-Yes!
I'm off to help too.
Otus.
You have caused enough harm.
You will stay in here.
I will lock the door behind me<nl>as I go to help the others.
Translated: 我等下会把身后的门给锁起来，<nl>之后就会去战场帮忙。

English: You are not fit to help the<nl>others protect the city.
Translated: 协助他人保卫城市的任务不适合你。

English: Kernelle, Solus... please see to it that these<nl>two do not do anything stupid while I'm away.
Translated: 科内尔、索鲁斯……在我离开<nl>期间请看住这两人，别让他们<nl>再做蠢事。

English: Pfft!
That stuck up old fool.
We must stop the attack<nl>on the city at once!
Translated: 我们要立即阻止海盗攻击城市！

English: How are we supposed to do that?
We've been locked in here.
And there's nothing that we<nl>can do against the pirate fleet.
Translated: 而且我们也无力对抗海盗舰队。

English: You must know that.
Nothing we can do?
Master Geddy, I do not share<nl>your pessimistic outlook!
Translated: 格迪少爷，我可不赞同你这种<nl>悲观论点！

English: I know <30>precisely how to stop them.
Hey! <45>You're a pirate, aren't you?
Translated: 对啊！<45>你不就是个海盗吗？

English: Do you perhaps have some<nl>information that could help us?
Translated: 也许你掌握了一些对我们有用的情报？

English: Of course! <30>We need to stop the <15><b>D<3>r<3>e<3>a<3>d<3>n<3>o<3>u<3>g<3>h<3>t<b>.
Stopping the <b>Dreadnought<b> could stop the entire fleet.
Translated: 阻止了<b>无畏舰<b>就能阻止<nl>整个舰队。

English: It's a massive ship, <15>but it's got one weakness!
Translated: 它是一艘巨大的战舰，<15>但它有<nl>一处弱点！

English: We can <b>sneak in through the bomb chutes<b>,<30><nl>and set off an <b>explosive charge<b>.
Translated: 我们可以<b>从炮管中溜进去<b>，<nl><30>然后引爆<b>炸药包<b>。

English: K[1]aboom!!! <45>And Advent would be safe.
Translated: 咔[1]嘣！！！<45>爱文德城就安全了。

English: That sounds very dangerous!
Otus, Geddy and myself are noble men!
Translated: 欧图斯、格迪和我自己都是高<nl>尚的人！

English: We do not care for trifles such as danger!
Translated: 我们都不关心自己是否危险这<nl>种小事！

English: Madam... <30>Kernelle?<60> Might I ask you<nl>for<30> the keys out of this building?
Translated: 科内尔……<30>女士？<60>能请你给我<nl>们<30>离开这栋建筑的钥匙吗？

English: I don't know...
Do I have any reason to trust you?
I.<10>.<10>.<30> I trust them!
Otus and Geddy are great guys!<30> They wouldn't lie!
Translated: 欧图斯和格迪是好人！<30>他们不<nl>会撒谎的！

English: Give these two brave souls a<nl>chance to show their worth.
Translated: 给这两个勇敢的灵魂一次展示<nl>自己价值的机会吧。

English: Here's a key.
If anyone asks us, we didn't see you go.
Translated: 如果有人问起，我会说没看到<nl>你们离开的。

English: Good luck out there!
Let's go, little one!
Don't look so down, laddie.<nl>If you made a mistake you'll<nl>make it right in time.
Translated: 别这么沮丧，小伙子。如果你<nl>犯了错，那就及时纠正它吧。

English: Take Asio and the Professor, for instance.
They've made plenty of mistakes.
Translated: 他们也曾犯过许多错误。

English: Only reason they're able to act all<nl>high and mighty now is because they've worked<nl>hard to set those mistakes right.
Translated: 他们现在能表现得如此高傲的<nl>唯一原因就是他们努力纠正了<nl>那些错误。

English: Listen, lady...
We didn't do anything wrong!
We defeated a giant mechanical frog guardian<nl>to get to the control room!
Translated: 我们打败了巨型机械青蛙守卫<nl>后才去到控制室！

English: But when we got there, it was already broken!
Translated: 但我们到那时，发现东西已经<nl>损坏了！

English: Like we said, the machinery wasn't on in the first place!
Translated: 就像我们说的，机器一开始就<nl>没启动过！

English: Really?
Yes!
That's very interesting!
It's been thought that the<nl>Owl Temple was responsible for the<nl>islands drifting apart from each other.
Translated: 人们一直认为是猫头鹰神殿在<nl>让岛屿彼此远离。

English: If the temple isn't causing it,<nl><30>then I wonder what is<20>.<20>.<20>?
Translated: 如果不是神殿在起作用，<30>那是<nl>什么原因呢<20>…<20>…<20>？

English: I'll have to look into this matter.
Where are my manners?
My name is Kernelle. I research biology<nl>and teach the children at this school.
Translated: 我叫科内尔。我专攻生物学，<nl>也在学校里教学生。

English: And I make rockets and bombs for fun.
Translated: 平时以做火箭和炸弹为乐。

English: Umm...
Pleased to meet you, Kernelle.
I'm Geddy, and this is Otus.<nl>We're best buds.
Translated: 我叫格迪，这是欧图斯。我们<nl>是最好的朋友。

English: I tend to speak for him, since he's a mute.
Translated: 我经常替他说话，因为他不能说话。

English: Well, pleased to meet you both.
I sure hope they don't hit my fuel storage...
Translated: 我真希望他们不要击中我的燃<nl>料库……

English: That would be quite a kaboom!
Translated: 不然就会噼里啪啦一通响！

English: Oh, don't look so down.
Just try to remain calm<nl>and keep your hopes up.
Translated: 只要保持冷静并心怀希望。

English: We'll get through this.
Good luck out there.
Blow those pirates sky high!
H-Hey...
I'm sure you don't want<nl>to talk right now, but...
Translated: 我知道你现在不想和人说话，<nl>但是……

English: I want you to know that<30> I believe you.
Translated: 我想让你知道，<30>我相信你。

English: You don't seem like the type to lie, Otus.
Translated: 你看起来不像是那种会撒谎的<nl>人，欧图斯。

English: I guess we've both been dumped in here.
I h-hope this all blows over.
Translated: 我希、希望这一切都快点过去。

English: This p-pirate attack seems to be quite huge!
Translated: 海、海盗的攻势看起来非常猛烈！

English: I mean...
How could it t-turn out like this?
Translated: 为什么会、会变成这样子？

English: I wonder how Strix, Bonacci and Fib are doing...
Translated: 我想知道斯吉克斯、博纳奇和<nl>菲本在做什么……

English: A-at least the t-two of us are safe here...
Translated: 至、至少我、我们两人在这是<nl>安全的……

English: I-I can t-tell you want to get out, O-Otus.
Translated: 我、我知道你、你想出去，<nl>欧、欧图斯。

English: If there was ever a time<nl>to call someone for help, it's now.
Translated: 要是有向别人求助的时机，<nl>那就是现在了。

English: G-Good luck out there.
And, um... be careful!
Ah! Master Otus!
How perfect that you have summoned me!
Translated: 你能召唤我真是太好了！

English: Quickly, we cannot waste time!
I must speak with you!
All of you, in fact!
Translated: 应该是，告诉你们所有人！

English: Man, that was close, guys!
This invasion is MASSIVE!!!
Translated: 这次入侵的规模可真大！！！

English: This battle does not<nl>bode well for your capital at all.
Translated: 这场战斗你们的首都处在劣势。

English: We will have to try to make our way through<nl>the siege lines and make a difference.
Translated: 我们必须突破封锁线，力求改<nl>变现状。

English: W-Well, we can't just charge through!
Translated: 但、但是，我们不能就这么冲<nl>过去啊！

English: We must try <b>not to be seen<b>.
If these pirates see you,<nl>they will hunt you relentlessly.
Translated: 要是被这些海盗看到，他们便<nl>会无休止地追击你。

English: Most pirates are near indestructible.
Translated: 绝大多数海盗你都是无法战胜。

English: So please be careful!
I'll help out as much as I can, Otus,<nl>but I don't think my pistol will help much here.
Translated: 我会用尽全力帮你的，欧图斯，<nl>虽然我不觉得我这把小手枪能帮<nl>上忙。

English: Go get the others.
I'll<10>.<10>.<10>.<30> be right here.
Heya.
You need to bring Anne here.
I need her to blow up the wall.
Translated: 我需要她来炸开这堵墙。

English: Thanks a lot for the help.
I'm going to take Anne back to safety.
Translated: 我先把安妮带回安全的地方。

English: Then it'll be time to look for our squad leader.
Translated: 然后再去找回我们的小队长。

English: I wonder where he went..?
Thanks a lot.
Let's hope Advent is still standing.
Translated: 希望爱文德城还没被炸毁。

English: Good luck out there.
I didn't say thank you.
I really appreciate that<nl>you helped me out.
Translated: 真的很感谢你能救我出来。

English: You should come visit my home<nl>in Advent when this battle's over.
Translated: 等战争结束后，请务必来我在<nl>爱文德城的家中做客。

English: Good luck out there!
You're tough, you can make it!
Huh!?
Oh, <15>excuse me, <30><nl>I was just taking a little nap!
Translated: 哦，<15>不好意思，<30>我刚小睡了一会！

English: <b>Anne<b>!
And an owl?
Well then! <30>Looks like<nl>our backup finally arrived!
Translated: 好吧！<30>看来我们的增援终于到了！

English: Thank you for helping, younglings!
Are you alright, lady?
Aye! <30>Now that I'm out of that cage,<nl>I can finally stretch my old bones.
Translated: 耶！<30>终于可以从笼子中出来了，<nl>现在我要伸展下这副老筋骨。

English: Gimme a second here!
AH!
Yup!
There might just be a<nl>little use in these old joints yet!
Translated: 这身老骨头应该还能派上点用场！

English: Might you be able to assist<nl>us through the barricades?
Translated: 你能协助我们通过门禁吗？

English: Assist you? <30>Ha<15>ha<15>, why<30> that's<nl>the reason we're here, son!
Translated: 协助你们？<30>哈<15>哈<15>，<30>那不正是我<nl>们来这的原因吗，小子！

English: Follow my lead, young ones!
These pirates sure got this place<nl>locked down tight, huh?
Translated: 这些海盗肯定会把这里锁得很<nl>死，对吧？

English: Move aside, children.
Bonanza will take care of this.
HIIIIYA!
WOW!
No time for gawking guys! <30>Go on ahead,<nl>I'll catch up with you at the <b>barricades<b>.
Translated: 没时间发呆了，伙计们！<30>出发吧，<nl>我会在<b>门禁<b>那跟你们会合。

English: Take care of my <b>Anne<b>, will ya!
Translated: 照顾好我的<b>安妮<b>，知道吗！

English: Th-<30>Thank you ma'am! <30>We will!
Translated: 谢、<30>谢谢你女士！<30>我们会的！

English: I can't walk very well,<nl>my leg's broken.
But thanks for helping me.
We need your help to bust open some barricades further down.
Translated: 我们需要你来帮忙炸开这下方<nl>的门禁。

English: Otus, maybe you can <b>carry<b><nl><b>her<b> to safety?
Translated: 欧图斯，你能<b>把她带到<b>安全的<nl>地方吗？

English: Master Geddy, that's a great idea!
Carry me?
What if he drops me?
Translated: 如果他把我摔了该怎么办？

English: Hahaha! Otus would never do such a thing!
Translated: 哈哈哈！欧图斯不会这么做的！

English: Isn't that right, Master Geddy?
Of course!
Uh...
Yes!
Um...
...I'm not sure this is a good idea.
Hahaha! Never!
HAHAHAHAHA! O-Of COURSE not!
Translated: 哈哈哈哈哈！肯、肯定不会！

English: AAAAAAAAAAAHHHH!!!
Translated: 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！

English: Come now, let us get you out of here!
Translated: 来吧，让我们把你带出去！

English: Umm... Alright.
If you want to get into the hangar,<nl>we should free <b>my partner<b> as well.
Translated: 如果你们想进入机库，那还要<nl>把<b>我的同伴<b>也救了。

English: She's a bit further in.
Translated: 她被关在更里面的地方。

English: I'm gonna put my faith in you<nl>and let you carry me around.
Translated: 我决定相信你，让你带着我飞。

English: Please don't drop me.
What<30> is<30> [1]THAT!?!?
That, Master Geddy, is<15>.<15>.<15>.
[1]AHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!
[1]We're all gonna die!!!
Not yet, but..!
It's reloading!!!<nl>Find cover, <15>QUICKLY!
Wh-<30>Who's in there?
Is<5>.<5>.<5>. Is it safe?
Oh man, am I glad to see friendly faces!
Translated: 哦天啊，真高兴能看到了老面孔！

English: There're pirates everywhere!
Nowhere is safe!
Wha-?
PIRATE!!!
WE'RE ALL GONNA DIE!!!
Hey! Listen!
He's one of us!
He's helping us find a<nl>way to stop the pirates!
Translated: 他在帮我们寻找阻止海盗的办法！

English: Keep your wits about you, friend,<nl>I am indeed here to assist you.
Translated: 听好了，朋友，我确实是来帮<nl>助你的。

English: Really?
Well,<15> you do seem more gallant than<nl>these other ruthless invaders.
Translated: 好吧，<15>你看起来的确比那些残<nl>酷的入侵者更正气。

English: Alright, I'll trust you!
OK, listen...
Our demolition squad was captured<nl>further up in the pirate base.
Translated: 我们突击小队的成员被抓到了<nl>海盗基地的上方。

English: We can't proceed beyond the<nl>pirates' <b>barricades<b> unless we save them.
Translated: 要是不把她们都救出来，我们<nl>是无法通过海盗<b>门禁<b>的。

English: You guys might be able to get up there real quick!
Translated: 你们应该很快就能去到那里！

English: The squad consists of <b>Anne<b> and <b>Bonanza<b>!<nl>Free them!
Translated: 小队成员有<b>安妮<b>和<b>伯南扎<b>！<nl>救出她们！

English: I, uh...
I'll just<40>... prepare to fight<5>.<5>.<30><nl>...Over by those... bushes.
Translated: 我会<40>……为战斗做准备<5>…<5>…<30>…<nl>地点就在那边的……树丛。

English: Good luck out there.
Psst!
We need to get rid of this <b>barricade<b> to get out!
Translated: 我们得解决这个<b>门禁<b>才能出去！

English: If you free my subordinates,<nl>we can blow it up!
Translated: 如果你能救出我的部下，我们<nl>就能把它炸开！

English: They're right up ahead, so...
I'll just wait here<nl>while you set 'em free!
Translated: 我就在这等着，你们去救他们吧！

English: That's right, <30>I'll be right<nl>here waiting for you!
Translated: 是的，<30>我就在这等你们回来！

English: So go free my subordinates.
Translated: 你们放心地去救我的部下吧。

English: Hey!!!
That's <b>Bonanza<b>!
Let's get her out of there!
Help!
Over here!
Hoi.
You ready, Bonanza?
Born ready, young one.
Translated: 我时刻都做好了准备，年轻人。

English: Alright! Here we go!
OK guys! <30>Say farewell to this here <b>barricade<b>!
Translated: 好了，伙计们！<30>跟这个<b>门禁<b>说<nl>再见吧！

English: Three...
Two...
One...
Done.
Phew, <30>you've done good, Bonanza!
Alright, guys...
Guys? Are... <15>are you alright?
Oh...
Haha. <30>Yeah. <30>We're cool!
Translated: 哈哈。<30>还好。<30>我们只是在装酷！

English: Hehe. <30>That's good!
We're gonna try and get out of here.
Translated: 我们会尝试从这里逃出去的。

English: I can't be of much more<nl>use with my leg broken.
Translated: 我这个瘸子只能帮你帮到这了。

English: Anyway. Thanks for helping us.
Translated: 不管怎么说。感谢你们的帮助。

English: At the end of this, I hope to see you guys again!
Translated: 希望战争结束后，我还能看到你们！

English: Aye, be careful out there younglings.
Watch out for them sinister tin-cans now!
Translated: 要时刻小心那些罪恶铁罐！

English: Psst!
Hey... Psst!
These pirates sure got this place locked down tight huh?
Translated: 这些海盗肯定会把这里锁得很<nl>死，对吧？

English: Well...
Not on my watch!
WOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAHHHHHHHH!
The escape route is shut!
What now!?
Aha! Another exit!
But I won't be able to reach it!
Otus!
OTUS!!!
Otus! Please get up!!!
Master Otus! We need to escape!
Translated: 欧图斯少爷！我们得逃出去！

English: Come now, Master Otus!
We'll need to gather our courage and get out of here!
Translated: 我们要一鼓作气离开这里！

English: Guys! Look!
It's the Dreadnought's engine!
We... <15>We made it!
We actually made it!
Let's rig this thing up and---
Translated: 我们赶紧把东西装上去——

English: I'm on it!!!
Alright, you guys!<30><nl>This thing is rigged to blow!
Translated: 好了，伙计们！<30>这东西已经绑<nl>上爆炸装置了！

English: Excellent work, Geddy!
Now, we should probably get out of he-
[1]We did it!!!
[1]We stopped the pirates!
Indeed, now let's g-
[1]We saved Advent!<nl>And all the people!
Translated: [1]我们拯救了爱文德城！以及大家！

English: [1]We're the best team ever!
True, true, but let's get mov-
...We're heroes, you guys.
We...
Uh-oh!
Wha-
Oh my!
Oh no! This is bad!!!
This is really bad!
Otus? <30>Geddy?
We have to get out of here, [1]QUICKLY!
Hup!
Don't fret, team! <nl><30>Leave this one to me!
Otus, <15>one of these doors should<nl>lead to the Dreadnought's engine.
Translated: 欧图斯，<15>其中一扇门应该能通<nl>往无畏舰的引擎。

English: When you find it, we'll help you destroy it.
Translated: 要是找到了，我们会帮你摧毁它的。

English: Hah...
HAHA<10>HA<10>HA<10>HA!!!
We made it!!!
It's just a question of time before<nl>the Dreadnought sinks!
Translated: 无畏舰的沉没只是时间问题了！

English: Heh.
He<15>he<15>he.
You guys sure are made of something else!
Translated: 你们这些家伙还真不是泛泛之辈！

English: Even in a real rough spot,<nl>we seem to make a pretty good team!
Translated: 即使是在艰难的环境下，我们<nl>也能组成优秀的队伍！

English: After this, I will no longer find<nl>a place among pirates.
Translated: 经过这些事后，我再也不用向<nl>海盗寻求容身之处了。

English: Instead, I will find comfort among friends.<nl><60>True friends.
Translated: 取而代之的是，我在朋友之中<nl>找到了的慰藉。<60>真正的朋友。

English: But let's not linger here.<nl>Let's take to the skies.
Translated: 但我们不能在这久留。我们飞<nl>到空中去吧。

English: Master Otus, would you mind---
Quick, let's...
Hahaha..!
Why, this makes sense!
How else would these buffoons<nl>get through our defences?
Translated: 我还在想这些蠢货是如何突破<nl>我们防线的？

English: You've been helping them all along.
And here you all are.
I'll finally be able to get<nl>revenge for your betrayal!
Translated: 我终于能够惩治你这个叛徒了！

English: Step back, <30>he's all mine.
I hoped that you would see sense.
Translated: 我希望你能看看眼前的光景。

English: All this destruction. <15>This chaos.
Is this really what we were created for?
Translated: 这真是我们被造出来的目的吗？

English: I suppose we shall have to fight here.
Translated: 我想我们不得不打一场了。

English: The Captain!?
He's here!?
<b>M-<30>M-<60>Molstrom<b>!!!
Master Otus, we must escape at once!
Translated: 欧图斯少爷，我们要马上逃走！

English: Grab Master Geddy and fly!
I'll go on ahead!
Come on Otus, let's...
Captain Molstrom, sir!
What are you doing on deck?<nl><30>Get back to your posts.
Translated: 你在甲板上做什么？<30>回去你的岗位。

English: At once, Sir!
Otus! Get up!!!
Oh no..!
Otus!
You have to fly away!
I-I'll try to stall him!
YAAH!
FOOLS!
Come to see your capital BURN?
Translated: 是来欣赏你们被焚烧的首都吗？

English: Well, take a good look.
OTUS, NOOOO!!!
The time has come at last.
You will get to watch.
Behold the destruction of Advent!
Otus, I'm.<10>.<10>.<10> not sure what I want to do now.
Translated: 欧图斯，我<10>…<10>…<10>不知道现在该<nl>做什么。

English: None of the stuff we do<30> seems to work.
Translated: 我们所做的努力<30>似乎都是无用功。

English: Maybe everyone's right when they say that we're just in the way.
Translated: 也许大家说得对，我们只是在<nl>碍事而已。

English: I guess Alphonse knows best. <30>Maybe<nl>we should just follow him from now on?
Translated: 我想阿尔冯斯最清楚这点。<30>也<nl>许以后我们都该听他指挥？

English: He seems to know what's going on<5>.<5>.<5>.
Translated: 他看起来知道发生了什么<5>…<5>…<5>…

English: Maybe it's best if you and Alphonse go.<nl><60>Like, <30>without me.
Translated: 也许让你和阿尔冯斯组队才是<nl>最好的。<60>而不是<30>，和我组队。

English: Maybe we'll have a better shot<nl>if we just stay here in Vellie.
Translated: 如果一开始我们就待在维里村，<nl>也许现在会有更好的结果。

English: That way, we can't mess anything up.
Translated: 那样，我们也不会搞砸任何事了。

English: Maybe we can get our lives back on track again.
Translated: 也许我们的生活能重新步入正轨。

English: Maybe I could finally settle down with<5>.<5>.<5>.
Translated: 也许我最终能安顿下来<5>…<5>…<5>…

English: Phew...
It's good to take a break every<nl>once in a while, don't you think?
Translated: 偶尔休息一下也挺好的，你说呢？

English: I think we're on the right path, Otus.
Translated: 我想我们的计划是对的，欧图斯。

English: We should probably use that <b>teleporter<b> to get back<nl>into the floating continent when we're ready.
Translated: 等我们收拾好后，就利用<b>传送阵<b><nl>回到漂浮大陆。

English: Although... I wouldn't mind relaxing a bit first.
Translated: 不过……我不介意稍作休息。

English: ...Are you feeling alright, Master Otus?
I can see that your wounds have recovered, but...
Translated: 我知道你的伤口已经好了，但……

English: Not every hurt can be patched up just like that.
Translated: 并非所有伤口都能通过包扎来解决。

English: ...I am sorry, Otus.
Feel free to stay here with me if you want a break.
Translated: 如果你想休息，请尽管待在我身边。

English: Do you feel better?
A warm fireplace makes most things slightly better.
Translated: 一个温暖的壁炉能让很多事情<nl>顺心点。

English: And I do not know if my company means anything to you, but...
Translated: 我不知道我的陪伴对你有多大<nl>帮助，但……

English: I am very glad to be in your company.
I will be here as long as you need me.
Translated: 只要你需要，我就会在你身边。

English: I am glad to see that you have cheered up somewhat.
Translated: 很高兴看到你变精神了点。

English: It will get better, Otus.
Translated: 事情会好起来的，欧图斯。

English: Let us hope that our friend Geddy recovers<nl>from this ordeal as well.
Translated: 让我们祈祷我们的朋友格迪能<nl>从折磨中振作起来吧。

English: Perhaps you should check on him?
I have been in hiding since we got here, but<nl>I know he has been in the graveyard a great deal.
Translated: 我到这后就一直藏着，但我知<nl>道他常去墓地。

English: The Floating Continent is high in the sky.
Translated: 漂浮大陆在天空的高处。

English: If you head up after leaving Vellie,<nl>you will reach it eventually.
Translated: 如果你在离开维里村后一直往<nl>上飞，迟早你会去到那里。

English: I shall wait here until<nl>you get out of the city.
Translated: 在你离开村子前，我会一直待<nl>在这的。

English: Hmmm, I do hope Master Geddy will be alright.
Translated: 嗯，我希望格迪少爷能够好起来。

English: Am I to understand that Advent was his home?
Translated: 据我了解爱文德城是他的家乡？

English: I don't think a pirate attack will<nl>happen here in Vellie for a while.
Translated: 我认为这段时间海盗不会再攻<nl>击维里村。

English: Molstrom's first priority will be to get<nl>his hands on the third and <b>final<b> relic.
Translated: 摩斯特罗的首要任务是拿到第<nl>三件也就是<b>最后一件<b>圣物。

English: We'll leave the village when you're ready Otus.
Translated: 要是准备好了我们就离开村子<nl>吧，欧图斯。

English: The final relic should be in the Floating Continent.
Translated: 最后的圣物应该在漂浮大陆。

English: It would seem Vellie is recovering, albeit slowly.
Translated: 虽然很慢，但能感觉到维里村<nl>正在恢复生机。

English: It should be fine to wait here<nl>for a while and recuperate.
Translated: 这段时间在这边等边疗养挺好的。

English: I'm troubled by what we saw<nl>in the Floating Continent, Otus.
Translated: 在漂浮大陆看到的状况让我很<nl>担心，欧图斯。

English: Dirk seems to have abandoned his pride entirely.
Translated: 德克似乎完全抛弃了自己的尊严。

English: The way he treated that spidery<nl>rascal is not like the Dirk I knew.
Translated: 他对待那个蜘蛛混蛋的态度和<nl>我认识的德克完全不同。

English: But of course the most important thing<nl>is that we get the Relic before him.
Translated: 当然，最重要的是抢在他之前<nl>拿到圣物。

English: We don't want to idle here too long.
Translated: 我们不能在这闲晃太久。

English: If we are to infiltrate the pirate<nl>base, we must find a way in.
Translated: 如果我们要进入海盗基地，就<nl>得找到潜入的路线。

English: Twig's family mentioned a <nl><b>hidden path<b> in Tropos, I believe?
Translated: 特维格的家人曾说过在对流区<nl>有一处<b>秘道<b>，对吧？

English: Perhaps we should start searching there.
Translated: 也许我们应该从那开始寻找。

English: I wonder what they might be<nl>planning to use the Relics for..?
Translated: 他们计划用那些圣物做什么……？

English: Is it only for power..?
Or do the Relics serve some other purpose?
I'm sorry, Master Otus.
There is so much to think about.
I am very old, and there are<nl>many memories to piece together.
Translated: 我年纪大了，有太多的琐碎记<nl>忆需要整理。

English: I can't help but feel like<nl>there's something crucial I've forgotten.
Translated: 直觉告诉我，有个关键信息被<nl>我遗忘了。

English: There are so many memories to piece together...
Translated: 有太多的琐碎记忆需要整理……

English: I can't help but feel like<nl>there's something crucial I've forgotten.
Translated: 直觉告诉我，有个关键信息被<nl>我遗忘了。

English: No-one knows what our original purpose was.
Translated: 没有人知道我们诞生的目的是为了什么。

English: Likely, we were merely <30>servants for the owls.
Translated: 似乎，我们只是猫头鹰的<30>仆人而已。

English: Using our strength, the owls could reach for higher knowledge.
Translated: 透过我们的力量，猫头鹰能获得更加深奥的知识。

English: They designed various models, each made for a specific function.
Translated: 他们设计了各种原型，每个原型都有其特殊功能。

English: We were expected to optimize.
Translated: 他们期望我们能被优化。

English: We would constantly improve our ability to carry out our function.
Translated: 我们不断地提升能力来完成自己的使命。

English: But as you know, <30>the ancient owls, and what remained of their cities,<30> all but vanished.
Translated: 但正如你所知，<30>古代猫头鹰和他们的城市，<30>都消失了。

English: Without their guidance, we continued our tasks. <30>Blindly. <30>For centuries...
Translated: 失去了他们的领导，我们依旧继续着自己的任务。<30>漫无目的地。<30>干了几百年……

English: Molstrom, greatest among the war units,<30> rampaged.
Translated: 摩斯特罗，最强的战争机器，<30>性情狂暴。

English: Built for war, he always needs something to destroy.
Translated: 因为他是为战争而造的，所以他总想摧毁东西。

English: None could oppose him.
Those of us who didn't agree to follow him <20>were exterminated.
Translated: 那些反抗他命令的人都<20>被消灭了。

English: Molstrom took us to the sky, and gave us a new name:
Translated: 摩斯特罗把我们带向了天空，并给予我们新的称号：

English: With him as our Captain, we roamed the sky, growing ever more powerful.
Translated: 在他成为我们的舰长后，我们的队伍开始在空中漫游，变得比以往更加强大。

English: Until at last the Captain heard of the Relics.
Translated: 后来，舰长听说了圣物的消息。

English: The Relics are artifacts of terrible power. <30>Remnants of the ancient owls at their peak.
Translated: 圣物拥有强大的力量。<30>里面残留着古代猫头鹰的强盛力量。

English: To Molstrom, their power is irresistible.
Translated: 对摩斯特罗来说，它们的力量是无法抗拒的。

English: Captain Molstrom has found two Relics.
Translated: 摩斯特罗舰长已经找到了两件圣物。

English: One that was hidden in Vellie...
And the other in Advent.
The Floating Continent.
Greatest of the owl homes.
The machines produced here were the<nl>finest the world has ever seen.
Translated: 这里生产的机器是世界上最好的。

English: For the first time, owl technology<nl>surpassed the capabilities of life itself.
Translated: 有史以来第一次，猫头鹰科技<nl>超越了生命本身的局限。

English: There seemed to be no end to the<nl>heights the owls could reach.
Translated: 猫头鹰所能到达的高度似乎永<nl>无止境。

English: So says the book of Noctae.
If<10>.<10>.<10>. I have chosen the right path<10>.<10>.<10>.
Was <30>that an acquaintance of yours?
Nope.
He sure knows his owl history though...
Translated: 不过他的确很了解猫头鹰的历史……

English: ...And it seems that he's following us.
If he's got anything to do with the<nl>attack on Advent, <30>I'll make him pay!
Translated: 要是他与爱文德城遇袭一事有<nl>关，<30>我绝不轻饶他！

English: Next time, <30>let's grab him!
Translated: 下次再见时，<30>我们抓住他吧！

English: H<5>m<5>m<5>m<5>, well, <30>we can certainly try.
Translated: 嗯<5>、嗯<5>、嗯，好吧，<30>我们确实<nl>可以试一试。

English: But our most important task is to get<nl>to that <b>last relic<b> before Molstrom does!
Translated: 但我们最重要的任务是要抢在<nl>摩斯特罗之前拿到<b>最后的圣物<b>！

English: OK, guys. <30>I-I'm not a huge fan of dark caves and...
Translated: 好吧，伙计们。<30>我、我不怎么<nl>喜欢阴森的洞窟而且……

English: ...I've heard <b><15>m[1]eat-<15>e[1]ating <15>gnats<b> thrive in these parts.
Translated: ……我还听说这里有许多<b><15>[1]喜欢<nl><15>[1]吃肉的<15>虫子<b>。

English: But, it's the only way forward!
Translated: 但，这是唯一能前进的路！

English: I'll stand ready with my <b>musket<b>, Master Geddy!
Translated: 我会备好我的<b>火枪<b>的，格迪少爷！

English: It's not much, but it may <b>provide us some light<b>.
Translated: 虽然不是很亮，但也可以为我<nl>们<b>提供光源<b>。

English: Thanks, Alphonse, that'll have to do!
Translated: 谢谢，阿尔冯斯，请务必那样做！

English: The captain will be pleased when we bring him this relic.
Translated: 我们把这件圣物带给舰长，他<nl>会很高兴的。

English: Hurry, nab it and let's skedaddle.
Alright!
Whoa, what's going on!
Argh, you must have rustled it somehow!
I'm gonna get out of here<nl>before you screw up everything.
Translated: 在你把事情搞砸前我要离开这里。

English: Hey, wait up!
AGAIN!? <30>You cowards!<nl><30>You <30>absolute <30>[1]COWARDS!
Translated: 又是你！？<30>你个懦夫！<30>你这个<nl><30>彻彻底底的<30>[1]懦夫！

English: You'll pay for what you've done!
Translated: 你要为你做过的事情付出代价！

English: Raaargh!
What crawled up green guy's butt!?<nl><30>He seems real mad for some reason!
Translated: 那个绿家伙吃了火药！？<30>他好像气<nl>疯了！

English: Who cares!
Just alert me the second they get through the door!
Translated: 他们闯进来时立刻通知我！

English: I don't have time for any more distractions!
Will do!
Make sure these fools don't get through here!
Translated: 一定不能让那些蠢蛋进来！

English: No problem
"There has been some infighting, and some of<nl>the main architects have left the project."
Translated: “由于意见存在分歧，一些主建<nl>筑师离开了项目。”

English: "They have been banished from the<nl>continent, and work continues."
Translated: “他们已经被逐出大陆，工程继<nl>续进行。”

English: "The light cradle is operational, and<nl>we have all the power that we need."
Translated: “光之摇篮顺利运行，我们获得<nl>了所需的能量。”

English: "Construction of the hex machine itself<nl>has been delayed due to the immense<nl>complexity of the structure."
Translated: “因为其结构复杂，魔法机器的<nl>建造已被推迟。”

English: "I hope I will see construction begin in my lifetime."
Translated: “希望我能在有生之年看到它开<nl>始建造。”

English: Oh my... I recognize this language.
It's written by an ancient owl.
Translated: 这是某个古代猫头鹰的记录。

English: Let me read it for you...
Hmm...
"IT'S A DISASTER IT'S A DISASTER<nl>IT'S A DISASTER IT'S A DISASTER..."
Translated: “这是噩梦…这是噩梦…<nl>这是噩梦…这是噩梦…”

English: It goes on like that for a while.
Translated: 接下来都是在重复这句话。

English: "The Hex Machine is beginning to take shape."
"I'm not sure anyone fully understands the design<nl>anymore, but initial tests have been successful."
Translated: “我不确定大家是否完全理解这个设<nl>计，但初步实验是成功的。”

English: "The light cradle is over capacity, and we<nl>are drawing power from the continent itself."
Translated: “光之摇篮出现过载，而且我们正从<nl>大陆本身汲取能量。”

English: "We will fire up the Hex Machine within<nl>a few years, when the Relics are charged."
Translated: “圣物在几年内就会完成充能，到那<nl>时我们便会启动魔法机器。”

English: "I wish my father could have been here to see this."
Translated: “我真希望父亲能在这见证这一切。”

English: "Clearing out this continent has taken a<nl>while, but we can finally begin our work."
Translated: “清理大陆上的东西花了一些时间，<nl>但我们终于可以开工了。”

English: "The work from the abandoned temple has paid<nl>off, and we have been able to make the<nl>local wildlife part of the theorem solver."
Translated: “来自废弃神殿的工作已经交付，而<nl>且我们已经了掌握把当地生物纳入<nl>工作方案的技术。”

English: "We'll augment them and make them<nl>excavate with the automatons."
Translated: “我们打算增加生物的数量，并让它<nl>们和机器人一起进行挖掘。”

English: "I estimate that within a few decades<nl>of excavation, we can begin construction."
Translated: “我估计再挖上几十年，我们就能开<nl>始建造了。”

English: You! Don't move, <30>o-<5>or I'll shoot!
Translated: 你！别动<30>，不<5>、不然我就开枪了！

English: H-hey!
Aw man! <30>He got away!
Why does this keep happening!?
Translated: 为什么老是发生同样的事！？

English: Hmmm. <30>That spider person...<30> He<nl>does not seem particularly malicious.
Translated: 嗯。<30>那个蜘蛛人……<30>看起来并<nl>没有太大的恶意。

English: If I were to guess, I'd say he<nl>does not know what trouble he is in.
Translated: 如果我没猜错的话，他可能不<nl>知道自己闯了多大的祸。

English: Dirk, however... <30>My former comrade.
Translated: 不过，德克……<30>我的前任搭档。

English: He trapped us in here with that, <30><b>thing<b>.
Translated: 他用那个<30><b>东西<b>把我们困在这里。

English: The next time we meet him,<nl>I fear we might have to<10>.<10>.<10>.
Translated: 下次再见之时，恐怕我们得<10>…<10>…<10>…

English: ...<15>Ah, no matter. <30>Let's find a way out of here!
Translated: ……<15>算了，不想了。<30>我们先找<nl>出口吧！

English: Alphonse!?
Thought you could weasel yourself<nl>back in with the pirates, huh?
Translated: 你觉得自己还能重归海盗队伍，啊？

English: You've even brought friends!
An owl, no less.
Funny how quickly you can change sides!
Translated: 你转变立场的速度倒是快得吓人！

English: Let's see how well he can fly,<nl><60>after I've cut his wings off.
Translated: 看我砍断他的翅膀后，<60>他还怎么飞。

English: Hey!
You're not ruffling a single feather on Otus, or...
Translated: 你最好别动欧图斯一根羽毛，<nl>不然……

English: ...Or you'll be sorry<5>.<5>.<5>.
Hahaha! Look at this guy.
It's Sir Greensalot!
YOU!!!
It's your fault!
All of Advent!
All of this!!!
Heh, maybe you should have<nl>stayed at your post in Vellie.
Translated: 嘿，也许你该待在维里村放哨。

English: Right, <b>Dirk<b>?
Shut up, <b>Twig<b>. You're as<nl>much of a loser as they are.
Translated: 闭嘴，<b>特维格<b>。你跟他们一样<nl>是个废物。

English: Huh?
Heh, don't worry, Goggles,<nl><b>I'm<b> not going to hurt you.
Translated: 嘿，别担心，目镜男，<b>我<b>不打<nl>算伤害你。

English: Not when I have someone to do that for me...
Translated: 因为有人会替我干这件事……

English: Huh!?
Wait!
Whoops!
Looks like you woke it up.
Dirk! What are you doing!?
It's been fun <b>Twig<b>, but<nl>we don't need you anymore.
Translated: 和你相处真是愉快，<b>特维格<b>，<nl>但我已经不需要你了。

English: What?! No!
BZZZT!
Boot sequence initiated...
Directive: Protect the Hex Machine.
Destroy all interloping agents.
Huh...
You again?
I don't know how you got past the defence system...
Translated: 我不清楚你是如何通过防御系<nl>统的……

English: But there's no way you're getting this relic before me!
Translated: 但你别想在我之前拿到圣物！

English: OK, guys, it seems there's more to this<nl>place than that <b>blob <15>monster<b> <30>thing.
Translated: 好吧，伙计们，看来这地方除了那<nl>个<b>变形<15>怪物<b>外<30>还有其它东西。

English: ...There's no telling what we'll encounter ahead!
Translated: ……不知道前面会有什么东西<nl>在等着我们！

English: Not to worry, Master Geddy.<nl><30>We've had some great progress!
Translated: 别担心，格迪少爷。<30>我们取得<nl>了不错的进展！

English: Isn't that right, Master Otus?
...<30>I think he's in a teleporter coma.
Hey, buddy. <30>It's going to be OK, man.
I'm always gonna be there for you!<nl><30>No matter what!
Translated: 我会永远陪着你的！<30>不论<nl>发生什么！

English: Now, let's go!!! <30>This place<nl>is nothing for the likes of us!
Translated: 我们快走吧！！！<30>此地不宜久留！

English: Hmmm. I think we need to find a way to reactivate this teleporter.
Translated: 嗯。我们需要找到重启传送器<nl>的方法。

English: I think there are some way to do this from Tropos.
Translated: 我想在对流区会有启动它的方法。

English: Once we activate it from Tropos, we<nl>should use the teleporter to get back here.
Translated: 只要能顺利启动，我们就能用<nl>传送阵传送回去。

English: That will surely trigger some kind of<nl>mechanism to help us open the security door.
Translated: 为了打开安全门，我们肯定需<nl>要触发某种开关。

English: How curious....
These displays are showing some schematics, along with a log.
Translated: 这些显示器展示了部分设计图，<nl>以及一份日志。

English: It says...
"The Hex is complete.<40> The world is destroyed.<40> Looping..."
Translated: “魔法完成。<40>世界毁灭。<nl><40>万物轮回……”

English: The [1]WORLD is [1]DESTROYED?!
WHAT DOES THAT MEAN???
Hmm...
"The Hex is complete.<40> The world is destroyed.<40> Looping..."
Translated: “魔法完成。<40>世界毁灭。<nl><40>万物轮回……”

English: Well, the world is definitely still out there.
Translated: 别慌，外面的世界肯定还在。

English: I wonder what the owls were doing in here.
Translated: 我想知道猫头鹰究竟在<nl>这做什么。

English: It sounds... like the work of madness.
Translated: 听起来……像是某种疯狂的事情。

English: I don't want to stay in this<nl>place any longer than we have to!
Translated: 我不想待在这鬼地方了！

English: Let's just get this Relic before<nl>Dirk does and get out of here!
Translated: 我们快点抢在德克之前<nl>拿到圣物离开吧！

English: Otus! Are you alright?!
We need to find a way out of here.
I think we're in over our heads!
Translated: 事情已经超出了我们的预想！

English: Let's look for an exit, Otus.
Translated: 我们找找出口吧，欧图斯。

English: Is the ground shaking?
Let's get out of here before it's too late!
Translated: 我们得快点离开这，不然就来<nl>不及了！

English: Oh man!
Urgh, I wish Twig would just quit the spider act<nl>and stay at home<20> like a normal stick bug.
Translated: 啊，我希望特维格不要再假扮<nl>蜘蛛了，<20>最好像普通的竹节虫<nl>一样待在家里。

English: How did you end up with Twig, anyway?
Translated: 说起来，你怎么会和特维格<nl>在一起呢？

English: Twig's always been a troublemaker,<nl>driving everyone nuts with worry.
Translated: 特维格一直都喜欢捣乱，这<nl>让所有人都非常忧心。

English: Don't tell Twig I said that,<30> the truth hurts the sensitive.
Translated: 别告诉特维格我刚说的，<30>实<nl>话总是很伤人。

English: Oh, you can't speak at all?
I guess that takes care of the problem!
...What are you whispering about over there?
We might look upper class to you,<nl>but times in Mesos are tough!
Translated: 你可能会觉得我们是上层人士，<nl>但实际上中间区的日子很难过！

English: There used to be rolling green hills here!
Translated: 这里曾是风吹草低的山地！

English: Now it's a frozen wasteland.
Translated: 如今也只是冰封荒原罢了。

English: All the more reason for Twig to stay at<nl>home, and stop with the silly adventures!
Translated: 所以我们才需要特维格放弃那些<nl>愚蠢的冒险，安心留在家里！

English: We could certainly use every<nl>helping hand we can get around here!
Translated: 因为每个能帮上忙的人手都很宝贵！

English: Tsch.
You want to take the shortcut to Strato?
Back for more shenanigans eh?
Well, make sure not to get us<nl>into trouble with the pirates OK?
Translated: 随便吧，千万别把我们卷入到海<nl>盗的麻烦中，行吧？

English: And... <30>take care of Twig will you?
Translated: 还有……<30>照顾好特维格，好吗？

English: Bro, Pa! The pirates<5>.<5>.<5>.
They've made their base here in Mesos!
Translated: 在中间区建了他们的基地！

English: Yes, we know that, Twig.
Translated: 是的，我们都知道，特维格。

English: It's worrisome, but we just have to accept it.
Translated: 这让人不安，但我们也只能接受。

English: ...B-but you have to evacuate!
No, Twig.
This is our home.
We won't evacuate just because<nl>there are some pirates nearby.
Translated: 我们不会因为周围有些海盗就<nl>离开这里。

English: Please!<30> You don't understand!
Translated: 求你了！<30>你们还不理解现状！

English: No!
We cannot let fear dictate our actions!
Translated: 但不能让恐惧驱使我们行动！

English: It seems I have to make you understand.
Let me show you up close how<nl>an adult stares death in the eye!
Translated: 让我靠近点告诉你大人是如何<nl>看待死亡的！

English: Just, <30>gimme a second here.
Pirates, huh? <30>I'll give you pirate!
Translated: 海盗，是吗？<30>我会教你如何对<nl>付海盗！

English: There you are, Twig!
Now, if you see a pirate, you have to-
Translated: 假如你现在看到一个海盗，你<nl>必须——

English: P-<15>P-<30>pirate!
Huh, what's that? <30>Speak up son.
Translated: 啊，你说什么？<30>大声点，儿子。

English: BIG PIRATE!
SEEK COVER!
Now, now!
We just want to talk!
Are<5>.<5>.<5>. <30>are you the pirate leader?
...Yes!
Yes?
Yes!
Hrum-um. <30>And I have come bearing<nl>news of our operation here in Mesos!
Translated: 嗯呵。<30>我要宣布我们在中间区<nl>的工作安排！

English: We are.<5>.<5>.<5> Um, we are planning to...<30> <5>E<5>r<5>r<5>.
We are planning to build our<nl>sprawling citadel, <30>right here!
Translated: 我们准备在这建起我们阴森的<nl>大城堡！

English: Mesos will be the epicenter of our new rule!<nl><30>Rich in wealth and all manner of luxury!
Translated: 中间区会成为我们新的政权中心！<nl><30>这里会变得富有且奢华。

English: And we need Twig for, uh...
For, um....
...Cooking..?
...Cooking?
...Twig.
There is no need to play games.
If you want to leave with these friends<nl>of yours, you are free to do so.
Translated: 如果你想跟你的朋友一起走，<nl>我们不会阻止你的。

English: We may not like it, but we'll support you.
Translated: 我们也许不喜欢你这样，但我<nl>们依然会支持你。

English: But don't forget that this is your home.
Translated: 但别忘了，这里是你的家。

English: And we'll be here when you return.
Translated: 而且有我们在这等着你回来。

English: Is there anything we can help you with, Twig?
Translated: 有什么事要我们帮忙，特维格？

English: We need to get into the pirate base.
Alright.
There is a passage hidden behind a waterfall<nl>in Tropos that might take you there.
Translated: 在对流区瀑布后面有处秘道，<nl>也许能通往那里。

English: You might not remember, but we sometimes used it as kids.
Translated: 你可能已经忘了，但小时候我<nl>们曾去过那里。

English: I can take you to Strato, if you like.
Translated: 如果你想，我可以带你去平流区。

English: Thanks bro<5>.<5>.<5>.
Sorry for trying to trick you guys.
Translated: 我很抱歉刚才想骗你们。

English: Don't worry.
It would take more than a prank of yours to fool your old Pa!
Translated: 要骗过你老爹可不是件容易的事！

English: Now be on your way.
You have something important to do, don't you?
Translated: 你不是有重要的事情要做吗？

English: Do you want to go to Tropos straight away?
Translated: 你想马上出发去对流区吗？

English: OK, little one. Twig will help you home now, OK?
Translated: 好了，小家伙。特维格会帮你<nl>回家的，行吗？

English: He'll follow you when you leave.
Hi there, young one.
Still haven't found your way homeward huh?
You want Twig to help you on your way?
Translated: 你想要特维格帮你们回去？

English: I hope Twig hasn't caused<nl>too much trouble for you.
Translated: 我希望特维格没给你们带来太<nl>多困扰。

English: Twig's always been a... <30>special <30>case.
Translated: 特维格一直是个……<30>特立独行<nl>的<30>孩子。

English: But I'm glad some good friends turned up!
Translated: 不过我很高兴他能结交到一些<nl>善良的朋友！

English: Maybe you can recommend that Twig<nl>stay in Mesos and leave you alone?
Translated: 也许你能说服特维格留在中间<nl>区，而不是跟你离开？

English: I can hear you...
Oh, and try to tell Twig not to<nl>dress up in that silly costume.
Translated: 哦，告诉特维格别再穿那身滑<nl>稽衣服了。

English: Not to sound old-fashioned, but it<nl>D<5>O<5>E<5>S<30> shame our entire family.
Translated: 不是我古板，但他那身衣服<5>真<5>的<30>会<nl>让我们家族出丑。

English: I can still hear you...
...Between you and me, Otus...
Joking aside, I understand why Twig would want to leave.
Translated: 不开玩笑，我能理解特维格为<nl>什么这么想离开。

English: Every day here is colder than the last, and there<nl>isn't much company here except Roland and me.
Translated: 这里日渐寒冷，而且除了罗兰<nl>和我外没有其它虫陪他。

English: I just want to know that Twig stays out of trouble,
Translated: 我只希望特维格别再闯祸，

English: ...And comes back home one day.
Why. Is it visiting time again?
Make sure not to freeze out there!
It's getting colder by the day up here!
My son here will take you to Strato when you're ready.
Translated: 你要是准备好了，我儿子会带<nl>你去平流区。

English: Hey! Wait up!
That was a close call, huh guys?
Translated: 刚才真是千钧一发，对吧，<nl>伙计们？

English: But we did it!
We're a great team!
Translated: 我们真是个了不起的团队！

English: Team?!
You helped the pirates attack Vellie!
Translated: 你帮助海盗攻击维里村！

English: You were still on their side<nl>during the attack on Advent!
Translated: 在海盗进攻爱文德城时，你还<nl>是他们阵营的！

English: You tried to get us killed<nl>in the Floating Continent!
Translated: 在漂浮大陆的时候，你甚至想<nl>杀死我们！

English: And you think you're on our [1]TEAM?!
Translated: 现在你自称是我们[1]团队的一员？！

English: I'm <60>sorry...
I- <30>I didn't realize what<nl>the pirates were up to...
Translated: 我<30>、我不知道海盗的意图……

English: I just wanted someone to hang out with.
We don't want your [1]company!!!
We don't want anything to do with you!
Translated: 我们不想跟你扯上关系！

English: Isn't that right, guys?
...Guys?
Alas...
I am hardly one to berate<nl>anyone for following pirates.
Translated: 我没啥资格指责别人跟海盗<nl>是一伙的。

English: I co-operated with them in the<nl>attack on Vellie together with Dirk.
Translated: 我、德克以及其它海盗都参<nl>与了对维里村的袭击。

English: And I am a pirate myself.
Translated: 而且我自己就是个海盗。

English: Are <30>you <60>[1]serious?
That's not the same at all.
Otus?
...Suit yourselves.
But I don't have to put up with this.
I'm... <60>I'm going back <30>to Vellie.
Is he <30>gone?
Aw man, <30>I didn't mean to cause any trouble.
Translated: 天啊，<30>我不是真的想闯祸。

English: I think <30>I'll go home now.
Hmmmm, well.
Do not worry, Master Otus, <30>Geddy will come around.
Translated: 别担心，欧图斯少爷，<30>格迪<nl>会想通的。

English: Meanwhile, let's try and find a way out of here.
Translated: 现在，我们得找个办法离开这里。

English: Hey! <60>You need some help over there?
Listen, <30>if you help me get back home,<nl><30>I'll help you get out of here.
Translated: 听着，<30>如果你愿意帮我回家，<nl><30>我就帮你离开这里。

English: I'll let you pick me up, but, <30>be careful<nl>not to tear my get-up, will ya?
Translated: 我允许你带上我，但是，<30>千万<nl>别弄坏我的衣服，知道吗？

English: So the pirates have set up their base here..!
Translated: 所以那些海盗在这里建了基地……！

English: Pirate <30>base?
But, <30>it's like, <30>right next door to my family's house!
Translated: 而且，<30>好像，<30>就在我家旁边！

English: Indeed. <30>This doesn't bode well.
Translated: 的确。<30>这可不是什么好兆头。

English: Perhaps Dirk acquired the final relic<nl>before the dungeon flooded?
Translated: 也许在地牢被淹没前德克就<nl>已经拿到了最后的圣物？

English: It looks like there's no way in...
...And even if there was,<30><nl>we'd be discovered immediately.
Translated: ……而且就算有办法进去，<30>我<nl>们也会被立即发现的。

English: We have to warn your family, Twig.
Translated: 我们必须警告你的家人，特维格。

English: If the pirate base is here,<30><nl>the occupation will only get worse.
Translated: 如果海盗真在这建了基地，<30>那<nl>这次占领行动只会变本加厉。

English: I can't believe I was suckered into working for these guys<20>.<20>.<20>.
Translated: 不敢相信我会被这些家伙骗去<nl>干活<20>…<20>…<20>…

English: No wonder my dad was suspicious of me.
.<5>.<5>.<60>Let's go warn 'em.
Shhhh...<30><nl>It's my family, <30>they're in trouble.
Translated: 嘘……<30>是我的家人，<30>他们有麻烦了。

English: Our inspection is over for today.
Don't try anything stupid if you value your lives.
Translated: 如果你们还爱惜自己的小命就<nl>不要做蠢事。

English: We won't cause any trouble.
Good. As long as you don't cause<nl>trouble, the <b>occupation<b> will be<nl>over before you know it.
Translated: 很好。只要你们不添乱，这次<nl><b>占领行动<b>很快就会结束的。

English: I'll be back tomorrow.
That scum destroyed half our furniture.
Translated: 我们半数家具都被那个人渣打烂了。

English: Tcheh!
At least they didn't find the wine cellar.
Let's just get back inside<nl>before they come back.
Translated: 趁他们还没回来，我们快进去吧。

English: It's too cold out here for my old bones.
Translated: 这里对我的老骨头来说太冷了。

English: Aw man, <30>I didn't think the pirates<nl>would cause trouble for MY family.
Translated: 天哪，<30>我没想过那些海盗<nl>会找我家人的麻烦。

English: I'd better go check on 'em!
Hmmmm.
Why are there pirates around here?
Translated: 为什么海盗会在这周围？

English: We should investigate this area, but...
Translated: 我们应该调查下这片区域，但……

English: ...I do not like this, Otus.<30> If we proceed,<nl>we need to be very, <30>very <30>careful.
Translated: ……我不喜欢这样，欧图斯。<nl><30>如果我们要进去的话，我们得<nl>非常、<30>非常<30>地小心。

English: I shall stay out of sight for now.
Translated: 我会躲在他们看不到的地方。

English: Do you think you could, <30>like,<nl><30>help me a bit over here?
Translated: 你可以过来，<30>嗯，<30>帮我一把吗？

English: I can't get past this ice here.
Alright! I think I can make my way home from here!
Translated: 好吧！到这里我就能自己回家了！

English: Thanks for the ride, fellas!
Translated: 谢谢你让我搭便车，伙计们！

English: Well. <30>That was fun<10>.<10>.<10>.
I wonder if my family was happy to see me at all.
Translated: 我不知道我家人是否乐意见我。

English: Surely they must have been somewhat worried?
Translated: 他们肯定会有点担心吧？

English: <b>Especially<b> <30>when there seems to be pirates about.
Translated: <b>尤其是<b><30>在周围疑似有海盗出<nl>没的情况下。

English: I doubt it. <30>Every time I come home,<nl>they go on about what a freak I am.
Translated: 我不确定。<30>每次我回家，他们<nl>都会说我是个怪胎。

English: Would you, like, <30>mind if I hang<nl>out with you guys for a while?
Translated: 你，嗯，<30>愿意让我多跟你们混一阵<nl>子吗？

English: Well, until you find a way outta here?
Translated: 好啦，就到你们找到离开的路前？

English: As it stands, Geddy has yet to return, <30>and<nl>we could certainly use your unique abilities!
Translated: 格迪还没有回来是事实，<30>所以<nl>我们肯定还要借用你的特技。

English: What do you say, Otus?
Really? You'll let me join?
Thank you!
I'll help you in any way I can!
OK. <30>I guess I'll have<nl>to help you get back home now.
Translated: 好了。<30>现在我得帮你们回家。

English: I'll assist you if you need me.
This guy was my neighbour when I was little.
Translated: 这家伙是我幼时的邻居。

English: He used to live here with his older brother.
They were always playing music into the night.<5>.<5>.<20><nl>Back when it was warmer up here.
Translated: 他们经常演奏至夜晚<5>…<5>…<nl><20>天气回暖时就会回来这里。

English: ...He must have gotten lost in the snow.
No-one ever told me about it<10>.<5>.<5>.
Perhaps this chest is his?
It contains a lot of sheet music,<20><nl>and some old drawings and trinkets.
Translated: 里面装有很多乐谱，<20>还有一些<nl>旧画和杂物。

English: And there's a note.
"Dear little brother...
I have put your things in this<nl>chest, so they can stay with you.
Translated: 我把你的东西都放在这个箱<nl>里了，这样它们就能陪伴你。

English: The songs we wrote together,<20> and many other moments we shared.
Translated: 里面有我们一起写过的歌，<nl><20>以及我们共度的时光。

English: I will not be coming to see you as often anymore.
Translated: 我不能再像以前一样经常地见你。

English: I have to go somewhere warmer.
The colder it gets, the more I sit in this<nl>cave, thinking of how I should have found you.
Translated: 外面越冷，我待在洞里的时间就越久，<nl>想着我本该找到你的。

English: In the cold,<30> you are all I can think of.
Translated: 在这严寒中，<30>你是我能想的全部。

English: But I promise I will not forget you.
Translated: 但我保证我不会忘了你。

English: I will bring both my drums<30> and your drums with me when I go.
Translated: 临走时我会带上我的鼓和<30>你的鼓。

English: I was never good at playing, but<nl>I still love the songs you made.
Translated: 我一直都不擅长演奏，但我依<nl>然喜欢你写的歌。

English: Maybe if I can make someone smile with it,<nl>it'll feel like you're listening to me play again.
Translated: 如果我能用它给人带来欢笑，<nl>也许能找回有你在旁聆听的感觉。

English: I hope one day I will only remember you<nl>when it's warm and things are good.
Translated: 希望有天气暖和，事情安定，心里只想念你的一天。

English: And I hope you don't miss me as much as I miss you."
Translated: 以及我希望你不会像我思念你<nl>一样思念着我。”

English: .<5>.<5>.<5>Let's put the note back in.<5>.<5>.<20> and close the chest.
Hey.<5>.<5>.<20> You don't know me,<20> but...
He found a nice place...
Translated: 我可以告诉你他找到了好地方……

English: .<5>.<5>.<5>And everyone really likes your music.
Translated: …<5>…<5>…<5>而且大家都很喜欢你的音乐。

English: We'll let you rest again now.
But he didn't forget you.
Come on, guys.
Let's give him some peace.
Man, do you know how to get rid of this ice?
Translated: 嘿，你知道怎么除去这些冰吗？

English: Can I help you with anything?
As you can see, they were right.
Translated: 正如你所见，他们说的是事实。

English: I'm a stick bug just like them.
Translated: 我跟他们一样只是一只竹节虫。

English: So boring...
At least I can be a spider<nl>when I'm not in here.
Translated: 至少不在这时，我还能当只蜘蛛。

English: I'm glad I can hang out with you guys.
That way I don't have to be at home.
Translated: 那样我就不必待在家里。

English: Lemme know when we're leaving<nl>so I can put on my suit again.
Translated: 走前通知我一声，我要穿回衣服。

English: Hi, pa. <30>Hi, bro.
I'm home.
Ah, <30>Twig? <30>Is that you over there?
...So it is!
And you brought home a friend!
Oh? Still hanging out<nl>with pirate friends then?
Translated: 哦？那你还和海盗朋友混吗？

English: T-<30>Twig hasn't brought a pirate<nl>into the house now?
Translated: 特、<30>特维格，你还有海盗朋友<nl>没带进屋？

English: This is Otus.<30> He's an owl.<30> From Vellie.
Translated: 这是欧图斯。<30>他是只猫头鹰。<nl><30>从维里村来的。

English: I wanted to check to see if you were alright-
Translated: 我想知道你们过得好不好——

English: You're still <b>pretending<b> to be a <b>spider<b>,<20> are you?
Translated: 你还在<b>假装<b>自己是只<b>蜘蛛<b>，<20>是吗？

English: You see, <30>Otus from Vellie, <30><nl>Twig here has always been a weirdo.
Translated: 如你所见<30>，维里村的欧图斯，<nl><30>特维格总是这么古怪。

English: <b>Dressing up as a spider<b> because<nl>it's 'c<5>o<5>o<5>l<5>er' <30>than being a <b>stick bug<b>.
Translated: <b>打扮成蜘蛛<b>是因为这<30>比当<nl>只<b>竹节虫<b>“更<5>酷”。

English: It <30>IS <30>cooler!
Enough, Twig!
Get out of that costume, and let's talk.
Translated: 脱下那身衣服，我们得谈谈。

English: Pa... Please, <60>not in front of my friend.
Translated: 老爸……求你了，<60>我朋友还在这里。

English: Just do it, Twig.
*<b>Sigh.<b>*
There. <30>Happy now?
Great!
We just want to ask a few questions<nl>without you looking like an idiot.
Translated: 我们只想问你几个问题，但不<nl>想看到你那蠢样。

English: So!
Are you home to stay this time?
OR are you still in league<nl>with those insistent pirates?
Translated: 还是继续和那些阴魂不散的海<nl>盗鬼混？

English: The pirates ditched me.
They were just using me.
And this guest here?<nl>Is he a delinquent like you?
Translated: 那这位客人呢？他也和你一样<nl>是个坏蛋吗？

English: ...Otus is a good guy,<20> bro.
He just wants to find his way back home.
Hmmm. <30>Well then. Make yourself at home, Otus.
Translated: 嗯。<30>好吧。把这当作自己家，欧图斯。

English: I apologize for the rude welcome.<nl>You can never be too careful these days.
Translated: 我为刚才粗鲁的欢迎方式道歉。<nl>这段时间大家都很些烦躁。

English: Welcome to the <b>Stick<b> family's home.
Tcheh!
Back, huh?
Lemme know if you need to<nl>get down there again.
Translated: 如果你要再下去一次，<nl>就跟我说一声。

English: I'll meet you outside.
Just... a second OK?
Hey, wait up! <30>I'll come with you.
Translated: 喂，等等！<30>我要和你一起去。

English: Just... <30>lemme put my threads back on.
Alright, follow me.
Alright! Tell me if you need any help.
