Translated: 好吧！需要帮忙的话就<nl>跟我说一声。

English: Here we are!
You'll find your way to Tropos from here!
Translated: 从这里走你就能找到去<nl>对流区的路。

English: Remember!
You will find the hidden entrance to the<nl>pirate base <b>behind a waterfall in Tropos<b>!
Translated: 你能在<b>对流区的瀑布后方<b>找到<nl>进入海盗基地的暗道！

English: By the way, <30><b>Twig<b>...
Did you, by chance, <30>notice any<nl>tremors on your way up here?
Translated: 上来时你有没有<30>注意到有什么<nl>东西在震动？

English: Oh yeah, <30>that was us!
Otus's friends woke up a <b>giant snake monster<b>!
Translated: 欧图斯的朋友吵醒了一条<b>巨型蛇怪<b>！

English: I had to come save 'em!
What?!
Did anyone get hurt?!
Are you OK?!
Don't worry, bro!
We're pretty tough.
Tcheh!
Just try not to get into trouble, OK!?
Bah, it doesn't matter.
Translated: 算了，不是什么重要的事。

English: Just be careful out there will ya.<nl>Come home from time to time.
Translated: 在外边时自己要小心。偶尔<nl>回家看看。

English: Take care in this passage as well.<nl>It's been long since I last used it.
Translated: 走这条路时你也要小心点。<nl>我有很长一段时间没走过了。

English: Might be monsters about.
Don't get into more trouble, or I'll tell pa!
Translated: 别再闯祸了，不然我会告<nl>诉老爸！

English: Alright..!
Let's have some fun!
Hey there, mister Owl!
You ready to fly?
That was some nice flying, sir!
I like you, sir!
Giddy up!
You are the master of <b>The Cannon<b>!
Use it whenever you want, guy!
Careful to not hit any walls, bud!
Go go!
You soar like the wind, bud!
Translated: 你翱翔的身姿像风一样，兄弟！

English: Alright, buds! He's in!
KA-
-BOOM!
Now!
Get ready for a R<5>E<5>A<5>L<5> flight!
Translated: 准备来次<5>真<5>正<5>的飞行吧！

English: Guys! <30><b>Start countdown<b>!
[1]THREE!
[1]TWO!
[1]ONE!
Huh? <45>Isn't it supposed <5>t<5>o<5>-
Um, <30>mister owl, <30>are you OK?
Translated: 嗯，<30>猫头鹰先生，<30>你还好吗？

English: He's up!
Then... He's ready for another go!
Translated: 然后……他准备好再次出发了！

English: Buds, look!
It's that owl guy!
Hurray!
Hurray!
You guys think he's ready for... <15><b>The <15>Cannon<b>!?
Translated: 你们觉得他准备好进入……<nl><15><b>大<15>炮<b>了吗！?

English: Owls are born ready, bud!
Translated: 猫头鹰打一出生就准备好了，伙计！

English: OK guy! <30>Get up here when<nl>you're ready, mister Owl!
Translated: 好吧伙计！<30>准备好了就上来吧，<nl>猫头鹰先生！

English: OK buds! <30>He's ready!!!
Translated: 好了兄弟们！<30>他准备好了！！！

English: Formation!
Opening hatch<10>!<10>!<10>!
Up, up-
- and away!
OK, mister Owl!
Step right in!
Don't even worry, bud!
[1]Hurray!
[1]Hurray!
[1]Hurray!
You did good, guy!
OK, buds! I think this owl<nl>has proved himself!
Translated: 好了，兄弟们！<nl>我觉得这只猫头鹰已经证明了自己！

English: [1]Wooh!
[1]Wooh!
Let's give him our <b>Buccanary Coins<b>! <30>She won't care, right!?
Translated: 把我们的<b>布卡娜里硬币<b>给他！<nl><30>她不会介意的，对吧！

English: I mean...
ALRIGHT! [1]Wring your pockets, guys!!!
Coins galore!
Please, <30>don't tell Buccanary!
[1]Wooh!
[1]Wooh!
[1]Wooh!
Hey!
Wait up, guy!
You... <30>you saved me earlier.<nl>From them flying beasties.
Translated: 之前你……<30>你从那些飞行<nl>怪兽手中救过我。

English: Stupid coins have no value, <30>not really!
Translated: 看来那些傻冒硬币也并非一无所用！

English: I want to give you something <15>s<3>p<3>e<3>c<3>i<3>a<3>l!
Please accept it, sir!
It's my most favorite thing ever! <30><nl>But I want you to have it!
Translated: 它是我最喜欢的东西！<nl><30>但我希望你能拥有它！

English: If you put it to your ear, you can<nl>hear whispers! <30>At least I do, <15>ha<15>ha!
Translated: 如果你把它放在耳边，你就能听见<nl>细语！<30>至少我能听见，<15>哈<15>哈！

English: Maybe it's the dead talking<5>.<5>.<5>.
WOAH, <15>THAT'D BE REALLY FREAKY!
But I hope you like it, sir!
Translated: 但我希望你能喜欢，先生！

English: I'll go over there now!
Gah, <30>enough of this!
Let's see you move out of this one!
Translated: 让我看看你怎么从这里出去！

English: Hmmm, the ship appears to be in complete lockdown.
Translated: 嗯，看来这艘船被锁死了。

English: Our mechanic companion might have<nl>made short work of these doors.
Translated: 我们的机械师同伴也许有办法<nl>处理这些门。

English: But since he is missing,<nl>we shall have to find another way.
Translated: 但他不在这里，所以我们得另<nl>外找一条路。

English: Hmm?
Come now my friend, do not worry yourself.<nl>I am sure Geddy is alright.
Translated: 放心吧，我的朋友，别太担心。<nl>我相信格迪会没事的。

English: That! <15>Or he's gotten himself eaten!
Translated: 那个！<15>也有可能他早被吃掉了！

English: Certainly not!
I have the utmost faith in our green comrade!
Translated: 我对我们的绿色同志抱有绝对<nl>的信心！

English: He is probably back in Vellie already, safe and sound!
Translated: 他有可能已经平安地回到维里<nl>村了！

English: Meanwhile, leave this one to me,<nl>as I might be able to open this door.
Translated: 这里让我来吧，也许我能打开<nl>这扇门。

English: We shall have to find the opening mechanism.
Translated: 我们得找到开门的机关。

English: It should be around here somewhere!
Intruders?
Prepare for annihilation!
Hi there... friend!
We're here to see my buddy, <b>Dirk!<b>
Translated: 我们是来拜访我的伙计<b>德克<b>的！

English: So step aside!
Um,
Whoa! That was harsh!
Otus! Let's teach this tin can a lesson!
Translated: 欧图斯！我们给这铁罐头上一课！

English: Aha, here we are!
If I find the lever in there, I can keep the door open for you,
Translated: 要是能找到拉杆，我就能帮你<nl>打开这扇门。

English: But I will need to stay here to keep it open.
Translated: 不过我需要留在这让门保持开着。

English: Voila!
Go ahead, Otus, I'll meet you on the other side.
Translated: 前进吧，欧图斯，我会在另外<nl>一边跟你碰头。

English: Huh, where'd you go to?
Fine, <30>I'll just smoke you out!
Ummmm... what is happening?
Oh no...
I... <30>I think the ship is leaving ground.
Translated: 我……<30>我想这艘船已经离开地面了。

English: There is no telling where we're going to end up!
Translated: 不知道我们会被带到哪去！

English: What if they're heading for <b>Vellie<b>!!!
Translated: 如果他们是朝着<b>维里村<b>进发的<nl>话该怎么办！！！

English: We need to find Alphonse! Fast!
Translated: 我们得找到阿尔冯斯！快！

English: Huh!
Oh, Master Otus!!!
Are you alright!?
Here, let me assist you.
Alphonse!
Where are we?
It seems we have locked ourselves into the ship's armory.
Translated: 看来我们把自己锁在这艘船的<nl>军火库里了。

English: They have enough firepower here to<nl>wipe out any remaining settlements with ease.
Translated: 这里的火力足以让他们毫不费<nl>劲地摧毁剩余的村落。

English: And even without this arsenal, Molstrom would still be<nl>unstoppable using nothing but the relics.
Translated: 即使不靠这些军火，使用圣物<nl>的摩斯特罗也是所向披靡的。

English: The only real chance we have is to acquire<nl>those relics, and use them against him.
Translated: 我们唯一的机会就是拿到那些<nl>圣物，并用它们来对付舰长。

English: Then we better move fast, I think<nl>this ship is headed toward <b>Vellie<b>.
Translated: 我们最好快点动手，我觉得这<nl>艘船正开往<b>维里村<b>。

English: This ship is unknown to me, but...
Translated: 我对这艘船不太熟悉，但……

English: I am certain we could use some of<nl>this firepower to get out of here.
Translated: 我肯定我们可以利用这些武器<nl>杀出去。

English: The relics have been secured.
We're prepped for take-off.
Good.
Plot a course toward the remaining settlements.
Translated: 去标绘通往剩余村落的航线。

English: And the <b>Owlboy<b>?
Translated: 那个<b>猫头鹰小子<b>怎么处理？

English: He comes and goes as he pleases.
Regardless, he serves no purpose now.
I will return to my quarters.
Do not fail me.
As always, Captain!
The captain doesn't consider him a threat.
Translated: 舰长不认为他是个威胁。

English: Good!
I'll take care of your<nl>treachery soon enough.
Translated: 很快我就会去解决你的。

English: Alphonse.
You're mine!
GAAAAAHHH!
Hehe, nice shot, Alphonse.
But I'm only getting started.
Translated: 不过我才刚刚热完身呢。

English: AAAARRRGH!
Gah.
Alphonse...
Please stop this!
If only we could-
SHUT UP!!!
You won't get away with your betrayal!
Translated: 你背叛了我们，你逃不掉的！

English: I'll get you for what you've done.
Translated: 既然做了这种事，我就要解决你。

English: I'LL GET YOU!
HURGGGGHH!
It...
It hurts.
It hurts really bad...
Alphonse...
You abandoned us.
You abandoned me.
Hehehe
I guess...
DIE! NOW!!!
You made it all the way up here.
Molstrom didn't even suspect<nl>you guys were coming.
Translated: 摩斯特罗甚至都没有想过你们能来。

English: Of course, I knew better...
Please.
Please, just let us<nl>through to Molstrom.
Translated: 请让我们过去找摩斯特罗。

English: There must be a way to stop this<nl>path of destruction that he has led us on.
Translated: 一定有办法阻止他带领我们走<nl>向毁灭的。

English: I have a little time before the<nl>Captain figures out you are here...
Translated: 在舰长知道你们来这前，我是<nl>还有点时间……

English: That...<nl><30>That means you will let us go?
Translated: 这……<30>意思是你会让我们过去吗？

English: Hardly.
We could solve this so easily if<nl>you just let me and my friends pass-
Translated: 只要你能让我和我的朋友过去，<nl>事情就简单多了——

English: FRIENDS!?
Why would you ever feel the<nl>need to seek such frailties?!
Translated: 你为什么会想要这种弱点？！

English: Pathetic...
Powerless...
Only weaklings who can't fend for<nl>themselves, will seek friendship.
Translated: 只有那些无法保护自己的弱者<nl>才会寻求友谊。

English: Just look at them!
Translated: 只要看着他们就能知道的事！

English: We were on our way to become<nl>the strongest, yet [1]YOU <30>abandoned us.
Translated: 我们正走在变成强者的路上，<nl>但[1]你却<30>抛弃了我们。

English: You're going to pay, Alphonse!
Translated: 你会付出代价的，阿尔冯斯！

English: You're all going to pay!
I-it's really him..!
MOLSTROM!
What's this?
Did the guards let you in?
Prepare yourself!
We've come to <10>defeat you!
...You're here to fight me?
T-<20>That's right!
Very well.
Hopefully you can at least entertain me<nl>until the relics are finished charging.
Translated: 希望在圣物完成充能前，你们<nl>至少能帮我解闷。

English: Then I will---
Huh?
What was that?
REPEAT!
THE OWLBOY HAS STOLEN THE RELICS!
Translated: 猫头鹰小子偷走了圣物！

English: WHAAAAAAAAAAT?!
THAT LITTLE PEST DOUBLE-CROSSED ME!
YOU!
HE SENT YOU HERE TO DISTRACT ME!
Translated: 他派你们来引开我的注意！

English: I'M GOING TO DESTROY ALL THREE OF YOU!!!
BLUGH!
Augh!
Master Geddy?!
Otus! Alphonse! Spider thing!
Translated: 欧图斯！阿尔冯斯！蜘蛛家伙！

English: No time to chat!
Let's get out of here, FAST!
Alarm!
The relics have been stolen!
Get him!
Alert the Captain!
Tell him <b>the Owlboy<b> has stolen the Relics!
Translated: 告诉他<b>猫头鹰小子<b>偷走了圣物！

English: I'm glad I caught him.
That was a long fall.
...Stay safe, Otus.
Don't follow me.
Master Otus?
Who goes there?
Me and Twig?
Yeah, we're good now.
We talked it out while you were sleeping.
Translated: 在你睡着的时候我们把话讲明白了。

English: Twig's just a big idiot, ha<15>ha!
Translated: 特维格只是个大白痴，哈<15>哈！

English: We have to find some way to<nl>get above the Mesos layer.
Translated: 我们得想办法前往中间层上空。

English: Do we know anyone who might know the way?
Translated: 我们认识的人中有谁知道路线<nl>的吗？

English: I like this place! <30>It's like our secret hideout!
Translated: 我喜欢这里！<30>这里就像是我们<nl>的秘密基地！

English: You live here?<30> It's great!
When all this is over, we<nl>should eat a big dinner here!
Translated: 等事情都结束后，我们要在这<nl>大餐一顿！

English: Just thinking about it makes me hungry!
So we need to get above the Mesos layer, huh?
Translated: 所以说我们是要前往中间层上<nl>空，是吧？

English: We don't have any ways of<nl>getting further up in my village.
Translated: 我们没有办法前往比我村子还<nl>高的地方。

English: My dad always said that to get further up,<nl>we'd have to use a flying machine from Advent.
Translated: 我爸常说如果要去更高的地方，<nl>就得乘坐爱文德城的飞行机器。

English: Of course, Advent is gone now...
Translated: 但是，爱文德城现在已经不在了……

English: Alright! I'll meet you outside.
I've been looking forward to this!
Hee hee hee!
Alright, let me know when you're ready.
Translated: 好吧，你准备好了就告诉我。

English: Hehe, no problem Otus! <nl><15>I'll be right up!
Translated: 嘿嘿，没问题的，欧图斯！<nl><15>我这就上去！

English: Who knew stairs would be<nl>a problem around here!
Translated: 谁能想到，上个台阶都能这么麻烦！

English: What <15>IS<30> this place?
Oh no!
Otus, <30>are you alright?
Oh man, you had me worried there.
Are you OK, man? <30>Can you fly?
Translated: 还好吗，伙计？<30>你还能飞吗？

English: Huh!? Did you break something?!
Translated: 哈！？你把什么东西弄坏了吗？！

English: Hmm... No, I don't think he has.
Translated: 嗯……不，我不认为是他的原因。

English: The air in this place is very thin.
Too thin to fly in.
Oh man. We're stuck up here.
Not exactly! <30>We should explore this place!
Translated: 不完全是！<30>我们应该探索下这地方！

English: Catch your breath, Master Otus. <nl><30>Geddy, Twig,<10> let's scout ahead!
Translated: 你先歇会，欧图斯少爷。<nl><30>格迪，特维格，<10>我们去前面侦察一下！

English: Alright!
Yes, sir!
Guess this is where that stranger is hiding!
Translated: 我猜这里就是那个怪人藏身的地方。

English: But how do we get in?
Hmm... What's this..?
This book is ancient... but I can read it.
Translated: 这本书很古老……但是我能读懂。

English: Book of Noctae,<30> volume 1.
The Owl Temple.
First of the great temples.
Here the owls learned how to control the<nl>elements and challenge the natural order.
Translated: 在这里猫头鹰学会了如何操纵<nl>元素及挑战自然秩序。

English: By the end of the first aeon, they<nl>had mastered water, fire, and wind.
Translated: 到了第一纪元末期，他们已经<nl>精通了水、火和风元素。

English: And their work here revealed to them<nl>the existence of the higher mysteries.
Translated: 他们在这里的研究向他们揭示<nl>了高阶奥秘的存在。

English: It was here that the existence<nl>of The Loop was hypothesized.
Translated: 就在这里，他们提出了轮回的假想。

English: The existential anguish from the<nl>discovery of The Loop permeated Owl society.
Translated: 轮回现象的发现引起了猫头鹰<nl>社会的不安。

English: Riots began, and the Owl Temple was abandoned.
Translated: 暴乱开始了，猫头鹰神殿也被<nl>废弃了。

English: Hmm... What's this..?
This book is ancient... but I can read it.
Translated: 这本书很古老……但是我能读懂。

English: Book of Noctae,<30> volume 2.
The Floating Continent.
Greatest of the owl homes.
The machines produced here were the<nl>finest the world has ever seen.
Translated: 这里生产的机器是世界上最好的。

English: For the first time, owl technology<nl>surpassed the capabilities of life itself.
Translated: 有史以来第一次，猫头鹰科技<nl>超越了生命本身的局限。

English: There seemed to be no end to the<nl>heights the owls could reach.
Translated: 猫头鹰所能到达的高度似乎永<nl>无止境。

English: They were determined to break the Loop,<nl>and worked tirelessly to advance<nl>their technology and knowledge.
Translated: 他们决定打破轮回，并且不知<nl>疲倦地工作以精进他们的技术<nl>与学识。

English: Finally the solution was presented: a <b>Hex<b><nl>that would upend the laws of the universe.
Translated: 最终得到的解决方案是：一种<nl>能颠覆宇宙法则的<b>魔法<b>。

English: But it was a disaster. The Hex failed,<nl>and the world would never be the same.
Translated: 但这演变成了灾难。魔法失败了，<nl>而世界也因此变得不同。

English: Hmm... What's this..?
This book is ancient... but I can read it.
Translated: 这本书很古老……但是我能读懂。

English: Book of Noctae, volume 3.
The Floating Tower.
A gigantic research facility in the sky<nl>built without the knowledge of the world at large.
Translated: 位于天空中的大型研究设施，<nl>建造时对世界的知识还没有深<nl>入了解。

English: The last few Owls gathered here, far away<nl>from the famines and wars elsewhere.
Translated: 幸存的猫头鹰最后都聚集于此，<nl>远离其它地方的饥荒与战争。

English: The Great Relics, that were used<nl>to create the Hex, were reforged.
Translated: 用来创造魔法的伟大圣物被重铸。

English: For the Owls were preparing <b>another Hex<b>.
Translated: 因为猫头鹰们准备施放<b>另一种魔法<b>。

English: Greater than the last, this <b>new Hex<b> would<nl>send the new world crashing downwards.
Translated: 这种<b>新魔法<b>比之前的更强大，<nl>它将使新世界坠落。

English: And<10>.<10>.<10>. And bring the world under the Owls' control once again.
Translated: 并且<10>…<10>…<10>…并且让这个世界重新<nl>回到猫头鹰的掌控之中。

English: So that's the truth he wasn't telling us.
Translated: 所以这就是他没告诉我们的真相。

English: He's been making the ancient Owls out<nl>to be heroes and scholars and whatnot...
Translated: 他一直将古代猫头鹰粉饰成英<nl>雄、学者之类的……

English: And in reality he's going to use the<nl>relics for power, just like Molstrom.
Translated: 实际上他是想利用圣物来获得<nl>权力，就跟摩斯特罗一样。

English: I knew it!
We have no choice now.
We shall have to stop him ourselves.
Yeah.<10>.<10>.<20> We're the only ones up here.
Let's go!<20> There's no time to waste!
Translated: 走吧！<20>没有时间可以浪费了！

English: Otus!
Get up, buddy! <30>We're not at the end just yet!
Translated: 起来，伙计！<30>我们还没结束呢！

English: There you go!
OK guys, let's keep moving<5>.<5>.<5>.
Translated: 好了，伙计们，我们继续前进吧<5>…<5>…<5>…

English: I <20>see you...
Did my machines and theories break the Loop at last?
Translated: 我的机器和理论最后打破轮回了吗？

English: Did I break the world?
With this token, you hold the key.
Translated: 拥有令牌，你就拥有了钥匙。

English: The Sanctuary beckons you.
Give me the answers I, <20>Noctae of the owls, have always sought.
Translated: 给我，<20>猫头鹰族的诺泰，一直在寻求的答案。

English: Oh man, where are we rising to?!
I think I can see the top<nl>of the tower above us.
Translated: 我好像看到了我们上方的塔顶了。

English: If we stay on this platform, we could<nl>still make it to where Solus is hiding.
Translated: 如果我们待在这个平台上，我们<nl>应该能到索鲁思的藏身处。

English: Whoa!
What's happening!?
AAAAAAHHH!
I <20>can't believe it.
I believe we are witnessing<nl><20>the end of the world, my friends.
Translated: 朋友们，我们正见证着<20>世界的<nl>终结。

English: We ourselves are floating, <20>the<nl>floating continents are rising into space...
Translated: 我们自己在飘，<20>浮岛也在往太<nl>空飘……

English: This <20>is the end.
It's happening so suddenly...
What has Solus done up there?!
Translated: 索鲁思在上面做了什么？！

English: Yeah!
Whatever Solus is doing up<nl>there, we have to stop him.
Translated: 不管索鲁思在上面做了什么，<nl>我们都要去阻止他。

English: I see his tower above us.
Translated: 我能看到他所在的高塔就在我<nl>们上方。

English: Let's go.
The Relics were designed to be the fuel for the Hex.
Translated: 圣物被设计为魔法的燃料。

English: Centuries after they were made,<30><nl>the owls were finally ready for their Hex.
Translated: 在创造了它们的几个世纪后，<30>猫头<nl>鹰终于完成了施放魔法的准备。

English: So what happened?
Did the Hex work?
It was the biggest disaster in the history of the planet.
Translated: 那是我们星球历史上最大的灾难。

English: But..!
The Anti-Hex!
You mentioned something about an Anti-Hex!
This library was built to find a way to bring<nl>the planet's expansion under control and reverse it.
Translated: 建造这座图书馆就是为了找到控制<nl>并逆转这个星球的膨胀方法。

English: When I found it, I learned that the owls created<nl>Relics which have been absorbing power for centuries.
Translated: 当我找到图书馆时，我发现猫头鹰<nl>创造的圣物已经吸收了数个世纪的<nl>能量。

English: Now they are ready to be used for the <b>Anti-Hex<b>,<nl>which will bring the islands back down to the ocean.
Translated: 现在它们可以用来施放<b>反魔法<b>，它<nl>能让岛屿降回大海。

English: THAT is what I'm preparing.
Translated: 那就是我准备要做的事。

English: An Anti-Hex to save the world!
Man...
You should have told us, Solus.
Translated: 你应该告诉我们的，索鲁思。

English: Why did you try to do this all on your own?
Translated: 你为何要独自承担所有事？

English: I got the pirates to help me by promising them power!
Translated: 我许诺会给海盗力量，让他们帮我！

English: ...Tricking the pirates led to the destruction of Advent, Solus.
Translated: ……欺骗那些海盗让爱文德城<nl>遭遇了毁灭，索鲁思。

English: I didn't know of anyone<20> who I could trust...
Let us help you finish this Anti-Hex.
Translated: 让我们来帮你完成反魔法吧。

English: C'mon, Solus. What do we have to do?
Translated: 来吧，索鲁思。我们要怎么做？

English: Y-You just have to-
Oh no!
Is that..?
Oh no!
Oh man, oh man..!
The Captain is here!!!
Look outside!
The world is...
It's all coming apart..!
You have run off with <20>m<10>y<10> relics, <30>Owlboy.
Translated: 你带着<20>我<10>的<10>圣物跑掉了，<nl><30>猫头鹰小子。

English: You DARE betray ME?!
I-I haven't b-betrayed you, Molstrom!
Translated: 我、我没有背、背叛你，摩斯特罗！

English: I'm t-trying to save you,<20><nl>and everyone else!
Translated: 我是打、打算救你，<20>以及其他<nl>所有人！

English: I'm trying to prevent the planet from being destroyed!
Translated: 我打算阻止这个星球被毁灭！

English: NOOO!!!
OTUS!
Are you alright?!
So you're saving the world, is that it?
Translated: 所以你是在拯救世界吗？

English: Why would I care if the planet is destroyed?
Translated: 我为什么要在乎这个星球会不<nl>会被毁灭？

English: Give the relics back to me now.
P-please!<30> I can't!
Urgh...
Otus! Take this!
What happened?!
Is Master Otus breathing?
Good. Get him out of here!
I'll keep the Captain at bay.
Hurry, Master Geddy,<20> Twig!
Translated: 快点，格迪少爷，<20> 特维格！

English: I can't hold him for long!
Uh... Uh..!
We have to get Otus up!
Urgh...
Hurry up and get away, Otus!
We'll hold him back!
Twig, follow me!
Hurry, Otus!
Otus!
We can't run away!
Please! <15>I can't move!
You have to complete the Anti-Hex!
Repair the totem! <10>Hopefully that will be enough...
Translated: 修好图腾！<10>希望那能…足…以……

English: Otus! Get out of there!
Otus!!!
OTUS!!!
The... the Anti-Hex..!
It's emerging from his body!
But... is he..?
Hm.
So this is what your treachery is about?
Translated: 所以这就是你不惜背叛我的理由？

English: You think this is enough to stop me?!
Hah! <10>I'll crush this little hex of yours!
Translated: 哈！<10>我会碾碎你这条小小的魔法！

English: Gahh..!
Otus!
Someone help Otus!
I told you, don't disturb me.
Translated: 跟你说过了，别来打扰我。

English: I'm at a critical stage in the process.
Translated: 我现在正处于关键的阶段。

English: I have to extract the relics' essence.
Translated: 我需要提取圣物的精华。

English: It'll be done soon.
Y-you're free to leave, you know!
Translated: 你、你们可以走了，明白吗！

English: You're just bothering me!
I'm through talking to you.
Now you listen to us!
Stop this power-crazy stuff!
Using the relics is going to get people hurt!
Translated: 使用圣物会让人受伤的！

English: No... You're wrong..!
I'm trying to help..!
By using the Relics?!
Don't you remember Advent?
Translated: 你忘了爱文德城的事吗？

English: Those things are weapons!
No!
That's not what the Relics were made for!
Translated: 圣物制造出来不是为了这种事！

English: That's just how Molstrom used them!
Translated: 那只是摩斯特罗的用法！

English: ...Please explain, Solus.
I didn't want to tell you this,<40><nl>but I need you to understand.
Translated: 我不想告诉你们的，<40>但我需要<nl>你们理解。

English: ...I'm going to tell you of<nl>the great shame of the owls.
Translated: ……我要告诉你们猫头鹰最大<nl>的耻辱。

English: <b>The Hex<b><10>.<10>.<10>.<10> And the <b>Anti-Hex<b>.
Bwagh..!
What are you doing?!
Have you gone mad?!
Snap out of it, Solus!
The relics are too dangerous!
Have you forgotten what happened in Advent?
Translated: 你忘了在爱文德城发生的事吗？

English: No-one can use them!<20> Ever!
Translated: 没有人能使用圣物！<20>没人！

English: We have to destroy them!
You have to see sense, Solus!
We will help you avoid the pirates'<nl>retribution, but please stop this!
Translated: 我们会帮你避开海盗的报复，<nl>但请先停下来！

English: Using the Relics for power will only make things worse!
Translated: 使用圣物的力量只会让一切变<nl>得更糟！

English: That's right!
We'll stop you if we have to!
Translated: 如果你再不停止，我们会阻止你的！

English: I don't have time for this.
I've been telling you guys to leave me alone.
Translated: 我已经告诉过你们别来打扰我。

English: I gave you lots of chances!
Translated: 我给过你们很多机会了！

English: But it's clear that you guys don't understand.
Translated: 但很明显你们并不领情。

English: So I guess I just have to make you leave!
H-huh?
How did you get up here?
Never mind that, Solus!
Quickly, we have to-
No.
I've t-told you already.
Translated: 我已经警、警告过你们了。

English: I'm not interested in what you h-have to say.
Translated: 我不在乎你要、要说什么。

English: But-
I'm using the relics.
T-That's all.
...I'm n-nearly finished here.
Please don't get in my way.
Memories of Vellie flood back to you...
Translated: 维里村的回忆如潮水般涌来……

English: I don't like this, Otus.
I thought Solus was our pal, but...
Translated: 索鲁思是我们的同伴，但是……

English: He just isn't listening at all.
Not to us, anyway...
Yeah.
I'm not sure what to do...
If he doesn't listen...
We may have to stop him.
He won't listen to us three, Otus.
Translated: 他不会听我们三个的，欧图斯。

English: I'm not sure what to do.
The Relics were created long ago,<20><nl>when the owls lived at the planet's surface,<nl>and the floating islands did not exist.
Translated: 圣物诞生于很久以前，<20>那时的<nl>猫头鹰还居住在星球表面，漂<nl>浮的岛屿还不存在。

English: Owl technology was beyond our imagination, and the<nl>owls studied the deeper secrets of the universe.
Translated: 猫头鹰的科技远超我们的想象，<nl>他们的研究甚至涉及到了宇宙<nl>深层的奥秘。

English: The Relics were made after the owls made a fateful discovery.
Translated: 圣物就是在猫头鹰发现这个决<nl>定命运的奥秘后被创造出来的。

English: A discovery that sent owl society into infighting and chaos.
Translated: 这次发现让猫头鹰社会陷入了<nl>混乱与斗争。

English: <b>The Loop<b>.
What is The Loop? I am not certain.<nl>But the owls were obsessed with it.
Translated: 轮回是什么？我不太清楚。但<nl>猫头鹰们对此十分执着。

English: They worked for centuries in a desperate struggle to find a way to <b>end The Loop<b>.
Translated: 他们绝望地奋斗了数个世纪，<nl>苦寻着<b>终结轮回<b>的方法。

English: Finally, they found a solution.
Translated: 最终，他们找到了解决方案。

English: A Hex that would alter the laws of<nl>nature to end The Loop forever.
Translated: 一条能够更改自然法则以永远<nl>终结轮回的魔法。

English: I don't even know if the Hex broke the Loop...
Translated: 我甚至不知道魔法是否打破了<nl>轮回……

English: That should have been the least of their worries.
Translated: 那本该是他们最不担心的问题。

English: The Hex backfired<60>, shattering the planet's<nl>continents into floating islands in the sky.
Translated: 但魔法发生了意外，<60>它将星球<nl>上的大陆击碎成了天空中漂浮<nl>的群岛。

English: And the planet was reduced to a giant empty ocean.
Translated: 整个星球只剩下一片巨大且空<nl>旷的海洋。

English: OWLBOY!
YOU TRAITOR!
I'M COMING FOR YOU!
Hi there, young'un!
Want to join me in the hot spring?
No? <40>You're a hard worker, Otus.
Translated: 不想？<40>你真沉迷工作，欧图斯。

English: Just like the other owls.
Otus! How has school been lately?
I hear Asio might take<nl>you under his wing soon!
Translated: 我听说艾西欧可能会把你招到麾下。

English: You're so lucky, Otus!
Hi, little Otus!
Want to drop by my place<nl>sometime with Fib and Bonacci?
Translated: 想和菲本与博纳奇来我这玩吗？

English: We'll play drums till the sun sets!
Translated: 我们可以拍鼓拍到日落！

English: Otus! Do say hi to Lettia and Scops from me.
Translated: 欧图斯！<nl>替我向乐提娅和斯考思问好。

English: I hear you'll be studying under Asio soon.
Translated: 我听说你不久后就要在艾西欧<nl>门下学习了。

English: He handpicked you, I heard.<nl><20>And I'm glad he did.
Translated: 我听说是他亲自挑选的你。<nl><20>我很高兴他能这么做。

English: I think you two will be a great fit.
Otus! I'm glad you're doing well!
Translated: 欧图斯！你做得很好！我很高兴！

English: Y-You don't recognize me? It's me, Solus.
Translated: 你、你不认识我了吗？<nl>是我，索鲁思。

English: Listen, umm...
I don't know if you think of me as a friend,<30> but.<10>.<10>.
Translated: 我不知道你是不是把我当朋友，<nl><30>但是…<10>…<10>…

English: I always thought of you as <20>m<20>-my <10>o<10>n<10>l<10>y<20> friend.
I hope the next time we meet, it'll<nl>be under different circumstances.
Translated: 希望下次再见的时候，情况会<nl>和现在不同。

English: There's <30>so<5>.<5>.<5>.<20> so much I want to tell you.
Whoa whoa!
Careful where you drop me, Otus!
Translated: 放我下来时小心点，欧图斯！

English: I'll be down here by<nl>the cannon if you need me.
Translated: 如果你需要我的话，我会待在<nl>大炮旁。

English: .<10>.<10>.<50>This is Aegolius.
Noctae<5>.<5>.<5>.<40> is gone.
One of my automatons<20> went amok.
Translated: 我的一台自律型机器人<20>暴走了。

English: I had it destroyed, but now...
I've lost my only friend<5>.<5>.<10>. and<nl>the genius behind the Hex Machine.
Translated: 我失去了唯一的朋友<5>…<5>…<10>…以<nl>及魔法机器背后的天才。

English: .<2>.<2>.<5>It's too complicated.
Noctae's schematics for the Hex Machine,<nl>and his theorems on the Loop...
Translated: 无论是诺泰的魔法机器图纸，<nl>还是他的轮回理论……

English: .<5>.<5>.<20>My own machine is only a pale imitation.
Translated: …<5>…<5>…<20>我做的机器只不过是个<nl>拙劣的仿品。

English: This is the best I have been able to come up with.
Translated: 这是我能做到的最好的程度了。

English: ...I redid the calculations.
The chances of catastrophic failure of the Hex Machine<10> are enormous.
Translated: 魔法机器<10>出现灾难性失败的可<nl>能性很高。

English: If it fails, the planet will never look the same again.
Translated: 一旦失败，这个星球就会天翻地覆。

English: Countless lives lost... and more lives ruined.
Translated: 无数物种将消失……更多生命<nl>会跟着灭亡。

English: ...Fifty-fifty.
Those are the odds of success and failure.
Translated: 这是成功与失败的概率。

English: Fifty-fifty!
And yet, if I don't complete this task - Noctae's life's work..!
Translated: 但如果我不去完成这个任务，<nl>那诺泰的毕生研究就……！

English: ...Then my soul will die along with him.
Translated: ……那样的话我的灵魂也会随<nl>他一同死去。

English: .<5>.<5>.<20>I have decided to lie to the other owls.
I will not tell them of the danger.
Translated: 我不会告诉他们这一危险。

English: The Hex Machine WILL be built.<20> The Loop WILL be broken.
Translated: 魔法机器会被建成。<20>轮回也将<nl>被打破。

English: You, my descendant...<20> You will be my backup plan.
Translated: 你，我的后裔……<20>将成为我的<nl>备用方案。

English: I will guide one with my crest to this place to listen to these words.
Translated: 我将指引有着我鬃毛的人至此<nl>聆听这些话。

English: Do not be alarmed.<10> That is within my ability.
Translated: 不必惊慌。<10>这种事情我还是能<nl>办到的。

English: Take the clues I have left behind here and follow them.
Translated: 找到我留下的线索并追寻他们。

English: I only ask...
...I only ask that you tell no-one.
No-one must know that I,<10> weakest among<nl>the owls,<20> and the disgrace of our kind...
Translated: 不应有人知道我这<10>猫头鹰中最<nl>弱、<20>抹黑族群……

English: ...Risked the doom of our world.
Translated: ……以及拿世界终结作赌注的鸟。

English: People must be able to trust each other,<20> even in a world with monsters like me.
Translated: 人们必须信任彼此，<20>即使这世<nl>上有我这样的怪物。

English: Good luck.
And Noctae.<5>.<5>.<30> I'm sorry.<5>.<5>.
Surnia convinced me to leave a message behind.
Translated: 瑟尼亚劝我留下一条消息。

English: I don't think even Aegolius knows.
Translated: 甚至连艾格里尔斯都不知道。

English: But I'm unsure what to say.
Mathematics and Philosophy are my<nl>callings, and the calling of my House.
Translated: 数学和哲学是我的天赋，也是<nl>我家族的天赋。

English: I never was one for talking, unless<nl>someone could pull the words out of me.
Translated: 我一直不太擅长与人交流，除<nl>非有人能引我说话。

English: Mathematics never lies.
It makes predictions.
If you master mathematics sufficiently, you<nl>will find that you can make extraordinary predictions.
Translated: 如果你非常擅长数学，你将发<nl>现自己能做出超乎寻常的推测。

English: The trajectory of a rock.<30> The orbits of the stars.
Translated: 投石的弹道。<30>群星的轨迹。

English: I learned those as a boy.
Translated: 在我还是小男孩的时候就学到<nl>了这些。

English: Now, as my maths is better, the predictions<nl>I make are somewhat different.
Translated: 现在，我的数学更加精进了，<nl>我开始进行各种推测。

English: I predicted my own death<20> to one of Aegolius's machines.
Translated: 我推测到我会<20>死于艾格里尔斯<nl>的机器。

English: Not once, but again and again in infinity.
Translated: 不止一次，而是永无止境地重复。

English: No matter how I adjusted the parameters, I saw<nl>my own death there as an eternal wave function,<20> over and over.
Translated: 无论我如何调整参数，我都能<nl>看到自己迎来死亡的未来波函<nl>数，<20>一次又一次。

English: And applied correctly, I could see every death.<30> Every life.
Translated: 而且只要正确代入参数，我就<nl>能看到自己的每次死亡和<30>每次<nl>人生。

English: Even<10> a young owl named Otus, who dies<nl>in a great battle above a floating city.
Translated: 甚至有只<10>名叫欧图斯的年轻猫<nl>头鹰，他将死于发生在漂浮城<nl>市的一场大战。

English: And yet, Otus, my maths tells me that<nl>you will be at this hologram.
Translated: 还有，欧图斯，我的数学告诉<nl>我你将看到这段全息影像。

English: A strange inconsistency.
.<5>.<5>.<20>Perhaps our Hex Machine worked, after all.
Translated: …<5>…<5>…<20>也许是因为我们的魔法<nl>机器最后成功了。

English: Tomorrow is the day that I die, Otus.
Translated: 明天就是我的死期，欧图斯。

English: It is my hope that by doing so, my prediction will come true.
Translated: 我希望通过这么做，让我的推<nl>测成真。

English: ...So that I will see you here today.
Translated: ……这样的话，我今天就能在<nl>这见到你。

English: And perhaps in the next Loop, I will not have to die after all.
Translated: 也许在下次轮回中，我可以不用死。

English: Maybe then<30> I could spare Aegolius some grief.
Translated: 希望那时<30>我能稍微缓解<nl>艾格里尔斯的痛楚。

English: Welcome, friend.
I am Surnia<20> of the House of Preservation and Diplomacy.
Translated: 我是保管与外交之屋的<20>瑟尼亚。

English: What you see before you<20> is my life's work.
Translated: 你现在看到的是<20>我奉献一生的工作。

English: The Eternal Sanctuary<40> - a place to record<nl>the thoughts of our leaders and artisans.
Translated: 永恒庇护所<40>——记录着我们<nl>领袖与巨匠思想的场所。

English: The brightest owls to ever have lived, they say!
Translated: 他们说这里有最聪明的猫头鹰<nl>活过的证明。

English: I hope that the knowledge enshrined here may aid you.
Translated: 我希望这里保存的知识能够帮到你。

English: And that you will share the wisdom<nl>of the owls<30> with all who care to listen.
Translated: 而且你也能把猫头鹰的智慧分<nl>享给<30>其它希望聆听的人。

English: Times are changing, it would seem.
Aegolius and Noctae<5>.<5>.<5>.<20> They sure are an incredible pair.
Translated: 艾格里尔斯和诺泰<5>…<5>…<5>…<20>他们<nl>绝对是一对不可思议的组合。

English: The Temple Guardians they made, terrifying as<nl>they are, have kept the temples completely safe.
Translated: 他们建造的神殿守卫，虽然很可怕，<nl>但可以保护神殿万无一失。

English: And now Aegolius tells me that Noctae<nl>has thought of a way to make thinking machines.
Translated: 而且艾格里尔斯告诉我说诺泰<nl>想到一种能够自行思考的机器。

English: Aegolius says he will put them into production soon.
Translated: 艾格里尔斯说他很快就会将它<nl>们投入生产。

English: My role as a combat instructor<10> may eventually no longer be needed.
Translated: 身为作战指导员的我，<10>可能最<nl>后也要退休了。

English: No wonder those two are never seen apart.
Translated: 除了那一直形影不离的两人。

English: Who else can truly relate to such brilliant minds?
Translated: 还有谁能真正理解这样伟大的<nl>思想呢？

English: I think Noctae is onto the discovery of a lifetime.
Translated: 我想诺泰正进行着他此生最重<nl>要的研究。

English: He's been locked up in his lab for<nl>ages, and speaks only in whispers about it.
Translated: 他已经把自己关在实验室里好<nl>几年了，与此相关的话题也只<nl>谈过寥寥几句。

English: Noctae is almost too brilliant.
Even Aegolius can barely keep up with his thinking.
Translated: 即使是艾格里尔斯也只能勉强<nl>跟上他的想法。

English: The automatons they've created have been revolutionary!
Translated: 他们创造的机器人是革命性的！

English: If Noctae believes his next discovery<nl>will be even greater... I can't even imagine what it will be!
Translated: 要是诺泰认为他接下来的研究<nl>发现是更加重要的内容……我无<nl>法想象那会是怎样的发现！

English: Whoa! It's <b>Asio<b>!
Oh no, wait.
He just looks like him.
...So this was Noctae's great discovery.
Translated: ……所以这就是诺泰的重大发现。

English: The Loop?
I am disappointed that most of the owls take this seriously.
Translated: 我很失望有那么多猫头鹰对此<nl>事太过认真。

English: No matter what he says, such a thing cannot be proven.
Translated: 无论他怎么说，这样的事情都<nl>是无法被证实的。

English: Of course Aegolius has taken Noctae's side, as he always does.
Translated: 当然艾格里尔斯跟往常一样，<nl>依然是站在诺泰那边。

English: Inseparable, those two. Even in failure.
Translated: 他们即使在失败的时候也是形<nl>影不离的。

English: It goes over my head, he says.
Translated: 这超出了我的理解，他说。

English: I suppose nothing can go over Aegolius's head,<nl>what with how big it got after he made the automatons.
Translated: 我想没什么能超出艾格里尔斯<nl>的理解，尤其是在制作出那些<nl>让他名气大增的机器之后。

English: Leeching off of Noctae's brilliance has made him quite the reputation.
Translated: 他的荣誉是靠吸取诺泰的聪慧<nl>获得的。

English: If he didn't have Noctae beside him, he would be no-one at all.
Translated: 如果没有诺泰，他不过是个庸才。

English: I will not be talked down to by a self-aggrandizing buffoon!
Translated: 我不会跟一个自吹自擂的丑角<nl>说话的！

English: ... ... of the ... ... House of Travel ... ...
... ... for these ... ... inventions.
Is it not the duty ... ... to roam the skies..?
Translated: 遨游天际… …不是我们的使命吗？

English: Let us ... ... ... free and healthy, and ... ... cherished.
Translated: 让我们… …自由与健康，并且… …珍视。

English: ... ... descendants ... find their own purpose.
... we have ... ... incredible ... Noctae!
This ... ... Loop, for ... ...
... lead ... of Farming ... ... support him!
... ... his debt.
Say, <30>Otus, <30>maybe we should get<nl>a little rest before we move on?
Translated: 话说，<30>欧图斯，<30>也许我们应该<nl>在行动前歇会？

English: Hmm, I think we should get moving to Advent.
Translated: 嗯，我觉得我们是时候出发去<nl>爱文德城了。

English: Better not give Asio a reason to throw another tantrum.
Translated: 最好别给艾西欧发脾气的机会。

English: Hey,<10> Otus!<20><nl>Don't forget about me!
Translated: 嘿，<10> 欧图斯！<20>别忘了我！

English: Hey,<10> Otus!<20><nl>Don't forget about me!
Translated: 嘿，<10> 欧图斯！<20>别忘了我！

English: Otus! Don't stray!
I need a word with you, Otus.<nl>Land here beside me.
Translated: 我有话要交代你，欧图斯。<nl>在我旁边着陆。

English: I don't think I'll be able to get any sleep tonight.
Translated: 我不觉得今晚还能睡得着。

English: We know how you feel, Master Geddy.
Translated: 我们明白你的感受，格迪少爷。

English: How about we talk about something else?
Translated: 要不我们聊点其它事吧。

English: You're right, Alphonse. <30>I need to put my mind at ease.
Translated: 你说得对，阿尔冯斯。<30>我需要<nl>让自己放松些。

English: And there are some things I'm really curious about!
Translated: 而且有些事情让我非常好奇。

English: Anything else you want to talk about?
Cloaked weirdo?
Who is this you're talking about, Master Geddy?
There was a strange guy outside<nl>the owl temple when he got there.
Translated: 他去那的时候，有个奇怪的家<nl>伙在猫头鹰神殿外边。

English: He was reciting some book...
Do you remember what he said?
Translated: 你还记得他说了什么吗？

English: Hm, let's see... he said...
The Owl Temple.
First of the great temples.
Here the owls learned how to control the<nl>elements and challenge the natural order.
Translated: 在这里猫头鹰学会了如何操纵<nl>元素及挑战自然秩序。

English: By the end of the first aeon, they<nl>had mastered water, fire, and wind.
Translated: 到了第一纪元末期，他们已经<nl>精通了水、火和风元素。

English: And their work here revealed to them the existence<nl>of the <b>higher mysteries<b>.
Translated: 他们在这里的研究向他们揭示<nl>了<b>高阶奥秘<b>的存在。

English: So says the book of Noctae.
Impressive recollection, Master Geddy!
Translated: 出色的记忆力，格迪少爷！

English: Does it mean anything to you, Alphonse?
Translated: 你听说过这些吗，阿尔冯斯？

English: I have heard of this Noctae, long ago.
Translated: 很久以前我曾听说过诺泰这个人。

English: I think perhaps I have read the book he speaks of.
Translated: 我可能曾经读过他所说的那本书。

English: But it's strange... It ends very abruptly.
Translated: 但这段话有些奇怪……它结束<nl>的非常突然。

English: I seem to recall that there was<nl>more about these higher mysteries...
Translated: 我隐约记得后面还有更多关于<nl>高阶奥秘的内容……

English: I don't remember much about the Relics' origin.
Translated: 我对圣物的起源记不太清了。

English: I know that they are made by the ancient owls,<nl>and that they contain extraordinary power.
Translated: 我知道他们是被古代猫头鹰制<nl>作出来的，并且储存着巨大的<nl>能量。

English: As you've seen...
I would guess that <b>Dirk<b> will be the one<nl>looking for the Relic in the Floating Continent.
Translated: <b>德克<b>就是那个在漂浮大陆上搜<nl>寻圣物的人。

English: Most of the other pirates are not <b>independent<b><nl>enough for missions like these.
Translated: 其它多数海盗都不足以<b>独立<b>完<nl>成这样的任务。

English: They were not made to improvise.
And the Captain usually does not do<nl>work he considers beneath him.
Translated: 舰长通常也不会和比自己低级<nl>的人合作。

English: Good!
If we see that guy again, I'll<nl>give him a piece of my mind!
Translated: 如果我们再次相见，我要好好<nl>修理他一顿！

English: As you say.
I've never been there before.
Do you know anything about it, Alphonse?
Translated: 你对那有什么了解吗，阿尔冯斯？

English: I was there... long ago.
You mean months ago?<40> Years ago?
Translated: 你是说几个月前？<40>还是几年前？

English: Hmm...
I think it would have been eight.<20>.<20>. maybe nine centuries ago.
Translated: 我想应该是八个…<20>…<20>…也许是<nl>九个世纪以前。

English: CENTURIES?!
You're that old, Alphonse?!
Translated: 你有这么老了吗，阿尔冯斯？！

English: Older.
But the farther back I think, the less I remember.
Translated: 但越久远的事我能记住的就越少。

English: I remember hearing talk of a great<nl><b>machine<b> built in the Continent.
Translated: 我记得曾听过有关在大陆上建<nl>造巨型<b>机器<b>的对话。

English: A machine built by the owls<30><nl>further back than I can recall.
Translated: 一台<30>远在我有记忆前就被猫头<nl>鹰建造出来的机器。

English: These days, the Floating Continent is half<nl>overgrown with plants and half submerged in lava.
Translated: 不过如今的漂浮大陆有一半覆<nl>盖着植被，另一半淹没在岩浆下。

English: A terrifying, inhospitable place full of beasts and pitfalls.
Translated: 那是充满了野兽与陷阱的可怕<nl>又危险的地方。

English: A good place for adventurers such<nl>as ourselves to prove our mettle!
Translated: 是个适合我们这样的冒险者证<nl>明勇气的好地方。

English: Umm...
Yeah...
Tell you about myself?
What do you want to know?
I don't know,<20> anything?
I've always wanted to be a dramatic actor.
Translated: 我一直想当一名戏剧演员。

English: I wanted to awe the world's finest from a stage!
Translated: 我想在舞台上让世上最伟大的<nl>人也为之惊叹！

English: Under Molstrom, I wasn't allowed to...
Translated: 还在摩斯特罗手下工作时，他<nl>不允许我这么做……

English: But when we have saved the world from the<nl>pirate threat, I hope to pursue that calling!
Translated: 但在我们从海盗的威胁中拯救<nl>世界后，我希望重拾这一梦想！

English: Huh, that's surprising.
You were created as a servant for the owls, weren't you?
Translated: 你是作为猫头鹰的仆人被创造<nl>出来的，是吗？

English: Were you made<20> for acting?
Translated: 你被制造出来是为了<20>表演吗？

English: Combat was never my specialty.
Translated: 战斗从来不是我的专长。

English: I much prefer acting.<5>.<5>.<5> and cooking!
In fact, I was made to serve<nl>in whatever manner I thought best.
Translated: 事实上，我是以能自行选择最<nl>好的服务方式为目的被制造出<nl>来的。

English: Not all pirates were as fortunate as I.
Translated: 并非所有海盗都像我一样幸运。

English: I'm just grateful that I found<nl>a more worthy master to serve.
Translated: 我很感激我能找到一个更值得<nl>侍奉的主人。

English: One who works for good.
Good idea, <30>I'm bushed.
Let's continue our journey tomorrow<nl>shall we? <30>We should get some rest.
Translated: 我们明天再继续旅程吧，怎么样？<nl><30>我们应该休息会。

English: So is there anything in particular<nl>you want to talk about, Otus?
Translated: 你有什么特别想聊的话题吗，欧图斯？

English: Anything else you want to talk about?
Let's see, what was it that guy said this time?
Translated: 让我们看看那家伙这回说了什么？

English: I think it was...
The Floating Continent.
Greatest of the owl homes.
The machines produced here were the<nl>finest the world has ever seen.
Translated: 这里生产的机器是世界上最好的。

English: For the first time, owl technology<nl>surpassed the capabilities of life itself.
Translated: 有史以来第一次，猫头鹰科技<nl>超越了生命本身的局限。

English: There seemed to be no end to the<nl>heights the owls could reach.
Translated: 猫头鹰所能到达的高度似乎永<nl>无止境。

English: So says the book of Noctae, blah blah.
Translated: 诺泰之书是这么说的，等等。

English: I wonder why he's telling us this.
Translated: 我不明白他为什么要告诉我们这些。

English: If there was no end to the height the owls could<nl>reach, then why are their temples all abandoned?
Translated: 如果猫头鹰真能达到无尽的高<nl>度，那为什么要废弃他们的神<nl>殿呢？

English: And even if he is telling the truth,<nl>why is he bragging so much about the owls?
Translated: 即使他说的是实话，他为什么<nl>要夸大猫头鹰的事呢？

English: And to us?
Translated: 而且为什么要对我们说呢？

English: It's almost like he's trying to cover something up.
Translated: 就像是要掩盖什么似的。

English: You know? Like he wants us to think<nl>that the owls were all super great.
Translated: 你明白吗？他越是想让我们觉<nl>得猫头鹰全都超级伟大。

English: Makes me almost think that they weren't.
Translated: 越是让我觉得他们并非如此。

English: I mean, why would any enlightened people<nl>make giant frog and snake monsters?
Translated: 我的意思是，如此有学识的人<nl>为什么要制造巨蛙和蛇怪呢？

English: I don't know who this guy is,<nl>but I say we grab him next time!
Translated: 我不知道这家伙是谁，但我觉<nl>得下回得抓住他！

English: I saw a guy sometimes that the<nl>pirates would call <b>the Owlboy<b>.
Translated: 我见过一个家伙，海盗们有时<nl>会叫他<b>猫头鹰小子<b>。

English: A small guy in a robe who was giving Molstrom advice.
Translated: 那个穿着袍子的小家伙总会给<nl>摩斯特罗出主意。

English: I think the pirate guard said that<nl>he's the one who stole the Relics.
Translated: 我想海盗卫兵说的偷走圣物的<nl>人就是他。

English: Owl boy, huh?
I wonder if that's just a nickname or a literal description?
Translated: 我想那只是个外号或是特征描述。

English: Whoever it is, he has much to answer for.
Translated: 不管他是谁，他要解释的事情<nl>可多了。

English: Well, we need to find a way up above Mesos...
Translated: 好吧，我们得找个办法前往中<nl>间区上空……

English: We'll just have to look<nl>for someone who knows how, I think.
Translated: 我们得找个知道怎么上去的人。

English: At least we'll have some time.
Even the pirate ships will struggle to get past Mesos.
Translated: 就算是海盗船也要费点功夫才<nl>能通过中间区。

English: I've never known the pirates to fail<nl>to get somewhere they wanted to go, but...
Translated: 我还不知道有哪里是海盗们去<nl>不了的，但……

English: It will likely take them some<nl>time to prepare their ships.
Translated: 他们应该会花些时间为船做准备。

English: Then that means we have time to explore!
Translated: 也就是说我们还有时间进行探索！

English: Well, it's still important to-
I've ALWAYS wanted to explore, Otus!
Translated: 我总是想要探索，欧图斯！

English: There's lots of caves and cool<nl>places in Tropos and Strato!
Translated: 在对流区和平流区里有很多洞<nl>穴和有意思的地方！

English: C'mon, we might even discover something useful!
Translated: 出发吧，也许我们能发现有用<nl>的东西！

English: Guys, let's GO<5>O<5>O<5>O<5> EXPLO<10>O<10>O<10>O<10>-
Yes, yes!
There will indeed be time to explore.
Translated: 的确还有些时间可以进行探索！

English: In the morning.
But he's right. If we explore, we might find<nl>some clues as to what's going on.
Translated: 不过他说得没错。要是我们能<nl>进行探索，也许能发现一些关<nl>于当前情况的线索。

English: It feels like there's still a few<nl>important things we don't know about.
Translated: 感觉还有一些重要的事情我们<nl>还不知道。

English: It looked completely abandoned...
Translated: 看来这里完全被抛弃了……

English: It's tragic to see our<nl>home in such a state.
Translated: 我们的家园变成了这种惨状。

English: It seems that islands have been coming<nl>loose and rising towards the sky.
Translated: 岛屿变得松动且朝着上空浮起。

English: It used to be that that was a rare event.
With that and the threat of a pirate attack...
Translated: 再加上潜在的海盗威胁……

English: ...It's no wonder that people are escaping...
Man, <20>I hope we can help them somehow...
Translated: 天哪，<20>我希望我们能帮助他们……

English: I am TWIG!
The GREATEST SPIDER IN THE WORLD!!!
I was born into a...
...pretty<30> boring family...
But through gruelling training and<nl>effort, I have become...
Translated: 但通过严格训练与努力，我<nl>变成了……

English: THE BEST!
BONA FIDE!
SPIDER!
Hmm...
And what does being the best spider entail?
Translated: 当最强的蜘蛛需要什么？

English: Come on, guys.
Everything about me is spidery.
And I can shoot webs and stuff!
Do you know anyone else who can do that?
Translated: 你还知道其它能这么做的人吗？

English: How did you make the costumes?
I sewed'em!
Pretty good, right?
You might be less of a doofus than I thought.
Translated: 你可能没我想的那么呆瓜。

English: I'm glad I can hang out with you guys!
Translated: 我很高兴能和你们在一起！

English: Tomorrow will be a blast, too!
Translated: 明天也会是热闹的一天！

English: Yeah, we need to get some sleep!
Let's explore tomorrow!
Hmm... It feels a bit lonely...
To be here without Geddy.
Maybe we should hit the sack early, guys.
Translated: 也许我们应该早点睡觉，伙计们。

English: I just feel guilty.
It's not your fault, Twig.
But the mood being what it is,<nl>sleeping might be best.
Translated: 心情不好时，睡一觉就好了。

English: We'll have a proper conversation at another time.
Translated: 我们换个时间再好好谈一谈。

English: Anything else you want me to tell you about?
Translated: 还有什么事想让我告诉你的？

English: Aw man, Otus, <30>we finally got to leave Vellie!
Translated: 天哪，欧图斯，<30>我们终于可以<nl>离开维里村了！

English: And you'll get to see <b>Advent<b> soon!
Translated: 你马上就能见到<b>爱文德城<b>了！

English: Though, <15>this isn't how I imagined we'd get there.
Translated: 虽然<15>和我预想的有些出入。

English: If you want to, <30>I'll tell you a little about it.
Translated: 但如果你想听的话，<30>我可以<nl>稍微介绍一下。

English: I don't know much about them, to be honest.
Translated: 老实说我对他们也不是太了解。

English: Mostly what I've heard in rumours.
Translated: 基本上我听到的都是传言。

English: We had a few skirmishes against them<nl>when I was in the army in Advent.
Translated: 当我还在爱文德城服兵役的时候，<nl>卫队和他们有过一些小冲突。

English: I never saw numbers like we just saw in Vellie, though.
Translated: 虽然我从未见过像维里村这种<nl>数量级的海盗。

English: But the pirates I saw always retreated<nl>as soon as we fired warning shots.
Translated: 但我见过的海盗一般都会在警<nl>告射击后立即撤退。

English: I'm sure we'll be fine.
I guess you've never been there before, huh?
Translated: 我猜你之前没去过那，是吧？

English: It's one of the oldest owl ruins that we know about.
Translated: 那是我们知悉的最古老的猫头<nl>鹰遗迹之一。

English: Still, it's a surreal place.
And it's huge!
There must have been owls<nl>everywhere back in those days!
Translated: 那里以前肯定到处都是猫头鹰！

English: We'll have to get deep inside the<nl>temple to get to the <b>control room<b>.
Translated: 我们要深入神殿才能到达<b>控制室<b>。

English: It'll be tough, but we can do it.
Translated: 虽然会很辛苦，但我们能做到的。

English: Aw man. <30>I really can't wait till<nl>you get to see <b>Advent<b>, Otus!
Translated: 天哪。<30>我都等不及让你看看<b>爱文德城<b><nl>了，欧图斯！

English: The shops! <30>The sights! <30>The people! <nl><30>There's so much to do in Advent!
Translated: 那里的商城！<30>那里的景点！<30>那里的人民！<nl><30>在爱文德城有太多事可以做了！

English: And, <30>I think Asio is overreacting, <30>I mean...
Translated: 而且，<30>我觉得艾西欧有些过度<nl>紧张，<30>我的意思是……

English: All the pirates in the world couldn't get past<nl>Advent's defences, <30>even if they wanted to.
Translated: 世界上没有任何海盗可以突破<nl>爱文德城的防线，<30>就算他们很想。

English: Ha<15>ha, <40>this whole situation<nl>is overblown if you ask me.
Translated: 哈<15>哈，<40>要我说的话，形势被过<nl>度夸大了。

English: At least I'm happy we get to<nl>leave the village for a while.
Translated: 至少我挺高兴我们能暂时离开村子。

English: You know. <30>It kinda feels like<nl>we're on <30>an a<3>d<3>v<3>e<4>n<4>t<4>u<4>r<4>e<4>!
Translated: 你知道的。<30>这感觉像是在进行<nl>一场<30>大<3>冒<4>险<4>！

English: Good idea, <30>I'm bushed.
Let's continue our journey tomorrow<nl>shall we? <30>We should get some rest.
Translated: 我们明天再继续旅程吧，怎么样？<nl><30>我们应该休息会。

English: You already have that on yer head!
Silly!
Hmmm. <15>Nope. <30>Doesn't look any better than last time.
Translated: 嗯。<15>不。<30>看起来没比上次好多少。

English: You already have that on yer head!
Silly!
Adventure in style!
Huh, you're already fuzzy wuzzy!
Translated: 哈，你已经变得毛茸茸了！

English: Be warm! Be safe!
It's for soup sir!
A green hat! Splendid color indeed!
Translated: 一顶绿帽子！<nl>真是漂亮的颜色！

English: It's for more soup! <30>Staves off starvation!
Translated: 装有更多的汤！<30>跟饥饿说再见吧！

English: An Accoutrement for a true gentlemen!
Translated: 适合真正绅士的随身装饰！

English: The thickest of soup!
For a keener aim, sir!
Translated: 能让瞄准变得更加精确，先生！

English: The finest of furs! Luxury!
For the a gent in need of firepower!
Translated: 给那些需要火力的人用的！

English: Ah yes, <30>an interesting object to be sure!
Translated: 啊，是的，那确实是<30>件有趣的物品！

English: Although... I can't quite reach it for you, sir.
Translated: 虽然……我无法帮你拿下来，先生。

English: A cloak of granditude! <30>The mark of a true Owl!
Translated: 幽灵斗篷！<30>真正猫头鹰的标志！

English: Let me hang that up for you, sir.
Translated: 让我帮你挂到上面去，先生。

English: A <b>Cool Soup Canteen<b> filled with my very own brew!
Translated: 装满了我酿造之物的<b>冷汤罐<b>。

English: Or, <30>it was, <30>until you drank it all!
Translated: 或者说，<30>曾经是满的，<30>不过<nl>被你喝光了。

English: Hurray!
Why, that's a dorky green hat!
Translated: 为什么，那是顶愚蠢的绿帽子！

English: It's utterly useless!
H<3>m<3>m<3>m<3>, <30>I'll let you have it<nl>if ye find a few more Buccanary Coins!
Translated: 嗯<3>、嗯<3>、嗯<3>，<30>如果你能找到更<nl>多的布卡娜里硬币，我就把它<nl>送给你！

English: It's a <b>Nice Soup Canteen<b>!
It be mine own recipe ye know!
But you already drank it, silly.
Ah yes, a finer hat indeed.
Translated: 啊，是的，确实是顶好帽子。

English: Not like that shabby green hat at all!
Translated: 和那顶蠢爆了的绿帽子完全不一样！

English: I'll let you have that one if<nl>ye uncover <b>1000<b> Buccanary Coins!
Translated: 如果你能找到<b>1000<b>枚布卡娜里<nl>硬币，我就把它送给你！

English: It's a <b>Great Soup Canteen<b>!
Wow!
I trust you enjoyed it!
Hmmm, it's a scope!
It's for a weapon of some kind!
It be a fuzzy hoodie!
It'll keep yer little bird noggin warm!
It contains fire!
Loads of fire!
I'm not giving that away! No sir!
Translated: 那个我是不会给你的！绝不，先生！

English: It's a secret!
Otus, I don't know if this is such a good idea!
Translated: 欧图斯，我不知道这主意好不好。

English: It's dark in here, and even more damp<nl>and claustrophobic than the Owl Temple!
Translated: 但这里面很黑，甚至比猫头鹰神殿<nl>还要阴暗潮湿！

English: Geddy, where is your sense of adventure!?<nl>There is nothing to fear as long as<nl>we're together! Let's press onwards!
Translated: 格迪，你的冒险精神呢！？只<nl>要我们团结一致，就没啥好怕<nl>的！我们继续前进吧！

English: Hmm, you might be right,<nl>but let's proceed with caution, alright?
Translated: 嗯，也许你说得对，但我们还<nl>是要小心前进，对吧？

English: I think he's gone.
We should probably go check it out.
Grab on, man!
Well, that takes care of that problem.
Translated: 好吧，看来门的问题解决了。

English: I guess <15>we're actually doing this, huh?
Translated: 我们<15>必须得进去了，对吧？

English: It's not like we have a choice.
Translated: 看来我们没有选择的余地。

English: Come on, gang! <15>Let us advance!
Translated: 来吧，伙计们！<15>让我们前进！

English: Hey, buddy, <15>you ready for this?
Hey, I've got your back, man.
Who needs flying anyway!
Let's go together!
HEY! <30>Wait up!
Solus! <15>We just want to help you!
Translated: 索鲁思！<15>我们只是想帮你！

English: The pirates are coming after you!
I know!
Then let us help!
Let's get rid of the relics, and..!
N-No!
I'm going to U<5>S<5>E<5> the relics!
Huh?
I don't have time to explain this to you!
Just g-get out of here!
Hurry, guys! We need to talk some sense into Solus!
Translated: 快点，伙计们！<nl>我们要说服索鲁思冷静些！

English: Huh!
Otus, <30>Geddy..? <30>What are you guys doing here?
Translated: 欧图斯，<30>格迪……？<nl><30>你们在这干什么？

English: Solus?! <30>What are [1]YOU doing here?
Translated: 索鲁思！？<30>[1]你在这里干什么？

English: Are you the one who stole<nl>the relics from the pirates?!
Translated: 是你从海盗手里偷走了圣物？

English: ...I'm sorry.
I<20>-I trust you, Otus, <20>but I can't<nl>involve anyone else in this.
Translated: 我<20>、我信任你，欧图斯，<20>但我<nl>不能把其他人卷进来。

English: ...I'm sorry, b-but I don't have time to explain.
Translated: ……对、对不起，但我没时间解释了。

English: Please leave.
He-hey! Wait up!
We have to catch up to him!
Ah, I remember you.
You were the one I defeated<nl>before I destroyed Advent.
Translated: 你是在我摧毁爱文德城前击败<nl>的那个人。

English: I'm glad you put up<nl>a better fight this time.
Translated: 我很高兴你能打得比上次好。

English: Now... it's time for round two!
Translated: 现在……是时候开始第二回合了！

English: YES! Amazing!
You saved our lives, Otus!
Translated: 你救了我们的命，欧图斯！

English: That's my best buddy for ya!
Now, I think it's time we<nl>see what's inside this relic!
Translated: 现在，是时候看看圣物内部藏<nl>有什么了！

English: You ready, Otus?
Oh...
I think I might have been here before.
Translated: 我觉得我之前来过这里。

English: Could we.<20>.<20>. look around a bit, Master Otus?
Translated: 我们能不能<20>…<20>…看一看周围，<nl>欧图斯少爷？

English: If you don't mind.
Thanks!
And the islands are still rising.
You must have seen it outside.
Translated: 你在外面的时候一定都看到了。

English: The world is ending. Time is running out.
Translated: 世界正走向终结。时间不多了。

English: In a matter of days, we'll all have<nl>risen to cold, unbreathable space.
Translated: 用不了几天，我们全都会飘入<nl>寒冷且无法呼吸的太空。

English: Alright! <30>Let's go!
Rejoice, friend!
We have come to free you!
Let's get her out of that cage.
Translated: 我们把她从笼子中弄出来吧。

English: Welcome to Tropos!<nl>Buccanary's Shop - Straight Up!
Translated: 欢迎来到对流区！<nl>布卡娜里的商店就在正上方！

English: Gawk Cave this way.<nl>Closed off until further notice.
Translated: 此路通往呆子洞穴。<nl>关闭中，请等待未来的通知。

English: Up: Floating Continent<nl>Down: Tropos
Translated: 上方：漂浮大陆<nl>下方：对流区

English: Up: Floating Continent<nl>Down: Tropos
Translated: 上方：漂浮大陆<nl>下方：对流区

English: The door is locked.
This way: Path to Floating Continent
Higher: Vellie Plaza<nl>Lower: Otus's Residence
Translated: 上方：维里广场<nl>下方：欧图斯的家

English: Up: Floating Continent<nl>Down: Vellie
Translated: 上方：漂浮大陆<nl>下方：维里村

English: Hey, um...
Thanks for helping me out.
I couldn't have faced my family<nl>without you, I don't think.
Translated: 要不是有你在我都不知道怎么<nl>面对我的家人。

English: Let me know when you're ready to go.
Translated: 你准备好出发时记得告诉我。

English: I'll just stay here.
I don't like my family much.
I'm glad we made it back.
Translated: 我们能安全回来真是太好了。

English: I'll hide before the villagers see me.
Translated: 我得在村民发现我前藏起来。

English: ...Where is everyone?
Otus! I'm glad you're awake.
Translated: 欧图斯！很高兴你能醒来。

English: Are you OK?
...I'm sorry, I couldn't help you in Advent...
Translated: ……抱歉，在爱文德城没能帮<nl>上你……

English: Molstrom is just too powerful.
I can't believe it's come to this...
Translated: 我不敢相信事情会变成这样……

English: I haven't been able to protect anyone.
I have some more bad news.
...Asio seems to be taking it hard.
Translated: ……艾西欧看起来受了不小的打击。

English: He hasn't left the lookout point for a while.
Translated: 他已经在瞭望台待有一段时间了。

English: I think you should<nl>probably talk to him.
He seems to need a friendly ear.
Translated: 他看起来需要倾诉衷肠。

English: Didn't go well, huh?
Man... Asio's just in a bad mood.
Translated: 唉……艾西欧只是心情不太好。

English: I'm sure when he calms<nl>down he'll apologize.
Translated: 我想他冷静后会道歉的。

English: Psst..!
Master Otus, Master Geddy!
Alphonse!
Sssssh!
I must not be seen here,<nl>but we must talk.
Translated: 我们必须商量一些事情，但不<nl>能让人看到我在这。

English: Come to Master Otus's house.
We can talk there in private.
Translated: 我们在那私下进行讨论。

English: Guess we should go hear<nl>what he has to say, Otus.
Translated: 我们该听听他要说的事，欧图斯。

English: Otus!
I want to speak to you about something.
Which means...
[1]Get down here immediately!
Hm, that's strange...
It's all dark out here, but it's still morning.
Translated: 天全黑了，但现在还是早上。

English: I got a bad feeling about this.
Otus!
I want to speak to you about something.
Which means...
[1]Get up here immediately!
There he is! Let's get him!
Translated: 他在那里！我们去抓住他！

English: I don't know how I ended up here.
Translated: 我不知道为什么最后还是来了这里。

English: I should know better than to<nl>listen to the Professor's rants.
Translated: 我应该学精明点，不该在这听<nl>教授的长篇大论。

English: The old coot drives me insane.
Translated: 这老笨蛋弄得我要发疯了。

English: You shouldn't be here either.
Get back to patrol duty!
Otus!
I told you to get back to patrolling!
Get moving!
Welcome, Otus.
I'm very glad to see you again.
You're probably wondering where you are.
Translated: 你大概想知道你在哪里。

English: You're not dreaming.
You're seeing visions of the past... and the future.
Translated: 你所看到的是关于过去……与<nl>未来的景象。

English: And from today.
You may not remember any of it, but it is real.
Translated: 你可能无法记住，但它们都是<nl>真实的。

English: You grew up with good people, Otus.
Translated: 你在好人中间长大，欧图斯。

English: Full of affection for you, and hopes for your future.
Translated: 那里充满了对你的爱护，以及<nl>对你未来的期望。

English: And regret for things said and done.
Translated: 还有对所说所做的遗憾。

English: These visions are our gift to you.
Translated: 这些景象是我们给你的礼物。

English: The truth, I think, is often the greatest gift.
Translated: 我想真话往往是最好的礼物。

English: Especially since people are so prone to forgetting<nl>the things they should cherish most.
Translated: 特别是在人们总是倾向于忘记<nl>他们最该珍惜的事物。

English: You must have many questions.
Come,<30> sit down.
<25>.<25>.<25>.<90>Is everyone<20> going to be okay?
Geddy, <20>Alphonse, <20>Twig, <40>and all the rest..?
Translated: 格迪，<20>阿尔冯斯，<20>特维格，<nl><40>还有大家……？

English: Yes, Otus.
You succeeded out there.
The fact that you're here means that the Anti-Hex worked.
Translated: 你出现在这里就意味着反魔法<nl>已经生效了。

English: What will happen now?
The islands will be sinking.
Your generation will know the surface,<20> as we did.
Translated: 你们这一代会了解地表，<20>就像<nl>曾经的我们。

English: Thanks to you, the world will be whole once again.
Translated: 多亏有你，世界会再次恢复完整。

English: It will be difficult to adjust to life<nl>on the surface after all this time...
Translated: 过了这么久要再次适应地表的<nl>生活会很困难……

English: But it will be overcome.
Translated: 但这些总有办法克服的。

English: I hope you don't blame us for what we've put you through.
Translated: 我希望你不会因为我们让你遭<nl>遇了这种事而责怪我们。

English: We tried to change the universe, and we paid a price for that.
Translated: 我们试图改变宇宙，并付出了代价。

English: You paid that price too.
In order to end the Loop, we were willing to do anything.
Translated: 为了终结轮回，我们曾愿意付<nl>出任何代价。

English: Even risk our future.<30> Your present.
Translated: 甚至是我们的未来。<30>以及你的现在。

English: .<10>.<10>.<10>I'm not sure I understand.
It doesn't matter.
All you need to know is that we wanted<nl>to discover the nature of the Universe,<nl>and in doing so<20> we lost ourselves.
Translated: 你要知道我们总想探索宇宙的<nl>本质，但这么做的时候<20>我们迷<nl>失了自我。

English: Maybe one day, in this life or the<nl>next, you will learn about the Loop.
Translated: 也许有一天，在此生或来世，<nl>你会学到关于轮回的事。

English: But there are far more rewarding things to<nl>learn about the universe than how it ends.
Translated: 但比起它是如何终结的课题，<nl>宇宙还有更值得研究的地方。

English: You're probably worried that this is the end for you.
Translated: 你可能会担心这是你的结局。

English: Don't worry.
In this world we've created,<30><nl>there is always a second chance.
Translated: 在我们创造的这个世界里，<nl><30>总会有第二次机会的。

English: Our time is up.
And I know I'm not the only one, but...
Translated: 我知道我不是唯一的一个，但……

English: I've always believed in you, Otus.

that cloaked weirdo we met|lblCloakedWeirdo

Uhh...
.<10>.<10>.<30>Why is it dark all of a sudden?
How long were we chasing that jerk?
Translated: 我们追了那个混蛋多久？

English: It should still be morning...
Aaah!<30> What's going on?!
Oh no! Sky pirates!
I haven't had time to fix our cannon yet!<nl>We're completely defenceless!
Translated: 我还来不及修好大炮！<nl>村子现在一点防备都没有！

English: Please take me with you!<nl>If we stick together, we'll<nl>be safer!
Translated: 请把我带上！<nl>一起行动会更安全！

English: If we get to the lab we can<nl>warn Asio and the professor!
Translated: 如果能赶到实验室我们就能警<nl>告艾西欧和教授！

Translated: 献给最英勇的人！超时髦！

English: The greatest canteen! Increases your health! WOW!
Translated: 最棒的汤罐！能增加你的生命值！哇！

Translated: 可附加爆弹枪组件。能最大化射程！

Translated: 可附加喷火枪组件。能最大化火力！

Translated: 装有易燃燃料的强力泵。

Translated: 能强化阿尔冯斯的喷火枪。

Translated: 一件以强力蛛丝为材料的幽邃且

Asio has told you to patrol for pirates today.
Translated: 艾西欧让你今天去巡视海盗。

English: The troublemaker went into this cave...
Translated: 那个捣乱鬼躲进了洞里……

English: Chase the troublemaker! He escaped downwards!
Translated: 追上捣乱鬼！他往下方逃走了！

English: You found something the Professor might be interested in.
Translated: 你找到了可能让教授感兴趣的东西。

English: Find the Professor and Asio, and stay safe!
Translated: 找到教授和艾西欧并待在安全的地方！

English: Are the other villagers OK?
Go up and out of Vellie, and find the Owl temple.
Translated: 从维里村上方出去，找到猫头鹰神殿。

English: Find the Owl temple's control room and shut it down!
Translated: 找到猫头鹰神殿的控制室并关掉它！

English: The control room is broken! Go upwards, warn Advent!
Translated: 控制室已损坏！从上方离开，警告爱文德城的人。

English: Blow the pirate dreadnought up from within!
Translated: 从内部炸掉海盗的无畏舰！

English: Alphonse wanted to talk at the house...
Translated: 阿尔冯斯想在房子里和你谈谈……

English: Fly up above Tropos, towards the Floating Continent!
Translated: 飞往对流区上方的漂浮大陆！

English: Get the final Relic!
Twig just joined. Try to find a path back to Vellie.
Translated: 特维格加入了队伍。想办法回到维里村。

English: There's a pirate base in Mesos! Warn Twig's family!
Translated: 中间区有个海盗基地！快警告特维格的家人！

English: You have to find the entrance to the pirate base, in Tropos.
